src_text: Merero ye Bohlokwa Seemong sa Bjale.
tgt_text: Ukuphathwa kwenhlekelele emuva kokuhlasela kwezikhukhula.

src_text: Taolo ya Masetlapelo Morago ga Mafula.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi enduduzo kubo bonke abantu abashonelwe ngabathandiweyo babo ezikhukhuleni zakamuva ezidale umonakalo owesabekayo ezihlasele izingxenye eziningana zezwe lethu, ikakhulukazi isifundazwe saKwaZulu-Natali..     Ukumenyezelwa kweSimo Senhlekelele Sikazwelonke kanye nezinhlelo zosizo lokungenelela eziphathelene nenhlalo-mnotho yabantu ezimenyezelwe nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa kamuva nje, bekuhloswe ngakho ukuqinisekisa ukuthathwa kwezinyathelo ezisebenza kahle futhi ezihambelanayo kuzo zonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni, ngokusebenzisa iSizinda Sikazwelonke Sokuphathwa Kwenhlekelele..     Imali eyisigidigidi esisodwa samarandi ehlinzekwe nguhulumeni isetshenziselwa ukulekelela imizamo yokweseka nokuvuselela, ukubuyisela ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingo-ngqangi kanye nokuhlinzeka ngosizo lokunciphisa usizi nenhlupheko kubantu okusho ukuhlinzeka ngokudla, amanzi, indawo yokuhlala, ukuthuthwa kwendle kanye nezingubo zokugqoka..     Seyiqalisiwe kakade inqubo yokwakha kabusha izindawo ezikhahlamezekile njengoba abantu bezwe lakithi bebambene ngezandla ekuzimiseleni kwabo ukulekelela labo abalahlekelwe ngamakhaya abo kanye nempahla yabo.

src_text: Kabinete lebišitše mahloko yona go batho ka moka bao ba lobilego bao ba phelago le bona mo mafuleng go setla pelo malobanyana ao wetšego dikarolo tša naga ya gaborena, kudukudu KwaZulu-Natal..     Tsebagatšo ya Maemo Masetlapelo Bosetšhaba gotee le magato kimollo ya ikonomi maphelong batho ao tsebagaditšwego ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa malobanyana mo be nepile go netefatša kgato ye nago le mohola le ya go rulaganywa ka tsela ye maleba go potologa didiko ka moka ka mmušo, ka Senthara ya Bosetšhaba ya Taolo ya Masetlapelo..     R1 bilione ya go tlišwa ke mmušo gare šomišwa go thekga maitekelo kimollo le go boetša seemo sekeng, go bušetša ditirelo tša motheo sekeng le go fana ka thušo ya botho ka sebopego sa dijo, madulo, tlhwekišo le diaparo..     Tshepedišo ya go agaleswa mafelo ao amilwego ke mafula šetše thomile ka ge batho ba naga ya gaborena ba ipopa ngatana ye tee ka maikemišetšo go thuša bao ba lobilego magae le dithoto tša bona.
tgt_text: Ezakamuva ngeSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Tsebišo ya Seemo sa Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukukhathazeka kwalo ngokudlondlobala kwenani labantu abasuleleka nge-COVID-19 kamuva nje ezingxenyeni ezithile zezwe futhi linxuse abantu bonke ukuba bathathe izinyathelo zokuzinakekela nokuqikelela impilo yabo ukuze bazivikele kuleli gciwane elibulalayo, ikakhulukazi esikhathini sasebusika.

src_text: Kabinete hlobaetšwa ke tlhatlogo ya bjale ya diphetelo tša COVID-19 dikarolong tše dingwe tša naga ya gaborena ebile hlohleleditše batho ka moka go latela magato go ihlokomela gore ba itšhireletše kgahlanong le baerase ye ya go iša batho ga maotwanahunyela, kudukudu ka nako ye ya marega.
tgt_text: Igciwane liselokhu liyingozi esihleli nayo ngaso sonke isikhathi phakathi kwethu futhi ukugonywa kusalokhu kuyisona sikhali sokuzivikela esisebenza kahle kakhulu.

src_text: Baerase ye santše le tlhobaboroko yeo tšwelago pele ebile meento sale sebetša sa go ba le mohola kudu sa go itšhireletša.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyakuthokozela ukukhula kwesibalo sabantu abaqoka ukugonywa njengendlela yokuqala yokuzivikela ku-COVID-19 emuva kokuthi izibalo zakamuva zibonise ukuthi isibalo sabantu abadala asebegonyiwe ezifundazweni ezinhlanu sesikhule saze sayofinyelela enanini eliyingqophamlando elingaphezu kwamaphesenti angama-.

src_text: Kabinete thabišwa ke gore batho ba bantši ba tšea sephetho sa go hlaba meento bjalo ka mekgwa ya bona ya mathomo ya go itšhireletša kgahlanong le COVID-19 morago ga gore dipalopalo tša moragorago di laetše gore re fihleletše phenyo ya go feta seripa sa meento bathong ba bagolo diprofenseng tše tlhano..     Kabinete dira boipiletšo go bao ba sa kago ba hlaba meento go dira bjalo gore ba itšhireletše le go šireletša bao ba phelago le bona.

Re swanetše go tšwelapele go obamela magato ka moka thibelo ya COVID-19, go akaretšwa le go apara maseke wa go pipetša nko le molomo, go hlapa matsogo ka meetse le ka sesepe goba ka go šomiša sanithaesa sa diatla sa go tswakwa ka alekhohole ya go feta 70%, le go šielana sekgala sa go bolokega se ka bago mithara tee..     Thušo ya Tšhelete ya Kimollo ya Masetlapelo Leago (SRD).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyabanxusa labo abangakagonywa ukuthi nabo benze kanjalo ukuze bazivikele futhi bavikele nabathandiweyo babo.

src_text: Kabinete hlohleleditše badudi bao ba amogelago Thušo ya tšhelete ya SRD ya R350 go dira dikgopelo gape morago ga gore go tsebagatšwe melao ye meswa ya go laola dikgopelo le maswanedi go hwetša thušo ye ya tšhelete.
tgt_text: Kumele futhi siqhubeke nokulandela yonke imigomo yokuzivikela kwi-COVID-19, kubandakanya ukugqoka isifonyo esimboza kokubili ikhala nomlomo, ukugeza izandla ngamanzi nensipho, noma sisebenzise isibulali-magciwane sezandla esiqukethe i-alcohol engama-70%, futhi sigcine ibanga eliphephile okungenani eliyimitha elilodwa lokuqhelelana phakathi kwethu nabanye abantu emphakathini..     Isibonelelo Sosizo Olubhekiswe Kubantu Abagajwe Wusizi Nenhlupheko (i-SRD).

src_text: Dikgopelo di ka dirwa wepsaeteng ya Etšensi ya Afrika Borwa ya Tšhireletšego ya Leago (SASSA) mo go https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likhuthaze izakhamuzi ezithola iSibonelelo se-SRD esingama-R350 ukuba zifake izicelo zazo kabusha, kulandela ukwethulwa kwemithethonqubo emisha elawula izicelo kanye nemibandela yokufaneleka kwabantu ukuthola lesi sibonelelo.

src_text: Peakanyo ya dikgopelo butšwe ka la 23 Moranang 2022 ebile ke tshepedišo yeo dirwago ka mokgwa wa titšithale ka moka ga yona go kgontšha gore dikgopelo di dirwe ka bonako..     Thušo ye ya tšhelete ya kimollo ke boikokotlelo bja go bolokega go malapa go ihlokela bao ge nkabe se ka yona ba ka be ba amilwe gampe ke lemena la bohloki le tlhokego ya mešomo.
tgt_text: Izicelo zingafakwa kwiwebhusayithi yoPhiko LweziMpesheni Nezibonelelo Zikahulumeni lwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASSA): https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.

src_text: Mmušo ikgafetše go fana ka thušo ya leago go bao ba lego kotsing gore le bona ba kgone go fihlelela dinyakwa tša motheo.
tgt_text: Uhlelo lokufaka izicelo lwavulwa mhla zingama-23 kuMbasa 2022 futhi luwuhlelo oluqhutshwa ngobuchwepheshe bedijithali ngokuphelele ukuze kusheshe ukucutshungulwa nokuphothulwa kwezicelo..     Isibonelelo sokuhlinzeka ngosizo siyisibonelelo esisemqoka kakhulu sokubhekelela imindeni entulayo obekungenzeka izithole seyibhuqabhuqwa yisihlava sobubha nokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi.

src_text: Polokego le Tšhireletšego.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uzibophezele ekuhlinzekeni ngezibonelelo kulabo bantu abadla imbuya ngothi abangenawo amandla okuzibhekelela ngokwabo ukuze bakwazi ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zabo eziyisisekelo.

src_text: Kabinete tšwelapele go sola ka bogale dipolao tša go setla pelo tša basadi ebile amogetše magato bonako ka bahlankedi ba phethagatšo ya molao ge ba kgonne go golega bagononelwa ba go amana le lehu la Mohumagatšana Hillary Gardee (28), wa kua Kamagugu gola Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Ezokuphepha nokuvikeleka.

src_text: Kabinete sotše gape le polao ya batho ba tshela kua Khayelitsha, Motsekapa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyaqhubeka nokugxeka izenzo zokubulawa kwabantu besifazane ezingenangqondo futhi lisithokozele isenzo sabomthetho sokubabopha ngokushesha okukhulu abasolwa abayamaniswa nokufa kuka-Nks Hillary Gardee (28), obehlala endaweni yaKamagugu eMpumalanga.

src_text: Dipolao tše tša go setla pelo ke segopotšo go rena sa gore re swanetše go dira tšohle bjalo ka setšhaba go fediša dikgaruru ka kakaretšo le dikgaruru tša go ikala ka bong le polao ya basadi (GBVF)..     Kabinete hlohleleditše batho ka moka ka mo nageng go šomišana le mmušo go lwantšha bosenyi le GBVF.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde futhi lagxeka nesenzo sokubulawa kwabantu abayisithupha eKhayelitsha, eKapa.

src_text: Re le mmogo re ka netefatša gore setšhaba sa gaborena le mebila bolokegile bathong ka moka, go akaretšwa batšofadi, basadi le bana.
tgt_text: Lokhu kubulawa kwabantu okungenangqondo kuyisikhumbuzo sokuthi kusekuningi okumele sikwenze njengomphakathi ukuqeda udlame kanye nodlame olweyamene nobulili kanye nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane (i-GBVF)..     IKhabhinethi linxuse abantu bonke kuleli ukuthi basebenzisane nohulumeni empini yokulwisana nobugebengu kanye ne-GBVF.

src_text: Ikonomi.
tgt_text: Uma sibambisene singaqinisekisa ukuthi imiphakathi yethu kanye nezitaladi zethu kuphephile kubantu bonke, kubandakanya nabantu esebekhulile ngokweminyaka, abesifazane kanye nezingane..     Ezomnotho.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše pulo ya semmušo ya fabriki ya go foroma ditena ya Corobrik Kwastina gola Driefontein profenseng ya Gauteng ka Mopresidente Ramaphosa ka Laboraro, 4 Mopitlo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe ukuvulwa ngokusemthethweni kwefemu eyakha izitini yakwa-Corobrik, i-Kwastina e-Driefontein e-Gauteng okwenziwe nguMongameli u-Ramaphosa ngoLwesithathu mhla zizi-4 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Faporiki ye ye tšwago pele ka theknolotši ya sebjalebjale bopa karolo ya dipeeletšo tša R800 milione, tša go gata ka mošito tee le dipeeletšo tše dingwe gape tša go lekana R200 milione tšeo go lebeletšwego gore di tla oketša mešomo ya tšweletšo ya lekgwara ka Corobrik gola KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: Le femu kanokusho yohlobo lwesimanjemanje iyingxenye yotshalomali oluyizigidi ezingama-800 zamarandi, oluhambisana nolunye futhi utshalomali olwengeziwe oluyizigidi ezingama-200 zamarandi olwabelwe umsebenzi wokwelulwa kwemisebenzi kakhonkolo yakwa-Corobrik KwaZulu-Natali.

src_text: Corobrik ke ye nngwe ya dikgwebo tše mmalwa tšeo di phethagaditšego kgoeletšo ya Mopresidente Ramaphosa dikgwebong tša Afrika Borwa le tša boditšhabatšhaba go beeletša ikonoming ye.
tgt_text: Abakwa-Corobrik bangelinye lamabhizinisi akuleli asabelile kwikhwelo likaMongameli u-Ramaphosa lapho enxusa amabhizinisi aseNingizimu Afrika kanye namabhizinisi amazwe ngamazwe ukuba atshale izimali emnothweni wezwe lethu.

src_text: Kabinete lemogile gore ikonomi ye fokolago ya haedrotšene tsošološitšwe ge Anglo American tsebagatša lori ya go sepela ka haedrotšene.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likuphawulile ukuthi umnotho wegesi ihayidrojini osafufusa uthole ukwesekwa nokufukulwa njengoba abakwa-Anglo American sebethule iloli elisebenza ngegesi yehayidrojini.

src_text: Lori ye yeo go dirilwego diphetogo go yona gore sepele ka haedrotšene go tšwa go disele, le go sepela gape ka dipeteri tša mohuta wa lithium-ion ke ya mathomothomo lefaseng.
tgt_text: Leli loli – eliguquliwe ebelisebenza ngodizili manje eselisebenza ngehayidrojini, futhi elinengxenye ethile yalo esebenza ngamabhethri ohlobo lwe-lithium-ion – lingelokuqala ngqa ukubonakala emhlabeni wonke jikelele.

src_text: Ikonomi ya haedrotšene hlaotšwe bjalo ka yeo tlago pele ga tšohle godimo ga ikonomi ya naga ya borena ya go ikala ka tlhago, le go sepetša kgolo ya ikonomi le tlhomo ya mešomo..     Kabinete amogetše dipeeletšo tše dingwe ka gare ga ikonomi ya gaborena ka khamphani ya dijo ya Ireland ya go bitšwa The Kerry Group, yeo butšego polante ye mpsha ya go bitša R650 milione kua Hammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natal yeo nepilego go tšweletša dijo tša go swarelela nako ye telele kontinenteng.
tgt_text: Umnotho wehayidrojini usuhlonzwe njengento esemqoka kakhulu okumele ibekwe eqhulwini kuhlobo lomnotho wethu olungayinukubezi imvelo, futhi ukuze kukhuthazwe ukukhula komnotho kanye nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi..     IKhabhinethi liluthokozele futhi nolunye utshalomali olwengeziwe olufakwe yinkampani ekhiqiza ukudla yase-Ireland, i-Kerry Group, esivule ifemu entsha edle izigidi ezingama-650 zamarandi e-Hammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natali, okuhloswe ngayo ukukhiqizela leli zwekazi ukudla ngokuqhubekayo.

src_text: Polante ye ke ya moswananoši ka baka la gore thekga mekgwa ye mmalwa ya go swarelela lebaka le le telele go akaretšwa didirišwa tša tšhomišo ya fase ya enetši, go fehlwa ga mohlagase ka seetša sa letšatši go fokotša tirišo ya mohlagase go tšwa go tšweletšo ya mohlagase ya ka mo nageng, tšhomišo ya phišo ge go fišwa dilahlwa go fehla mohlagase, le mekgwa ya go šoma gabotse ya go ageletša meetse, go šomiša seswa le go fokotša tšhomišo ya ona.
tgt_text: Le femu iyifemu eyingqayizivele, futhi engafani neze namanye, njengoba inezinsiza-kusebenza eziningana eziyoyilekelela ukuthi iqhubeke isikhathi eside yenza umsebenzi wayo ngendlela esimeme, kubandakanya imishini engadli ugesi omningi, ukusetshenziswa kukagesi welanga ukuze kuncishiswe umthamo kagesi osuka esikhungweni sikagesi sikazwelonke, ukuqoqwa kwamandla kagesi nokushisa emithonjeni yamandla kagesi esisetshenzisiwe, kanye nokuqoqwa nokugcinwa kwamanzi ngobunyoninco, nokusebenzisa izinto kabusha kanye nokuncishiswa kwemfucuza ekhiqizwayo.

src_text: Khamphani ye ya Kerry Group fihlile ka mo Afrika Borwa ka 2011, le gona dipeeletšo tša yona tšeo di tšwelago pele ke sešupo sa gore Afrika Borwa santše le naga ya boikgethelo dipeeletšong.
tgt_text: Inkampani i-Kerry Group seyisebenze eNingizimu Afrika kusukela ngowezi-2011, futhi lolu tshalomali olwengeziwe luyinkomba yokuthi iNingizimu Afrika iyizwe eliyintandokazi kubatshalizimali.

src_text: Dipeeletšo tše di gata mohlaleng wa tsebagatšo ya bene yeo dirilwego ka mo nageng ya Isuzu D-Max gola Gqeberha kua Kapa Bohlabela kgwedi ya go feta.
tgt_text: Lolu tshalomali lulandela ezinyathelweni zokwethulwa kweveni yohlobo lwe-Isuzu D-Max eyakhiwa kuleli e-Gqeberha eMpumalanga Kapa ngenyanga edlule.

src_text: Mohuta wo moswa wa D-MAX ke seka sa go rweša kgare maikgafo Isuzu ka mo Afrika Borwa ebile ke ye nngwe ya dikatlego tšeo di fihleletšwego ka fase ga Lenaneotlhabollo la Tšweletšo ya Difatanaga (APDP).
tgt_text: I-D-MAX entsha yohlobo lwesimanjemanje iwuphawu olucace bha lokuzibophezela kwenkampani yakwa-Isuzu eNingizimu Afrika futhi ingenye yezimpumelelo ezizuzwe ngaphansi koHlelo Lokuthuthukisa Ukwakhiwa Nokukhiqizwa Kwezimoto (i-APDP).

src_text: Lenaneo la APDP ke setlamo sa tlhohleletšo ya botšweletši intastering ya dikoloi leo nepokgolo ya lona lego go hlohleletša palo ya godimo ya dikoloi tšeo di tšweletšwago mo intastering ya difatanaga yeo go boletšwego ka yona, go tlhohleletša boleng bja tlaleletšo lefapheng la intasteri ya dikoloi gore go hlongwe mešomo go potologa makala le dikgwebokamano ka moka tša difatanaga.
tgt_text: I-APDP iwuhlelo lokukhuthaza umkhiqizo oluqondiswe embonini yezimoto okuhloswe ngalo ukugqugquzela nokukhulisa inani lezimoto ezikhiqizwa yile mboni yezimoto, ukugqugquzela ukwakhiwa nokulungiswa kwezingxenye zezimoto embonini yakuleli futhi ngalokho-ke kuvuleke amathuba omsebenzi ochungechungeni lonkana lwemisebenzi yokwakhiwa nokukhiqizwa kwezimoto.

src_text: Go tla dirwa tšhelete ya go balelwa R2,8 bilione go Makala le dikgwebokamano tša tšweletšo ya ka mo nageng ka magatotatelano APDP.
tgt_text: Lilinganiselwa kuma-R. 8 ezigidigidi inani lomkhiqizo wakuleli ozokhiqizwa esikhathini sonkana sokuqhubeka kwe-APDP.

src_text: Dipeeletšo tše di tla hloma mešomo ya thwi ya go feta ye 1 000 polanteng le go thwala ka tsela ya go rarela batho ba go lekana 24 000 gomme se se tla thuša kudu go kaonafatša setšhaba mo seleteng se..     Indaba ya tša Meepo.
tgt_text: Lolu tshalomali luzovikela imisebenzi eyi-1 000 yabantu abaqashwe ngqo kulesi sikhungo futhi luvulele abantu abayizi-24 000 amathuba omsebenzi emisebenzini eminingana engaphandle ehlobene nomsebenzi owenziwa yile nkampani futhi ngalokho-ke lulekelele kakhulu ekuthuthukisweni nokufukulwa komphakathi kulesiya sifunda..     INgqungquthela Yezezimayini.

src_text: Tiragalo ya Indaba ya Meepo ya Afrika ya 2022 yeo bego swaretšwe kua Sentharengkgoparara ya Boditšhabatšhaba gola Motsekapa go thoma ka la 9 go fihla ka la 12 Mopitlo 2022 ke ye nngwe ya difala tše kgolokgolo tša dikopano le tša kgwerano magareng ga bakgathatema ka moka intastering ya meepo.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yokutshalwa Kwezimali Ezimayini zase-Afrika yowezi-2022 ebibanjelwe e-Cape Town International Convention Centre kusukela mhla ziyisi-9 kuya kumhla ziyi-12 kuNhlaba 2022, ingesinye sezigcawu ezinkulukazi zokuxhumana nokusebenzisana phakathi kwabo bonke ababambiqhaza embonini yezimayini.

src_text: Morero wa tiragalo ye ke wo: “Mpshafatšo ya Meepo ka mo Afrika: Go Beeletša ka gare ga Diphetogo tša Enetši, ESG, le Diikonomi”.
tgt_text: Isiqubulo sale ngqungquthela sabe sithi: “Uguquko-simo Lwezezimayini e-Afrika: Sitshala Izimali Ekuguqulweni Kwamandla, i-ESG, kanye Neminotho”.

src_text: Kabinete nale tshepho ya gore Indaba ye ya Meepo tla thuša go laetša le go hlohleletša Afrika Borwa go ba naga ya boikgethelo dipeeletšong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi linethemba elikhulu lokuthi iNgqungquthela Yezezimayini izolekelela ekuvezeni kanye nokukhangisa iNingizimu Afrika njengezwe eliyintandokazi kubatshalizimali.

src_text: Afrika Borwa amogela dipeeletšo tšeo di dirilwego ka mo nageng ya gaborena ebile ikgafetše go hlola maemo go kgontšha phethagalo ya kgolo ye akaretšago ya ikonomi le diphetogo ikonoming.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ilwamukela ngezandla ezimhlophe utshalomali olungena kuleli futhi izibophezele ekwakheni izimo ezikahle futhi ezikulungele ukukhula komnotho okubandakanyayo kanye nokulethwa koguquko emnothweni.

src_text: Dikamano tša Boditšhabtšhaba le tša Dilete.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane namazwe ngamazwe omhlaba kanye namazwe esifunda.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše Kopano ya malobanyana mo ya Mopresidente Ramaphosa ge be kopana le Mopresidente Joe Biden wa Amerika, Mopresidente Emmanuel Macron wa Fora le Mopresidente Hakainde Hichilema wa Zambia difaleng tša go fapafapana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukelile futhi ukuxhumana nokufakana imilomo kwakamuva nje phakathi kukaMongameli  u-Ramaphosa noMongameli waseMelika u-Joe Biden, noMongameli wase-France u-Emmanuel Macron kanye noMongameli wase-Zambia u-Hakainde Hichilema ezigcawini zokuxhumana ezahlukene.

src_text: Dikopano tše di kgontšhitše Mopresidente go matlafatša dikamano tša magareng ga dinaga magareng ga Afrika Borwa le mebušo ya dinaga tšeo gweranego le tšona mererong ye bohlokwa ya dilete le ya boditšhabatšhaba, go karetšwa le go tla ka tharollo ya go rena moya wa khutšo dithulanong tša Ukraine     Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuxhumana nokufakana imilomo kuhlinzeke uMongameli ngethuba elikahle lokuqinisa ubudlelwane kanye nobambiswano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika namazwe ebambisene nawo ezindabeni ezisemqoka eziphathelene nesifunda kanye nalezo eziphathelene namazwe ngamazwe omhlaba, kubandakanya nokuthola isixazululo esinokuthula kwingxabano eqhubekayo e-Ukraine     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Diboutu tša Tekanyetšokabo.
tgt_text: Amavoti Esabelomali.

src_text: Kabinete dira boipiletšo go badudi ka moka go šala morago Diboutu tša go fapafapana tša Tekanyetšokabo tša go tla ka dikgoro tša mmušo tša bosetšhaba le ka Kantoro ya Mopresidente gore ba tle ba kgone go netefatša gore mmušo wa ikarabela diphethong tša ona..     Ka nako ya Diboutu tša Tekanyetšokabo, dikgoro ka moka di fana ka tlhalošo ye tseneletšego ya dithulaganyo tša ona le ka mananeo ao beilwego pele ngwaga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi linxusa zonke izakhamuzi ukuba ziwalandele amaVoti Esabelomali ahlukahlukene ethulwa yiminyango kahulumeni kazwelonke kanye neHhovisi likaMongameli ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi uhulumeni uyaphendula ngemisebenzi yakhe..     Ngenkathi kwethulwa amaVoti Esabelomali, yonke iminyango ichaza kabanzi ngezinhlelo zayo kanye nezinto ezibekwe eqhulwini ezizokwenziwa kulo nyaka.

src_text: Diboutu tša Tekanyetšokabo di nepile go netefatša gore dikhwama tša mmušo di šomišwa ka pabalelo gore di tle di kgone go fihlelela dinyakwa tša batho setšhabeng..     Diboutu tše tša Tekanyetšokabo di fana gape le ka monyetla wo mobotse go Ditona gore ba kgone go hlatholla goya pele mošomo wa mmušo, go akaretšwa le dikatlego le ditlhotlo..     Phethagatšo ya Leanopeakanyo la Gase ya Petroleamo yeo Fetošeditšwego Diela (LPG).
tgt_text: Amavoti Esabelomali kuhloswe ngawo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izimali zikahulumeni zisetshenziswa ngobunyoninco ekuhlangabezaneni nezidingo zomphakathi..     Ahlinzeka futhi ngesigcawu esihle kakhulu sokuba oNgqongqoshe bakwazi ukuchaza kabanzi ngomsebenzi kahulumeni, kubandakanya izimpumelelo kanye nezinselele..     Iqhingasu Lokuqaliswa Kokukhishwa  Kwesibaseli Esiyigesi Ewuketshezi (i-LPG) .

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go hlongwa ga Phethagatšo ya Leanopeakanyo la LPG, leo le phatlaladitšwego ka Hlakola.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liligunyazile iQhingasu Lokukhishwa kwe-LPG ukuze liqale ukusebenza,  okuyiqhingasu elashicilelwa ngoNdasa 2022 ukuze kuboniswane nomphakathi ngalo.

src_text: Leanopeakanyo le le nepile go oketša intasteri ya LPG ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Leli qhingasu lihlose ukwelula nokunweba imboni ye-LPG ezweni.

src_text: LPG tla ba le mohola wo mogolo go fetošafetoša methopo ya enetši..     Leanopeakanyo le, magareng ga magatotharollo mangwe, le tla laola go bewa ga ditheko magatong dikgwebokamano le go thekga bohlami bja disilintere tša LPG ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: I-LPG izolekelela kakhulu ekuqinisekiseni ukusetshenziswa kwemithombo yamandla ehlukahlukene.

src_text: Le tla thuša gape go ruta batho setšhabeng ka mehola ya go šomiša LPG bjalo ka mokgwa wo mongwe wa enetši..     Leanopeakanyo le le tla thoma go hwetšagala morago ga ge le phatlaladitšwe ke Kgoro ya Methopo ya Diminirale le Enetši mo go www.dmr.gov.za.
Tlhako ye Logetšwego Maano ya Bosetšhaba ka Temošo ya Ditokelo tša bao ba Phelago ka Bogole – Kwalakwatšo ya Masolo Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole.
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezinye izinhlelo zokungenelela, leli qhingasu lizolawula amanani entengo emsebenzini wonkana wokukhiqizwa kwegesi ewuketshezi futhi leseke nomsebenzi wokukhiqizwa kwamasilinda e-LPG ezweni.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Tlhako ye Logetšwego Maano ya Bosetšhaba godimo ga Temošo ya Ditokelo tša Digole – Go Hloma Masolo Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole.
tgt_text: Futhi lizofundisa umphakathi ngemihlomulo yokusebenzisa i-LPG njengolunye uhlobo lwamandla olwehlukile olungasetshenziswa..     Abantu bazokwazi ukufinyelela kulona emuva kokuba selishicileliwe nguMnyango Wezimbiwa Namandla ku-www.dmr.gov.za.

src_text: Tlhako ye nepile go fa tlhahlo go bobedi mafapha praebete le setšhaba go netefatša gore ditokelo tša batho ba go phela ka bogole di šireletšwa, goya le ka fao di hlalošitšwego ka gare ga Molaotheo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lwamasu Lukazwelonke olumayelana Nemikhankaso Yokuqwashisa Ngamalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka.
IKhabhinethi lilugunyazile uHlaka Lwamasu Lukazwelonke olumayelana Nemikhankaso Yokuqwashisa Ngamalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Tlhako ye fana ka setlabakelo seo se tla thušago go fediša mapheko semorafe ge go tšewa diphetho, kudukudu diphetho tša go amana le batho ba go phela ka bogole thuša gape le ka go lemoša batho ba go phela ka bogole go tseba ditokelo tša bona goya le ka fao di šireleditšwego ke Molaotheo.
tgt_text: Uhlaka luhlose ukuhola nokuqondisa umkhakha ozimele ngokunjalo futhi nomkhakha kahulumeni ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi avikelekile amalungelo abantu abanokukhubazeka, njengoba lokhu kubekwe ngokucacile kuMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wonyaka we-.

src_text: Tlhako ye fana le ka tlhahlo, dipego tša babegaditaba le go lemoša batho setšhabeng ka ditokelo tša batho ba go phela ka bogole kgontšha Sengwalwa sa Makgoraditsela ka Ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka bogole.

Afrika Borwa ke ye nngwe ya dinaga tša go tsenela Kwanokgoparara ya Ditšhabakopano (UN) ka ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole le Tshepedišo ya UN Kwanong ya Afrika ka Ditokelo tša Botho le Ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole (Tshepedišo ya Afrika ya Ditokelo tša Digole).
tgt_text: Uhlaka luhlinzeka ngeqoqwana lamathuluzi azolekelela ekususeni imigoqo ebandlululayo ekuthathweni kwezinqumo, ikakhulukazi lezo eziphathelene nabantu abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Tlhako ye rerišanwe le bakgathatema ka moka, go akaretšwa le Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya Bašomi le Tlhabollo ya Bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: Futhi luqwashisa abantu abanokukhubazeka ukuthi bawazi amalungelo abo njengoba evikelwe nguMthethosisekelo.

src_text: Samiti ya Tsamaišo ya Naga le Pušetšo ya Naga Mafelong Dinagaborekwa.
tgt_text: Uhlaka luhlinzeka futhi ngokuqeqeshwa,  imibiko yabezindaba kanye nokuqwashisa emphakathini mayelana namalungelo abantu abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga Samiti ya Tsamaišo ya Naga le Pušetšo ya Naga  Mafelong Dinagaborekwa ka Labohlano, 27 le ka Mokibelo, 28 Mopitlo 2022 gola Gauteng.
tgt_text: Uhlaka luqalisa ukusebenza koMthetho Odingidwayo omayelana Nabantu Abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše Pego ya Maikemišetšo ka Tsamaišo ya Naga le Pušetšo ya Naga Mafelong Dinagaborekwa ka Hlakola.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ingelinye lamazwe asayina iSivumelwano seNhlangano Yezizwe (i-UN) esiqondene Namalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka kanye Nesivumelwano se-UN soMqulu wase-Afrika Wamalungelo Esintu kanye Namalungelo Abantu esiqondene Namalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka (Isivumelwano Samalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka base-Afrika).

src_text: Kabinete file tlhahlo ya gore ditherišano tša goya pele di swarwe gotee le bakgathatema ba maleba.
tgt_text: Uhlaka kwaboniswana ngalo nabo bonke ababambiqhaza abafanelekile, kubandakanya noMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wokuthuthukiswa Komnotho Nabasebenzi.

src_text: Samiti ye tla ba tatelano le pheletšo ya mošomo wo dirilwego ngwageng wa go feta, fao dikgopolo tša bakgathatema ba go fapafapana di tla akaretšwago     Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yezokuphathwa Komhlaba kanye Namalungelo Obunikazi Nokusetshenziswa Komhlaba Ezindaweni Lapho Abantu Besebenzisa Khona Umhlaba Ngokuhlanganyela.

src_text: Khonferense ya Bohlano ya Lefase ka Bophara ya Phedišo ya Tšhomišo ya Bana Bokgoba.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusingathwa kweNgqungquthela Yezokuphathwa Komhlaba kanye Namalungelo Obunikazi Nokusetshenziswa Komhlaba Ezindaweni Lapho Abantu Besebenzisa Khona Umhlaba Ngokuhlanganyela ngoLwesihlanu mhla zingama-27 kanye noMgqibelo mhla zingama-28 kuNhlaba 2022 e-Gauteng.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla swara Khonferense ya Bohlano ya Lefase ka Bophara ya Phedišo ya Tšhomišo ya Bana Bokgoba kua Sentharengkgoparara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Durban gola KwaZulu-Natal go thoma ka Lamorena, 15 go fihla ka Labohlano, 20 Mopitlo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lasemukela ngokusemthethweni ngoNdasa 2021 iSitatimende Esichaza Ngokucacileyo Umbono-simo Kahulumeni maqondana Nokuphathwa Komhlaba kanye Namalungelo Obunikazi Nokusetshenziswa Komhlaba Ezindaweni Lapho Abantu Besebenzisa Khona Umhlaba Ngokuhlanganyela.

src_text: Ke lekga la mathomothomo Mokgatlo wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Bašomi (ILO) swara khonferense ye ka mo Afrika..     Baetapele ba mebušo, ditona tše 120, baemedi ba seboka sa boraro ba dinaga tše 187 tše lego maloko ILO, dietšensi tša UN, ditheo tša thuto, mekgatlo yeo thomilwego setšhabeng, babegaditaba le mekgatlo setšhabeng go letetšwe gore be gona khonferenseng ye.
tgt_text: Liyalele ukuthi kubanjwe ezinye izigcawu zokubonisana nabo bonke ababambiqhaza abafanelekile.

src_text: Tiragalo ye tla fa Afrika Borwa monyetla wa go hlagiša Molaotheo wa naga ye ka ge šireletša ditokelo tša bana.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela izoba yisigcawu sokusonga nokuphothula umsebenzi osuwenziwe kusukela ngonyaka odlule kuze kube manje, lapho bekunxenxwa khona imibono evela kubabambiqhaza abahlukahlukene     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Naga ye tla kopana le dinaga tša go fapafapana tšeo di lego pejana ga rena go fedišwa tšhomišo ya bana bjalo ka makgoba le go ithuta go tšwa go bona..     Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Mmotlolo wa Tlhabollo ya Dilete (DDM).
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yesihlanu Yomhlaba Wonke Mayelana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla swara Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya DDM gola  Mpumalanga ka Labohlano, 20 Mopitlo 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Ga go tlogelwe motho morago”.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izosingatha iNgqungquthela Yesihlanu Yomhlaba Wonke Mayelana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane e-Durban International Convention Centre, KwaZulu-Natali, kusukela ngeSonto mhla ziyi-15 kuze kube nguLwesihlanu mhla zingama-20 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Bjalo ka sefala se bohlokwa sa kgathotema setšhabeng, Imbizo ye dumelela Mopresidente go kgokagana thwi le bakgathatema ba go fapafapana – kudukudu baduding ba dinagamagae – le go theeletša dillo le ditlhotlo tša bona ka nepo ya go di rarolla.
tgt_text: Kuzobe kungokokuqala ngqa ukuthi iNhlangano Yezabasebenzi Yamazwe Ngamazwe (i-ILO) isingathe le ngqungquthela ezwekazini lase-Afrika..     Izinhloko zemibuso, ongqongqoshe abayi-120, umbimbi olumkhakha-mithathu lwamazwe ayi-187 angamalungu e-ILO, izikhungo ze-UN, izikhungo zezemfundo, izinhlangano zezinhlaka zomphakathi wonkana, izinhlangano ezingekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni, abezindaba kanye namaqembu omphakathi kulindeleke ukuthi bayethamele le ngqungquthela.

src_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya DDM nepile gape le go tloša tseleng mapheko go šitiša kabo ya mohlakanelwa ya ditirelo le go hlohleletša kgathotema setšhabeng ka go tsamaišana le DDM.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela izonikeza futhi iNingizimu Afrika ithuba lokuveza nokubonakalisa uMthethosisekelo wezwe njengoba uwavikela amalungelo ezingane.

src_text: MaAfrika Borwa ba ka šala morago le go kgatha tema ditherišanong tša dikgokagano tša leago ka fase ga hashtag #PresidentialImbizo.
tgt_text: Leli lizwe lizoxhumana futhi libonisane namazwe ahlukahlukene asekhathule indima ebanzi kakhulu kuneyethu ekuqedeni ukusetshenziswa kwezingane futhi lifunde kulawo mazwe..     Imbizo kaMongameli eqondene Nohlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezifunda (i-DDM).

src_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa uzobamba Imbizo kaMongameli eqondene ne-DDM eMpumalanga ngoLwesihlanu mhla zingama-20 kuNhlaba 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Ungashiyi muntu ngemuva”.

src_text: Meketeko ya ngwaga ka ngwaga ya Kgwedi ya Afrika ka Laboraro, 25 Mopitlo gare ya ketekwa ka fase ga morero wo: “Ngwaga wa Phepho: Go tiišeletšwa phepho le tšhireletšego ya dijo kontinenteng ya Afrika”..     Bjalo ka karolo ya ponelopele ya lebaka le le telele yeo theilwego ka gare ga Lenaneothero la 2063 (leo lego seakanywa sa Afrika sa tlhabollo go fihlelela tlhabollo ye akaretšago le ya go tšea nako ye telele go hlabolla seemo sa ikonomi maphelong mo mengwageng ye 50 ye tlago), morero šeditše mabokgoni batho ba Afrika go lebeletšwe kudu basadi, batšwamahlalagading le bana.
tgt_text: Njengesigcawu esimqoka sokubamba iqhaza komphakathi, Imbizo izonikeza uMongameli ithuba lokuxhumana ngqo nababambiqhaza abahlukahlukene – ikakhulukazi imiphakathi yezindawo zasemakhaya – futhi uzolalela izinkinga nezinselele zabo ngenhloso yokuzixazulula.

src_text: Se se bohlokwa tlhabollong ka ge se tliša maphelo ao kaonafetšego go motho mang le mang, letseno leo le hlatlogetšego godimo le meputso yeo kaonafetšego ya dinaga.
tgt_text: Imbizo kaMongameli eqondene ne-DDM ihlose ukususa izithiyo ezivimbela ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingo-ngqangi ngendlela edidiyelwe futhi igqugquzele ukubamba iqhaza komphakathi ngokuhambisana ne-DDM.

src_text: Tiragalo ya go itshwanetša le noši ya meketeko ya Kgwedi ya Afrika ke Beke ya Afrika ya Dikgokagano, yeo tlo swarelwago kua Constitutional Hill gola Johannesburg go thoma ka la 23 go fihla ka la 27 Mopitlo.
tgt_text: Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bangakulandela okuqhubekayo ezingxoxweni futhi babambe iqhaza kuzona ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngaphansi kwe-hashtag ethi #PresidentialImbizo.
Inyanga ye-Afrika.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika ke monyetla wa go hlohleletša botee bja Afrika le momaganyo ye tseneletšego ya dilete tša yona, le go ikgafa ka leswa katlegong ye swanago ya Afrika.
tgt_text: Umbungazo waminyaka yonke weNyanga ye-Afrika kanye noSuku lwe-Afrika oluzoba ngoLwesithathu mhla zingama-25 kuNhlaba uzogujwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Unyaka Wokudla Okunomsoco: Siqinisa ikhono namandla okuzibamba ziqine ekuhlinzekeni ukudla okunomsoco kanye nokuqinisekisa ukutholakala kokudla okwanele ezwekazini lase-Afrika”.

src_text: Kabinete gopotša motho mang le mang gore kgahlego ya rena ya bosetšhaba ke monwana le lenala le tielelo ya Afrika, botee le katlego     Melaetša.
tgt_text: Njengengxenye yenhloso-mbono yesikhathi eside ebekwe ngokucacileyo ku-Ajenda 2063 (ewumhlahlandlela wokuthuthukiswa kwe-Afrika ukuze izuze intutuko yenhlalo-mnotho ebandakanyayo futhi esimeme eminyakeni engama-50), isiqubulo sigxile kulokho abantu base-Afrika abangaba namandla okukufezekisa, ngokugcizelela ikakhulukazi kubantu besifazane, amabhungu namatshitshi kanye nezingane.

src_text: Mahloko     Kabinetee lebiša mahloko yona go malapa le bagwera ba: Mme Phindile Xaba (53), yo bilego le mošomo wo motelele wa go hlomphega intastering ya babegaditaba, ka mo Afrika Borwa le ka mošate šomile bošego le mosegare go kaonafatša naga ya gaborena.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuyinto esemqoka kakhulu ekuletheni intuthuko njengoba kuholela ekutheni abantu baphile impilo engcono futhi amazwe nawo athole ingenisomali ephakeme futhi engcono.

src_text: Motseta Silumko Sokupa (74), yo hlanketšego Etšensi ya Tšhireletšego ya Mmušo maemong go fapafapana mo mošomong wa gagwe wa go tšea nako ye telele le wa go hlomphega Ditirelong tša Mmušo.Moprofesara Francis Wilson (83), raikonomi wa go tsebega kudu le mothomi wa Yuniti ya Bašomi ya Borwa bja Afrika le ya Tlhabollo ya Dinyakišišo     Bao ba Thwetšwego Mešomong Batho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona dithuto tlo netefatšwa le go tiišeletšwa ka tsela ye maleba.
tgt_text: Umcimbi ophawulekayo nogqamile kule migubho yeNyanga ye-Afrika nguMcimbi WeViki Lezokuxhumana lase-Afrika, ozobanjelwa e-Constitutional Hill eGoli kusukela mhla zingama-23 kuze kube ngumhla zingama-27 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Ngaka Kesavan Naidoo bjalo ka Motlatša Molaodipharephare (DDG): Tlhabollo ya Setheo kua Kgorong ya Tirišano ya Makala Mmušo (DCoG).

Ntate Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomuka bjalo ka DDG: Thekgo ya Pušoselegae le Taolo ya Magato kua DCoG..     Ntate Risimati Patrick Mathye bjalo ka DDG: Taolo ya Ditirelo tša Meetse le Tlhwekišo kua Kgorong ya Meetse le Tlhwekišo (DWS)..     Ntate Collin Xolani Zwane bjalo ka DDG: Taolo, Kobamelo le Phethagatšo kua DWS.
tgt_text: Inyanga ye-Afrika iyithuba lokugqugquzela ubunye nobumbano e-Afrika kanye nokudidiyelwa kwesifunda ngokujulile, kanye nokubophezela i-Afrika kabusha ekushabashekeleni impokophelo efanayo.

src_text: Ntate Melanchton Makobe bjalo ka DDG: Kgonthišišo ya Pušo ya SOC le Bodiragatši kua Kgorong ya Dikgwebo tša Mmušo     Kabinete dumelelane le Ditona ka dithwalo tšeo di latelago:.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likhumbuza wonke umuntu ukuthi izidingo nezintshisekelo zethu njengezwe zixhumene kakhulu nozinzo, ubumbano kanye nokuphumelela kwe-Afrika     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Ntate Bhekuyise Mathews Khenisa bjalo ka Mohlankediphethišimogolwane (CEO) wa Etšensi ya Tlhabollo ya Dintlo (HDA).
tgt_text: Amazwi enduduzo IKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi enduduzo emindenini nabangani balaba abalandelayo: UNks Phindile Xaba (53), osebenze embonini yabezindaba isikhathi eside futhi lapho ezuze khona impumelelo enkulu, lapha ekhaya eNingizimu Afrika ngokunjalo futhi nasemazweni angaphandle.

src_text: Mme Joy Keledi Masemola bjalo ka Mohlankedimogolwane wa Ditšhelete (COO) wa HAD.
tgt_text: Usebenze ngokuzikhandla okukhulu ukwenza ngcono izwe lethu.

src_text: Ngaka Cornelius Ruiters bjalo ka CEO ya Lepelle Northern Water.
tgt_text: Inxusa uSilumko Sokupa (74), osebenzele uPhiko Lwezokuvikeleka Kombuso isikhathi eside futhi lapho enze khona umsebenzi oncomekayo impela ezikhundleni ezahlukahlukene aziphathile emkhakheni Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni.USlz Francis Wilson (83), owabe eyisazi sezomnotho esihlonishwayo futhi engumsunguli wophiko lwezocwaningo i-Southern Africa Labour and Development Research Unit     Abaqashiwe Bonke abaqashiwe kumele kuqinisekiswe iziqu zabo futhi bahlolwe ngokufanele.

src_text: Matsapa go Boetša Seemo Sekeng le go Aga ka Leswa Morago ga Mafula.
tgt_text: Imizamo yokutakula nokukhuculula kanye nokwakha kabusha ngemuva kokuhlasela kwezikhukhula.

src_text: Kabinete retile le go thabela batho ka moka le mekgatlo ge tsentšhitše letsogo mo matsapeng go boetša seemo sekeng le go aga ka leswa morago ga mafula moragorago go setla pelo dikarolong tše dingwe tša naga, kudukudu gola KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izwakalise amazwi ayo okutusa kanye nokubonga kubo bonke abantu kanye nezinhlangano ezibandakanyekayo emizamweni yokutakula nokukhuculula kanye nokwakha kabusha kulandela ukuhlasela kwezikhukhula ezishiye kukhalwa kwezinye izingxenye zezwe, ikakhulukazi KwaZulu-Natali.

src_text: Kabinete lebogile gape le mekgatlo ye sego ya mmušo, mekgatlo ya sedumedi, setšhaba ka kakaretšo, bengdikgwebo le mekgatlo ya go imolla batho maima bona yeo abetšego batho dijo, diaparo, mapai, diphuthelwana tša mengatana ya lehlapo, diyunifomo tša dikolo go malapa ao wetšwego ke masetlapelo gore ba kgone go fihlelela dinyakwa tša bona tša motheo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibonge zonke izinhlangano ezingekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni, izinhlangano zamabandla ezenkolo, imiphakathi, osomabhizinisi kanye nezinhlangano zosizo ezihlinzeke ngokudla, izingubo zokugqoka, izingubo zokulala, izinsiza/izimpahla zokubuyisa isithunzi kanye nemifaniswano yesikole emindenini ehlwempu ukuze ikwazi ukuhlangabezana nezidingongqangi zayo.

src_text: Senthara ya Bosetšhaba ya Taolo ya Masetlapelo tla kopantšha didiko ka moka tša mmušo mo matsapeng yona go fana ka kimollo ya moya wa botho malapeng ka moka ao amilwego ke mafula.
tgt_text: Isikhungo Sikazwelonke Sokuphathwa Kwenhlekelele siyaqhubeka nokudidiyela zonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni emizamweni yaso yokuhlinzeka ngezinsiza ezikhombisa isihe nobubele kubantu kuyona yonke imizi ekhahlamezekile.

src_text: Ditirelo tša go abela batho madulo di gare di abelwa batho ba go feta 7 000 mo dileteng tšeo di amilwego go se lekane le selo gola KwaZulu-Natal..     Mošomo šetše thomile go aga madulo lebakanyana malapa go angwa ke mafula mo nageng ye lego ya mmušo ye hlaotšwego gola KwaZulu-Natal ka kgonagalo ya gore malapa a ka šuthišetšwa fao.
tgt_text: Izinsizakalo zokukhoselisa abantu zihlinzekiwe kubantu abangaphezu kwezi-7 000 kwizifunda okuyizona ezikhahlamezeke kakhulu KwaZulu-Natali..     Umsebenzi usuqalile maqondana nokwakhiwa kwezindawo zokuhlala zesikhashana zemindeni ekhahlamezekile ezindaweni zokwakha eziphethwe nguhulumeni ezihlonzwe KwaZulu-Natali ukuze abantu bakwazi ukuthuthelwa kuzona beyohlaliswa kabusha.

src_text: Kabinete tiišeleditše maikgafo mmušo go laola dikhwama tša kimollo ya masetlapelo ka šedi ye kgolo le ka go se fihle selo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuqinisekisile ukuzibophezela kukahulumeni ekuphatheni izimali zokusiza nokutakula abakhahlanyezwe yizikhukhula ngobuhlakani nobuyoninco kanjalo nokusebenzela obala.

src_text: Mohlakišipharephare wa Afrika Borwa fana ka ditirelo tša tlaleletšo tša go bea seemo leihlo le go lebiša dikhwama dinyakweng tše dingwe ka go tsamaišana le peakanyo ya tekanyetšo ya mmušo.
tgt_text: UMcwaningimabhuku Jikelele waseNingizimu Afrika uhlinzeka ngensizakalo yokuqapha ngeso lokhozi eyengeziwe futhi ukubekwa kabusha eqhulwini kwezimali kuyahambelana nohlelo lukahulumeni lokwabiwa kwezimali..     Ezakamuva ngeSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Tsebišo ya Seemo sa Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inxuse bonke abantu abaseNingizimu Afrika ukuba bathathe izinyathelo zokuzivikela ukuze kunqandwe ukusabalala kwe-COVID-19 ngemuva kokuba izibalo zakamuva nje zibonise ukwenyuka okukhulu esilinganisweni sokuthelelana ngesifo kanye nokugula okuhlobene nesikhathi sasebusika lapha ezweni..     IKhabhinethi ikhumbuze bonke abantu ukuba baqhubeke nokuzigada bona uqobo kanye nabanye abantu ngokuhlanza njalo izandla noma ukusebenzisa isibulali-magciwane ezandleni zethu, ukugqoka isifonyo uma usendaweni evalelekile, ukugcina ibanga lokuqhelelana eliphephile, ukuvula amawindi ukuze kungene umoya kanye nokugoma..     Ukugoma kusalokhu kungukuzivikela okungungqa-phambili ukulwisana ne-COVID-19 njengoba kuvimbela ukugula okubi kakhulu, ukulaliswa esibhedlela ngisho nokufa imbala.

src_text: Kabinete hlohleleditše batho ka moka mo Afrika Afrika go tšea magato tlhokomelo go efoga go phatlalala ga COVID-19 morago ga gore dipalopalo tša moragorago di laetše tlhatlogo ye bonagalago ya kelo ya diphetelo le malwetši go amana le sehla sa marega ka mo nageng..     Kabinete re gopoditše ka moka ga rena go tšwelapele go ihlokomela le go hlokomela ba bangwe ka go hlapa matsogo rena goba go sanithaesa kgafetšakgafetša, go apara dimaseke ge re le ka gare ga meago, go šielana sekgala sa go bolokega, go bula mafastere gore go hlabele moya le go hlaba meento.
tgt_text: Awudingi ukuthi ube nekheli lasekhaya ukuze ugome.

src_text: Meento santše le boiphemelo bjo bo kaonekaone kgahlanong le COVID-19 ka ge thibela malwetši šoro, go amogelwa maokelong le go efoga mahu go hlolwa ke COVID-.
tgt_text: Noma ubani, onomazisi noma ongenawo umazisi, angagoma mahhala kuzona zonke izikhungo zokugoma zikahulumeni ezweni lonkana.

src_text: Ga go hlokege aterese ya mo dulago pele ka entelwa.
tgt_text: Nqanda ukucwasana ngokwebala!.

src_text: Motho mang le mang, wa go ba le pasa goba sena yona ka hlaba moento ntle le tefo mafelong bohle go hlaba meento go potologa naga ka bophara.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izihlaba zonke izenzo zokucwasa ngokwebala ezweni, kubandakanya nezigameko ezibikiwe esikoleni i-Good Hope Seminary High School kanye naseNyuvesi yase-Stellenbosch eNtshonalanga Kapa.

src_text: Semorafe se fele!.
tgt_text: Lezi zenzo ezithunazayo zilwisana namagugu esawathola ngokomthethosisekelo nokuyiwona esathola ngawo izwe lethu elibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, abandakanya ukuhloniswa kwesithunzi somuntu, ukungacwasani ngokwebala, ukungacwasani ngokobulili, ubulungiswa bezenhlalakahle, ukulingana kanye nenhlonipho..     UMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika we-1996 ungumhlahlandlela wethu esiwusebenzisayo maqondana nokuqeda ukuhlukana okwenyanyekayo kanye nokungabikhona kobulungiswa kwesikhathi esedlule.

src_text: Kabinete sotše ka bogale ditiragalo ka moka tša semorafe ka mo nageng, go akaretšwa le ditiragalo tšeo di begilwego Sekolong seo se Phagamego sa Good Hope Seminary le Yunibesithing ya Stellenbosch gola Kapa Bodikela.
tgt_text: Abazali bayanxuswa ukuba bafundise izingane ukuba zikwenqabe ukucwasana ngokwebala kodwa zamukele ukubumbana yize sihlukahlukene, njengengxenye yomkhankaso wethu oqinile wokukhuthaza ukwakhiwa kwesizwe kanye nokubumbana komphakathi.

src_text: Ditiragalo tše tša mahlabišadihlong di thulana le metheo ya Molaotheo yeo naga ya rena ya temokrasi ithekgilego ka yona, yeo akaretšago seriti sa botho, go se kgetholle ka semorafe, go se kgetholle ka bong, tekatekano le tlhomphano..     Molaotheo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa 1996 ke ona re hlahlago gore re fediše ditiragalo tšeo di tšwago kua morago tša go se hlamatsege tšeo di dirago gore re se be ngatana ye tee le tšeo di abelanago ka toka ka go se swane.
tgt_text: Asisebenzisaneni ukuze siveze obala ukucwasana ngokwebala noma yikuphi lapho kuthathwa khona njengosikompilo futhi sithumele umyalezo ocacile wokuthi asinayo indawo yokucwasana ngokwebala ezweni lethu elibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu..     Ubudlelwano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika – kanye neJalimane.

src_text: Batswadi ba hlohleletšwa go ruta bana go ganetša semorafe le go thabela ditšo tša go fapafapana, bjalo ka karolo ya lesolo la rena la mohlakanelwa la go hlohleletša kago ya setšhaba le phedišano setšhabeng re šomeng mmogo go bea nyanyeng semorafe nako le nako ge se se thoma go ba setlwaedi sa ka mehla le go romela molaetša wo bogale wa gore semorafe ga sena bodulo ka mo nageng ya gaborena ya temokrasi..     Dikamano tša Afrika Borwa le Germany.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamukelile Uhambo Olusemthethweni olube yimpumelelo lukaShansela weRiphabhulikhi Yamazwe aseJalimane (i-Federal Republic of Germany), uMhlonishwa u-Olaf Scholz, ehambele lapha eNingizimu Afrika ngoLwesibili, mhla zingama-24 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše ketelo ye atlegilego ya semmušo ka Mokhanseliri wa Rephabliki ya Germany, Mohlomphegimogolo Olaf Scholz, go tla ka mo Afrika Borwa ka Labobedi, 24 Mopitlo.

tgt_text: Uhambo Olusemthethweni lukaShansela u-Scholz lwenziwe ngesimemo sikaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa, okunguyena ohola umkhankaso kahulumeni wokuqinisa amaxhama obudlelwano obuhle nezifunda kanye namazwe omhlaba, kanye nokuheha utshalomali oludingeka kakhulu.

src_text: Ketelo ye ya Semmušo ka Mokhanseliri Scholz ebile gona ka baka la taletšo ya go tšwa go Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa yo eteletšego pele seboka sa go kgontšha dikamano tše botse tša dilete le tša boditšhabatšhaba, gotee le go goka dipeeletšo tšeo di hlokagalago kudu.
tgt_text: Laba baholi ababili badingide, phakathi kokunye, izindlela zokuthuthukisa ukusebenzisana emikhakheni enjengamandla kagesi kanye nokushintsha kwesimo sezulu, ukuhwebelana kanye notshalomali, kanye nokusabela kwi-COVID-19 kanye nesidingo esikhulu somgomo.

src_text: Baetapele ba bababedi ba boletše ka, magareng ga tše dingwe, mekgwa ya go thoma tirišano magorong go swana le enetši le phetogo ya klaemete, kgwebišano le dipeeletšo, le magato kgahlanong le COVID-19 le nyakego ya meento.
tgt_text: Baphinde badlinza kabanzi ngentuthuko ekhona ezwenikazi lase-Afrika kanye nasemazweni omhlaba, kubandakanya nengxabano ese-Ukraine kanye nemithelela yayo eminothweni yamazwe omhlaba kanjalo nokutholakala kokudla kanye namandla kagesi okwanele..     IJalimane ayiyena nje kuphela umlingani wesibili ngobukhulu wokuhwebelana neNingizimu Afrika, kodwa iphinde ibe yisizinda sesithathu esikhulukazi sabavakashi baphesheya kwezilwandle, umtshalimali omkhulu kakhulu kanye nomlingani kwezentuthuko..     Ingqungquthela Yesihlanu Yamazwe Omhlaba Wonke maqondana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane.

src_text: Baetapele ba ba ile ba lebeledišiša kgatelopele ye lego gona kontinenteng ya Afrika le maemong boditšhatšhaba, go akaretšwa le dithulano nageng ya Ukraine le ditlamorago tša gona go lebeletšwe ikonomi ya boditšhatšhaba le tšhireletšego ya dijo le ya enetši..     Germany se fela mogwebišani wa bobedi wo mogologolo wa Afrika Borwa, eupša ke gape mothopo wa boraro wo mogologolo wa baeti ba moše mmeeletši wo mogolo le mogwebišani go tša tlhabollo..     Khonferense ya Bohlano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Phedišo ya Tšhomišo ya Bana Bokgoba.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukelile ukusongwa ngempumelelo kweNgqungquthela Yesihlanu Yamazwe Omhlaba Wonke maqondana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane ebibanjelwe eThekwini kusukela mhla ziyi-15 kuya kumhla zingama-20 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše thumo ye atlegilego ya Khonferense ya Bohlano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Phedišo ya Tšhomišo ya Bana Bokgoba yeo bego swaretšwe gola Durban go thoma ka la 15 go fihla ka la 20 Mopitlo.
tgt_text: Ababambiqhaza abavela emhlabeni wonkana bebehambele le ngqungquthela, ebibanjwe ngokubambisana neNhlangano Yabasebenzi Yamazwe Omhlaba..     Ngemuva kokudingida imikhuba emihle yokusebenza eqaliswe ukusetshenziswa amazwe ahlukahlukene kanye nokuhlonza amagebe kanye nezinyathelo ezisheshayo ezidingekayo ukuze kusheshiswe ukuqedwa kwakho kokubili ukusetshenziswa kwezingane kanye nokusebenza ngempoqo, babe sebamukela isiqubulo esithi ‘Durban Call to Action’ ukuze kubhekwane nalesi sihlava esesiyinsakavukela sokusetshenziswa kwezingane.

src_text: Bakgathatema go tšwa lefaseng ka bophara ba bile gona khonferenseng ye, yeo bego swerwe ka tšhomišano le Mokgatlo wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Bašomi..     Morago ga go rerišana ka ditlwaedi tše botse tše phethagaditšwego ke dinaga tša go fapafapana le go hlaola mabošaedi le magato ka pelapela ao nyakegago go akgofiša phedišo ya bobedi tšhomišo ya bana bokgoba le ya dikgoka, bakgathatema khonfereseng ye ba kwanetše morero wo ‘Boipiletšo bja Durban bja go Tšea Magato’ go swaragana le lemena la tšhomišo ya bana bokgoba.
tgt_text: Ukusetshenziswa kwezingane kumele umphakathi omubi kakhulu futhi kuvulela izingane ezimweni eziyingozi.

src_text: Tšhomišo ya bana bokgoba ke ye nngwe ya go laetša bohlogo bjo bo ka dirwago ke setšhaba ebile išeletša bana maemong kotsi.
tgt_text: Kuhambelana nokuhlukumeza futhi kuvimbela izingane ukuba zithole imfundo kanye namanye amathuba okuzithuthukisa.

src_text: Tšhomišo ya bana bokgoba ka boyona ke tlaišo ebile thibela bana go hwetša thuto ye maleba le menyetla ye mengwe ya go ba hlabolla.
tgt_text: Yonke ingane eNingizimu Afrika inelungelo elingenakuphikwa lokuvikelwa emikhubeni yokusetshenziswa ngokuxhashazwa.

src_text: Ngwana wo mongwe le wo mongwe ka mo Afrika Borwa nale tokelo yeo ka se ganetšwego ke motho ya gore šireletšege kgahlanong le ditlwaedi tša go jabetša tša go šomišwa bokgoba.

Tokelo ya go hwetša thuto ya motheo gona ka gare ga Molaotheo wa rena ebile goya le ka Molao wa Dikolo wa Afrika Borwa, 1996 (Molao 84 wa 1996), “motswadi mang le mang swanetše go gapeletša morutwana ofe goba ofe yo lego ka fase ga taolo ya gagwe go ya sekolong go tloga ka letšatši la mathomothomo la go bulwa ga dikolo ngwageng wo go fihlela ge morutwana wo fihlelela mengwaga ye šupa goba mphato wa bosenyane, goya le ka gore go tlile efe pele”..     Goya ka Molao wa Bana, 2005 (Molao 38 wa 2005), “ga gona motho yo dumeletšwego go šomiša, go bapatša, go nea goba go thwala ngwana goba go mo diriša mo mešomong bjalo ka mo mešomong ya tšhomišo ya bana bokgoba”     Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: Ilungelo lokuthola imfundo eyisisekelo libhaliwe kuMthethosisekelo wethu futhi ngokoMthetho Wezikole ZaseNingizimu Afrika, we-1996 (uMthetho wama-84 we-1996), “wonke umzali kufanele enze ukuthi wonke umfundi anesibopho phezu kwakhe aye esikoleni kusukela ngosuku lokuqala lwesikole lonyaka nokufanele lowo mfundi abe neminyaka eyisikhombisa kuze kube wusuku lokugcina lesikole lonyaka nokuyilapho lowo mfundi eyobe eseneminyaka eyi-15 ubudala noma esefunda iBanga lesishiyagalolunye, noma yikuphi okufika kuqala”..     NgokoMthetho Wezingane, wezi-2005 (uMthetho wama-38 wezi-2005), “akekho umuntu ongasebenzisa, athenge noma aqashe ingane enzela ukusetshenziswa kwezingane”     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kwanelo ya Kwano ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka go Šireletšwa ga Batho ka Moka Kgahlanong le go Nyameletšwa ka Dikgoka ke Maphodisa (ICPPED).
tgt_text: Ukungena Esivumelwaneni Samazwe Omhlaba Sokuvikelwa Kwabo Bonke Abantu Ekunyamalaleni Ngempoqo (i-ICPPED) .

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo ya ICPPED Palamenteng go lebeledišišwa le go dumelelwa go šomišwa ga kwano ye ke Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukwethulwa kwe-ICPPED ePhalamende ukuze kucutshungulwe ukungena kweNingizimu Afrika esivumelwaneni.

src_text: Kwano ye ke tumelelano yeo tlemago gohlegohle ya Ditšhabakopano (UN) yeo swaraganego le go gatakwa ga ditokelo tša botho ka go nyameletšwa ga batho ka dikgoka ke maphodisa..     Kwano ye hlaloša go nyameletšwa ga batho ka dikgoka ke maphodisa go akaretša go tšhabišwa, go golegwa, go swarwa goba mokgwa ofe goba ofe wo pheletšo ya ona ka dirago gore mosolwa latole go dumela goba gona go uta fao motšwasehlabelo lego gona..     Ge šetše dumetše gore kwano ye tsenywe melaong ya rena ya ka mo nageng, Afrika Borwa go tla letelwa gore begele UN mengwaga ye mengwe le ye mengwe ye mebedi ka fao phethagatšago seo se dumeletšwego kwanong ye.
tgt_text: Le sivumelwano siyisibopho emhlabeni wonke jikelele seNhlangano Yezizwe Ezihlangene (i-UN) esibhekana nokwephulwa kwamalungelo abantu ngokunyamalaliswa kwabantu ngempoqo..     Isivumelwano sichaza ukunyamalaliswa ngempoqo ukuthi kubandakanye ukuthunjwa, ukuboshwa, ukuvalelwa noma yiluphi uhlobo okungaholela ekutheni umenzi wobubi anqabe ukuvuma noma afihle imbala lapho kukhona khona umgilwa..     Uma sesamukelwe ukuba sifakwe emithethweni yethu, iNingizimu Afrika kuzolindeleka ukuba ibike njalo ngemuva kweminyaka emibili kwi-UN mayelana nokuthi isisebenzisa kanjani isivumelwane lesi.

src_text: Kwano ye fana ka magato thibelo ao dinaga tšeo di lego maloko kwano ye di swanetšego go hloma go efoga go nyameletšwa ga batho ka dikgoka ke maphodisa dinageng tša bona tša go fapafapana..     Pego ya Bone ya Naga ya Afrika Borwa ka Tšhireletšo le Tlhohleletšo ya Ditokelo tša Botho.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano sihlinzeka ngezinyathelo zokuvikeleka okumele amazwe angamalungu aso azisebenzise ukuvimbela ukunyamalaliswa ngempoqo kwabantu emazweni awo ngokwehlukana kwawo..     Umbiko Wezwe wesine weNingizimu Afrika maqondana Nokuvikelwa kanye Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Abantu.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo ya Pego ya Bone ya Naga ye ka Tšhireletšo le Tlhohleletšo ya Ditokelo tša Botho go Khansele ya Ditokelo tša Botho ya Ditšhabakopano.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukwethulwa koMbiko Wezwe wesine maqondana Nokuvikelwa kanye Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Abantu eMkhandlwini Wamalungelo Abantu Wenhlangano Yezizwe Ezinhlangene.

src_text: Bafetleki ba UN ba Gohlegohle le ba Kgafetšakgafetša ba tla fetleka pego ye ge ngwaga ela go fela.
tgt_text: Ithimba le-UN Lokubuyekezwa Komhlaba Jikelele Ngezikhathi Ezithile elibizwa ngokuthi yi-UN Universal Periodic Review lizowubuyekeza umbiko ekuhambeni kwesikhathi kulo nyaka.

src_text: Go tloga mola bago naga ye kwanetšego ya Kwano ya UN ya Ditokelo tša Botho, Afrika Borwa sekasekilwe makga mararo, ebile tshekatsheko ya mafelelo dirilwe ka Lewedi..     Pego ye fana ka seemo sa ditšhišinyo tše 187 tše amogetšwego go tšwa tshepetšong ya diphetleko tša ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Selokhu yaqala ukuba ngelinye lamazwe asayinayo kwiSivumelwano se-UN Samalungelo Abantu, iNingizimu Afrika isibuyekezwe amahlandla amathathu, nalapho ubuyekezo lokugcina lwenziwa ngoMandulo wezi-..     Umbiko uhlinzeka ngokwazisa kwakamuva maqondana nezincomo eziyi-187 ezavunywayo ohlelweni lokubuyekezwa lowezi-.

src_text: Dikgopolo di hweditšwe go tšwa go tshedimošo yeo kgonthišišitšwego, tshedimošo go tšwa go dikgoro tše maleba, Ditheo tša go Thekga Molaotheo le mekgatlo ye maleba ya go tšwa setšhabeng..     Kabinete thabišitšwe ke kgatelopele ye fihleletšwego phethagatšong ya ditšhišinyo tše le fao mošomo sa tšwelago pele gona.
tgt_text: Ukuphawula nezincomo kwathathwa kwimininingo eqinisekisiwe, ulwazi oluvela eminyangweni efanelekile, izikhungo ezasungulwa ngaphansi kweSahluko sesi-9 soMthethosisekelo kanye nezinhlangano zomphakathi ezifanelekile..     IKhabhinethi ijabule kakhulu ngenqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe ukuqalisa ukusetshenziswa kwezincomo kanye nangalezo zindawo ezisasetshenzwa.

src_text: Pego ye tla dirwa phatlalatša morago ga ge hlagišeditšwe UN ka Phato.
tgt_text: Umbiko uzotholakala emphakathini uma usuwethuliwe kwi-UN ngoNcwaba wezi-.

src_text: Pholisi ya  2022 ya Taolo ya Meetse Meepo.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo Yokuphathwa Kwamanzi Asezimayini yowezi-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Pholisi ya 2022 ya Taolo ya Meetse Meepo gore phethagatšwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze inqubomgomo Yokuphathwa Kwamanzi Asezimayini yowezi-2022 ukuba iqaliswe ukusebenza.

src_text: Pholisi ye fana ka mekgwa le magato go šireletša le go babalela tšhomišo ya meetse.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo ihlinzeka ngezindlela zokuvikela kanye nokulondoloza ukusetshenziswa kwamanzi.

src_text: Yona lekalekanya ditiragalo tša ikonomi tša meepo ka taelo ya go kgontšha tšhomišo ye swarelelago ya meetse ka mo nageng ya gaborena.
tgt_text: Yenza kube khona ukuhambelana phakathi kwemisebenzi yezomnotho eyenziwa ezimayini kanye nesibopho sokuhlinzeka ngokusetshenziswa kwamanzi okusimeme ezweni.

src_text: Godimo ga magato mangwe, pholisi ye hlatholla mehola le maikarabelo ka gare ga didiko tše tharo tša mmušo mabapi le merero ya go amana le meetse ka meepong.
tgt_text: Phakathi kokunye ukungenelela, inqubomgomo icacisa ngemisebenzi kanye nezibopho ezikhona ezinhlakeni zontathu zikahulumeni mayelana nezindaba zamanzi asezimayini.

src_text: Diphetogo tšeo di šišintšwego di tla rarolla ditlhotlo tša go thoma go hloma melao ya go iletša bao ba hlolago tšhilafalo le go dira gore go be moroba go gapeletša molawana wa gore mang le mang yo hlolago tšhilafalo rwešwe maikarabelo go phošolla goba go bušetša morago.
tgt_text: Izinguquko ezihlongozwayo zizoxazulula izingqinamba zokufakwa konswinyo kulabo abangcolisa imvelo futhi zizokwenza kube lula ukunxenxela ukusetshenziswa komgomo wokuthi lowo ongcolisile akhokhe.

src_text: Pholisi ye hlamilwe ka go tsamaišana le Molao wa Bosetšhaba wa Meetse, 1998 (Molao 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo isungulwe ngokuhambelana noMthetho Kazwelonke Wamanzi, we-1998 (uMthetho wama-36 we-1998).

src_text: Pego ka Tlhako ya Thulaganyo ye Hlamilwego goya ka Bong, Bolekanyetši, Phetleko ya Mošomo le Botlhakiši.
tgt_text: Umbiko mayelana Nohlakakusebenza oluqondene Nokuhlela Okusabelayo Ezindabeni Zobulili, Ukwabiwa Kwezimali, Ukuhlolwa Kokuqapha kanye Nokucwaningwa Kwamabhuku.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše pego ya mošomo wo dirilwego godimo ga phethagatšo ya Tlhako ya Thulaganyo ye Hlamilwego goya ka Bong, Bolekanyetši, Phetleko ya Mošomo le Botlhakiši.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele umbiko wenqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe maqondana nokuqalisa ukusebenza koHlakakusebenza oluqondene Nokuhlela Okusabelayo Ezindabeni Zobulili, Ukwabiwa Kwezimali, Ukuhlolwa Kokuqapha kanye Nokucwaningwa Kwamabhuku.

src_text: Kabinete thabetše kgatelopele ye kgolo ye fihleletšwego ke bontši bja dikgoro tša mmušo go hloma ditheong tša tšona tlhako ye yeo sale amogelwa ka 2019 gore phethagatšwe..     Ga sale go tloga fao, dikgoro tše ntši di thomile go hloma dinyakwa tše bohlokwa tša pholisi ye go hlahla mananeo thupetšo ao nepišitšwego basading, go baswa le bathong ba go phela ka bogolofadi.
Kabinete dirile gape le boipiletšo bja tekolo ya mošomo le dipego tše tiišeleditšwego letsogo, kudukudu go tše dingwe tša dikgoro tšeo go fihla gabjale di sa kago tša fa dipego.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyincomile inqubekelaphambili enkulu eyenziwe iningi leminyango kahulumeni ekufakeni ezinhlelweni zayo uhlakakusebenza olwamukelwa ngowezi-2019 ukuze luqale ukusebenza.

src_text: Dipoledišano tša Baswa go Hlompha Nelson Mandela (NMYD).
Kabinete dumeletše NMYD go kgatlampana ngwaga ka ngwaga go thoma ka.
tgt_text: Iminyango eminingi isiqalise ukusebenza izinto eziseqhulwini zenqubomgomo ezizoqondisa izinhlelo zokuhlukaniswa ngemikhakha ezisophe abantu besifazane, intsha kanye nabantu abaphila nokukhubazeka.

src_text: NMYD ya pulamadibogo tla swarwa go thoma ka la 7 go fihla ka la 20 Mosegamanye.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isinxuse ukuba kube khona ukuqapha okuqinile kanye nokubika, ikakhulukazi kule eminye iminyango ebingakaqali ukubika.

src_text: Le ke lesolo la Mopresidente go nea baswa ba Kontinente ye monyetla wa go tsenela dipoledišano tše di ba agago mererong ye ba amago kudu..     Dipoledišano tše, tšeo di tla bego di bolela ka senatla sa rena sa boditšhabatšhaba bago Mopresidente wa Maloba Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – di tla thoma ka dipoledišano tše ka maikemišetšo go ruta batho ka go itlwaetša boetapele bja  potego mo Afrika.
tgt_text: Inkulumo-mpendulwano Yentsha ka-Nelson Mandela (i-NMYD).

src_text: Dipoledišano tše di tla nea baswa monyetla wa go nyetlela ba bangwe ka bohwa bjo humilego bja ditšo tša bona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba i-NMYD yenzeke njalo ngonyaka kusuka ngowezi-.

src_text: Lesolo le le tla tiišeletša le dikamano tša magareng ga batho go lebeletšwe baswa ba kontinente ye.
tgt_text: I-NMYD yokuqala ngqa izobanjwa kusukela mhla ziyi-7 kuya mhla zingama-20 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Kgoro ya Basadi, Baswa le Batho ba go Phela ka Bogolofadi tla fana ka dintlha ka botlalo tša lenaneo le ditiragalo tšeo di tla bago gona ka moragonyana.
tgt_text: Lolu uhlelo oluphethwe yihhovisi likaMongameli elinikeza intsha yaseZwenikazi lethu inkundla yokuxoxisana ngezinkulumo-mpendulwano ezakhayo maqondana nezinkinga ebhekene nazo.

src_text: Pego ya 2021/22 ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya go Bewa Leihlo ga Bodiragatši ka Matlafatšo ya Basadi le Tekatekano ya Bong, Tlhabollo ya Baswa le Tlhohleletšo ya Ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka Bogolofadi.
Kabinete amogetše pego ya ngwaga ka ngwaga ya go bewa leihlo ga bodiragatši go lebeletšwe pego ya 2021/22 ya go matlafatšwa ga basadi, baswa le batho ba go phela ka bogolofadi.
tgt_text: Izinkulumo-mpendulwano – isisekelo sazo sizoba ngaphansi kwegama lengqalabutho yethu eyaziwa umhlaba wonke nowayenguMongameli waphambilini u-Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – zizoqala izingxoxo ezizogxilisa usiko lobuholi obuqotho e-Afrika.

src_text: Pego ye latišiša mohlala wa ditaetšo tše bohlokwa tša tlhohleletšo ya tekatekano, maemo mešomo, taolo le go kgatha tema ga dihlopha tše tša batho ka gare ga ditiragalo tša dikgoro le makalakgwebo go laolwa ke mmušo.
tgt_text: Zizonikeza abantu abasha ithuba lokwabelana ngamagugu amasiko abo anothile.

src_text: Pego ye ngwadilwe ka go bapetšwa le tlhako ya bolekanyetši bjo bo hlamilwego goya ka bong, phetleko ya mošomo le botlhakiši yeo amogetšwego ke Kabinete ka     Melaokakanywa.
tgt_text: Lolu hlelo luzophinda luqinise ubudlelwano kumuntu nomuntu phakathi kwentsha yasezwenikazi lethu.

src_text: Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa Maphelo le Polokego ya tša Meepo.
tgt_text: UMnyango Wabantu Besifazane, Intsha, Abantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka uzohlinzeka ngemininingwane yohlelo lwemicimbi ekuhambeni kwesikhathi.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ga Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa Maphelo le Polokego ya tša Maphelo gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo.
tgt_text: Umbiko Wonyaka Wokuqapha Ukusebenza wezi-2021/2022 maqondana Nokusimamiswa Kwabantu Besifazane kanye Nokulingana Ngokobulili, Ukuthuthukiswa Kwentsha kanye Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Abantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo šetšane le go kaonafatša maphelo le polokego ya bašomedi ba meepo, go akaretšwa le tikologo yeo go yona ditiragalo tša meepo di phethagalago.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele umbiko wonyaka wokuqapha ukusebenza wezi-2021/22 maqondana nokusimamiswa kwabantu besifazane, intsha kanye nabantu abaphila nokukhubazeka.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo fetoša Molao wa bjale wa Maphelo le Polokego ya tša Meepo, 1996 (Molao 29 wa 1996).
tgt_text: Umbiko ulandelela izinkomba ezisemqoka ekukhuthazweni kokulingana, izinga lokuqashwa kanye nobunikazi kanye nokubandakanywa kwalawa maqembu abantu emisebenzini yeminyango kanye nezikhungo eziphethwe nguhulumeni.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di fetekilwego magareng ga tše dingwe, di fana ka tlhathollo ya mangwe mareo ka Molaong wo, di tiišeletša tlhako ya taolo ya tša maphelo le polokego le go di bapiša le ditlwaedi tše kaonekaone tša boditšhabatšhaba mabapi le polokego meepong.
tgt_text: Umbiko uhlanganiswe ngokuqhathaniswa nokuhlelwa kwesabiwomali esisabelayo ezindabeni zobulili, ukuqapha, ukulinganisa kanye nohlakakusebenza lokucwaningwa kwamabhuku olwamukelwa yiKhabhinethi ngowezi-     IMithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa Molaotheo wa bo-18 wa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wezempilo Ezimayini kanye Nezokuphepha.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše phatlalatšo ya Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2022 wa bo-18 wa Molaotheo gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona le gape gore Tona ya Toka le Tshokollo ya Bagolegwa, Morena Ronald Lamola kgone go fana ka tsebišo ye nago le dintlha ka botlalo tša diphetošo tšeo di šišinywago Molaotheong..     Molaokakanywa wo fetoša Karolo 6(1) ya Molaotheo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa 1996, wo bolelago gore maleme semmušo 11 Afrika Borwa ke Sepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, siSwati, Tshivenḓa, Xitsonga, Afrikaans, English, isiNdebele, isiXhosa le isiZulu..     Diphetošo tše di tla dira gore Polelo ka Diatla ya Afrika Borwa (SASL) lemogwe bjalo ka polelo ya semmušo ya bo-12 ya naga ye ebile tla iša pele kamogelo ya yona ya setšo le go netefatša ditokelo tša go lekalekana go MaAfrika Borwa ka moka, go sa kgathale bogolofadi bja bona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wezempilo Ezimayini kanye Nezokuphepha ukuze kutholwe imibono yomphakathi ngawo.

src_text: Kgoro ya Thuto ya Motheo šetše lemoga SASL bjalo ka polelo ya letswele     Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlose ukwenza ngcono ezempilo kanye nezokuphepha kwabasebenzi basezimayini, kubandakanya nendawo lapho imisebenzi yasezimayini yenzelwa khona.

src_text: Beke ya Tšhireletšo ya Bana.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uchibiyela uMthetho wamanje Wezempilo Ezimayini kanye Nezokuphepha, we-1996 (uMthetho wama-29 we-1996).

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla keteka Beke ya Bosetšhaba ya Tšhireletšo ya Bana go thoma ka la 29 Mopitlo go fihla ka la 4 Phupu 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “A re šireletšeng Bana nakong ye ya COVID-19 le go fetela pele”..     Mo gare ga beke, šedi ya moswananoši tla lebišwa godimo ga tlhobaboroko ya bosetšhaba ya go ima ga ditšwamahlalagading, yeo hlatlogetšego godimo nakong ya COVID-19 ka ditšwamahlagading bao ba beleilego masea ka..     Kabinete dirile boipiletšo bja mohlakanelwa go tšwa go batswadi, mekgatlo ye lego setšhabeng, dihlopha tša sedumedi le setšhaba ka kakaretšo gore be ngatana ye tee go thuša go fokotša tlhatlogo ya go ima ga ditšwamahlalagading.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ezibuyekeziwe zihlinzeka, phakathi kokunye, ukucacisa amanye amagama akhona kuMthetho, ziqinisa uhlakakusebenza lokulawula ezempilo kanye nezokuphepha futhi ziluhambelanise nezindlela zokusebenza ezingungqaphambili emazweni omhlaba mayelana nezokuphepha ezimayini..     UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchitshiyelwa KoMthethosisekelo Kweshumi Nesishiyagalombili wezi-2022 .

src_text: Foramo ya Bolefase ya Ikonomi (WEF).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchitshiyelwa KoMthethosisekelo Kweshumi Nesishiyagalombili wezi-2022 ukuze kutholwe imibono yomphakathi ngawo kanye nokuthi uNgqongqoshe Wezobulungiswa kanye Nezinsizakalo Zokuhlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo, uMnu Ronald Lamola, angasikhipha isaziso esinemininingwane yesichibiyelo esihlongozwayo kuMthethosisekelo..     UMthethosivivinywa uchibiyela iSigaba 6(1) soMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi YaseNingizimu Afrika we-1996, esazisa ngokuthi izilimi eziyi-11 ezisemthethweni eNingizimu Afrika yiSepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, Siswati, Tshivenda, Xitsonga, isiBhunu, isiNgisi, isiNdebele, isiXhosa kanye nesiZulu..     Izichibiyelo zizokwazisa noma zizokwethula uLimi Lwezimpawu LwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASL) njengolimi lwe-12 olusemthethweni lakuleli lizwe futhi zizothuthukisa ukwamukelwa kwalo ngokwamasiko ziphinde ziqinisekise amalungelo alinganayo kubo bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika, kungakhathalekile ukukhubazeka kwabo abaphila nakho.

src_text: Afrika Borwa kgatha tema go WEF gola Davos-Klosters, Switzerland go thoma ka la 22 go fihla ka la 26 Mopitlo 2022, ka fase ga morero wo: “Re šoma mmogo, go bušetša potego sekeng”..     Afrika Borwa hlompha monyetla wa go ba karolo ya tharollo le go nyetlela naga tše dingwe maitemogelo rena foramong ya bolefase.
tgt_text: UMnyango Wemfundo Eyisisekelo usuvele uyayamukela i-SASL njengolimi lwasekhaya     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Go ba gona ga naga ya rena kua WEF go bohlokwa go godiša seriti sa rena bjalo ka naga ya dipeeletšo lefaseng ka bophara, ka go nyetlela lefase ka bophara ponelopele ya bokamoso le go bonagatša ditlhabollo tše diswa ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Isonto Lokuvikelwa Kwabantwana.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Baswa.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izoqala iSonto Likazwelonke Lokuvikelwa Kwabantwana kusukela mhla zingama-29 kuNhlaba kuya mhla zi-4 kuNhlangulana 2022 ngaphansi kwendikimba ethi: “Asivikeleni Abantwana ngesikhathi se-COVID-19 Nangemuva Kwayo”..     Kuleli sonto, kuzogxilwa kakhulu odabeni oluthinta uzwelonke lokukhulelwa kwamatshitshi, okubonakale kudlondlobala ngesikhathi se-COVID-19 lapho kubonakale amatshitshi amaningi ethola izingane ubuthaphuthaphu ngowezi-..     IKhabhinethi inxenxe ukuba kube nomzamo ohlanganyelwe owenziwa ngabazali, izinhlangano zomphakathi, amaqoqo amabandla ahlukene kanye nomphakathi ngobubanzi ukusiza ukuguqula isimo sokudlondlobala kokukhulelwa kwamatshitshi.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Lenaneo la Kgwedi ya Baswa la 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Tlhohleletšo ya mekgwa ya boiphedišo ya go tšea telele le bopelotelele bja baswa go fihlelela bokamoso bjo kaone”.
tgt_text: Inkundla Yezomnotho Womhlaba (i-WEF).

src_text: Letšatši la semmušo la Baswa le tla ketekwa gola Kapa Bohlabela..     Letšatši le ke anibesari yabo-46 ya 16 Phupu 1976 ya megwanto ya baswa kgahlanong le go gapeletšwa go ithuta dithuto ka moka ka leleme la Afrikaans..     Ka moya wa Phupu 1976, Kabinete dirile boipiletšo go baswa ba naga ye go kalokana le tlhotlo ya tlhokego ya mešomo yeo golelago godimo basweng ka go kgatha tema mananeong go ba hlabolla go swana le boithutelamošomo le boithutela maitememogelo mošomo.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ibambe iqhaza kwi-WEF e-Davos-Klosters, e-Switzerland kusukela mhla zingama-22 kuya mhla zingama-26 kuNhlaba 2022, ngaphansi kwendikimba ethi: “Sisebenza Ndawonye, Sibuyisa Ithemba”..     INingizimu Afrika iyalazisa kakhulu ithuba lokuba yingxenye yesisombululo kanye nokwabelana ngezimo zethu esesike sabhekana nazo enkundleni yomhlaba wonke.

src_text: Mmušo hlamile mananeo go thekga go thwalwa ga baswa le tlhomo ya mešomo ya lebakanyana.
tgt_text: Ukuba khona kwezwe lethu kwi-WEF kuphinde kube semqoka kakhulu ekukhuliseni isithunzi sethu njengendawo umhlaba wonke ongatshala kuyona izimali, ukwabelana nomhlaba wonke umbono wethu wekusasa kanye nokuqhakambisa intuthuko entsha eyenzeka ezweni lethu.

src_text: Dikgwebo le tšona di hlohleletšwa go gokagoketša baswa ba bangwe ba bantši mešomong ka go ba hlolela dibaka tša mešomo..     Lenaneo la baswa la kgwedi ka moka ya Phupu le akaretša ditiragalo ka moka go thoma ka go thakgolwa ga lesolo la baswa la makgoraditsela, go tsebagatšwa ga Lenaneo la Moemedi wa Leswaokgwebo la NYDA le bontši bja go thomišwa ga Ditirelo tša Bosetšhaba tša Baswa go potologa naga ka bophara..     Tona Kantorong ya Mopresidente ya Basadi, Baswa le Bao ba Phelago ka Bogolofadi tlare go se goye kae hlatholla lenaneo ka botlalo.
tgt_text: Inyanga Yentsha.

src_text: Ditiragalo ka moka tša baswa go letetšwe gore di obamele ditshepedišo tša maphelo tša COVID-.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze Uhlelo Lwenyanga Yentsha yowezi-2022 ngaphansi kwendikimba ethi: “Ukukhuthaza ukuziphilisa okusimeme kanye nokuphikelela kwabantu abasha ukuze babe nekusasa elingcono”.

src_text: Samiti ya Dinaga tša go Laolwa ke Magoši.
tgt_text: Usuku Lwentsha olusemthethweni luzogujelwa eMpumalanga Kapa.

src_text: Mmušo, ka tšhomišano le Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Ntlo ya Magoši tla swara Samiti ya Dinaga tša go Laolwa ke Magoši ka Labohlano, 27 le ka Mokibelo, 28 Mopitlo go rerišana ka merero ya go amana le taolo ya naga..     Tše ka moka di akaretša tshepedišo ya go fetišetša dinaga tša go laola ke magošigo tšwa Mmušong goya go beng ba tšona ba maloka maleba lego taba ye bohlokwa go matlafatša batho ba go tšwa dinagamagaeng.

Ditiragalo tša go dira gore batho ba palelwe ke go ba beng ba dinaga ba semmušo mo dinageng tšeo ba dulago go tsona ko magaeng ga sesefatše fela ditokelo tša batho bao tša go bale naga ye lego ya bona eupša fokotša le mabokgoni bona go šomiša yona naga yeo go kaonafatša maphelo bona le maemo bona ditšhelete     Melaetša.
tgt_text: Lo nyaka uwunyaka wama-46 wokubungaza izibhelu zabafundi zangomhla ziyi-16 kuNhlangulana 1976 e-Soweto lapho abantu abasha babhikishela khona ukufakwa ngempoqo kwesiBhunu umbuso wobandlululo njengolimi lokufunda nokufundisa.

src_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebiša ditebogišo tša yona le go lakaletša mahlatse le mahlogonolo go: Mme Leanne Manas, Modiragatši wa Lenaneo la Mesong la SABC la Morning Live, ge amogeditšwe sefoka sa Botswerere bja Bosetšhaba sa go bitšwa Knight of France go tšwa France ka Labobedi, 17 Phupu 2022, ka go kgatha tema ga gagwe go bongwadi, bobegaditaba le magoro mangwe kakaretšo go fapafapana..     Mahloko Kabinete lebiša mahloko yona go malapa le go bagwera ba: Ntate Mpho Moerane (52), Meyaraphethiši wa maloba wa Toropokgolo ya Johannesburg, yo gape bego le mafolofolo mo dipolotiking bophelo bja gagwe ka moka le mohlankedi wa batho ba Johannesburg.
tgt_text: Ngokuvunguza komoya kaNhlangulana we-1976, iKhabhinethi inxuse intsha yakuleli lizwe ukuba ilwisane nenselelo yokwenyuka kokungasebenzi kwentsha ngokuthi ibambe iqhaza ezinhlelweni ezithuthukisayo ezinjengokufundela umsebenzi kanye nokufundela ukwenza umsebenzi ngaphakathi enkampanini..     Uhulumeni usesungule izinhlelo zokweseka ukuqashwa kwentsha kanye nokusungulwa kwemisebenzi yesikhathi esifushane.

src_text: Pele tlo thwalwa go ba Meyaraphethiši hlanketše setšhaba bjalo ka Leloko la Komiti ya Meyara ya go šoma ka Tikologo le Ditirelo tša Mananeokgoparara.
tgt_text: Amabhizinisi nawo ayagqugquzelwa ukuba aqashe abantu abasha abaningi ngokusungula amathuba emisebenzi yentsha..     Uhlelo lwentsha lwenyanga yonke kaNhlangulana lubandakanya imisebenzi enhlobonhlobo kusukela ekwethulweni komkhankaso wamavulandlela amancane, ukwethulwa koHlelo Lwenxusa Le-NYDA kanye nokuvulwa kwamagatsha amaningi eNsizakalo Kazwelonke Yentsha ezweni lonkana..     UNgqongqoshe eHhovisi likaMongameli Wabantu Besifazane, Intsha kanye Nabantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka uzothukulula maduze nje uhlelo lonke oluphelele.

src_text: Ngaka Deborah Fraser (56), seopedi sa mmino wa sedumedi yo thopilego difoka tše mmalwa yo malobanyana mo hlomphilwego ka Bongaka bja Filosofi ka Mmino wo Galalelago ka Christian Leadership Academy.Ngaka Namane Magau (70), serutegi sa go hlomphega kudu le leloko leo le hlomphegago la Lekgotla la Babolokedi la Khansele ya Bosetšhaba ya AIDS ya Afrika Borwa.Ntate Mike Schüssler (60), raikonomi wa go tsebega kudu wa Moafrika Borwa yo bego le mmotegi wa intasteri ye ebile le yena bego kgona go botša batho ka se le sela mabapi le seemo sa ikonomi ya Afrika Borwa.Ntate Jamie Bartlett (56), modiragatši wa go ratega kudu, wa go thopa difoka tše mmalwa tša difala tša Afrika Borwa le bodiragatši bja thelebišene, yo bego tsebega kudu ka ditema tšeo di bapetšego bjalo ka Mike O'Reilly go Isidingo le David Genaro go Rhythm City.Kabinete le yona bile le Mopresidente Ramaphosa go lebiša mahloko mmušong le setšhabeng sa United Arab Emirates (UAE) morago ga go hlokagala ga Lešika la ka Bogošing Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (73), Mopresidente wa UAE      Bao ba Thwetšwego MešomongBatho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona dithuto tlo netefatšwa le go tiišeletšwa ka tsela ye maleba.
tgt_text: Yonke imisebenzi yentsha kuzolindeleka ukuba ithobele imigomo yezempilo ye-COVID-.

src_text: Ntate Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla bjalo ka Mohlankediphethišimogolwane wa Lekgotla la Tlhabollo ya Intasteri ya Kago.
tgt_text: Inkomfa Yomhlaba Womphakathi.

src_text: Ntate Shabeer Hamid Khan bjalo ka Mmalamatlotlopharephare kua Matlotlong Bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni, ngokubambisana neNdlu Kazwelonke Yabaholi Bendabuko, uzobamba Inkomfa Yomhlaba Womphakathi ngoLwesihlanu, mhla zingama-27 kanye noMgqibelo, mhla zingama-28 kuNhlaba 2022 ukuzodingida izindaba eziphathelene nobunikazi bomhlaba..     Lezi zindaba zibandakanya nohlelo lokudluliswa komhlaba womphakathi ususwa kuMbuso unikezwa abanikazi bawo bangempela abafanelekile, okusemqoka kakhulu ukuze kusimamiswe imiphakathi yasezindaweni ezisemakhaya.

src_text: Mme Mendoe Ntswahlana bjalo ka Mohlankedimogolwane wa Dithekišetšano kua Matlotlong Bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: Ukwentuleka kobunikazi obusemthethweni bomhlaba ezindaweni ezisetshenziswa imiphakathi ngokuhlanganyela akuthunazi kuphela amalungelo abantu okukwazi ukuba abanikazi bomhlaba abaphila kuwona kodwa kuphinde kunqinde amandla abo okuwusebenzisa ngendlela ezokwenza ngcono izimpilo zabo ngakwezomnotho     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Kabinete kwanetše go thwalwa ga badiradikgopelo bao ba latelago go tlatša dikgoba tša mešomo tša Lekgotla la Balaodi ba Sekhwama sa Bohlokwa sa Enetši     Ntate Mosimaneotsile Jim Besnaar; (ii)    Mme Unati Nombakuse-Figlan.
tgt_text: SiyanihalaliselaIKhabhinethi idlulise amazwi ayo okuhalalisa kanye nezifiso ezinhle ku: Nksz Leanne Manas, Umethuli Wohlelo Lwasekuseni kwa-SABC, ohlonishwe ngendondo ye-Knight of the French National Order Merit ngoLwesibili, mhla ziyi-17 kuNhlaba wezi-2022, ngegalelo lakhe emsebenzini wobuntatheli, umthombo wezindaba kanye neminye imisebenzi enhlobonhlobo esemqoka yesihe nokunikela emphakathini..     Amazwi Enduduzo IKhabhinethi idlulise amazwi enduduzo nokuzwelana nomndeni kanye nabangani baka: Mnu Mpho Moerane (52), uSodolobha Omkhulu Wedolobha LaseGoli wangaphambilini, futhi obeyisishoshovu sezepolitiki impilo yakhe yonke kanye nomsebenzeli wabantu baseGoli.

src_text: Ikonomi.
tgt_text: Umnotho .

src_text: Kabinete amogetše dikgatelopele tša moragorago tše kaonafetšego ka magato go rarolla seemo sa naga ye ao nepilego go hlohleletša kgolo ya ikonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele izingenelelo zezwe ezinhle zakamuva ezihlose ukufukula ukukhula komnotho.

src_text: Goya ka dipalopalo tša moragorago tša tlhokego ya mešomo go tšwa go ba Dipalopalo tša Afrika Borwa, tlhokego ya mešomo theogetše fase go tloga go.
tgt_text: Ngokwezibalo zakamuva zabantu abangasebenzi ezibuya kwabeZezibalo eNingizimu Afrika, izinga labantu abangasebenzi lehle kusuka kumaphesenti angama-.

src_text: 3% kotareng ya bone ya 2021 go fihla go.
tgt_text: 3 kwikota yesine yangowezi-2021 laya kumaphesenti angama-.

src_text: 5% kotareng ya mathomo ya.
tgt_text: 5 kwikota yokuqala yangowezi-.

src_text: Palo ya batho ka moka bao ba bego ba sa šome nakong ya ge go dirwa dipalopalo theogetše fase kotareng ya bobedi ka go latelana.
tgt_text: Izinga lokungasebenzi lehlile kumakota amabili elandelana.

src_text: Mešomo ye mentši bile gona makaleng mešomo ya setšhaba le ya leago, mešomong ya bohlami le ya kgwebišano..     Palomoka ya Letseno la ka Nageng (GDP) kotareng ya mathomo ya 2022 goletše godimo ka.
tgt_text: Imiphumela emihle yalo msebenzi ibonakale kwizinsizakalo zomphakathi nezenhlalo, ekukhiqizeni nasekuhwebeni..     Umkhiqizo wonyaka wezwe kwikota yokuqala yangowezi-2022 ukhule ngo-.

src_text: 9% gomme tlhatlogo ye bušetša bogolo bja ikonomi ya gaborena go swana le ka nako ya pele naga ye welwa ke leuba.
tgt_text: 9% lokho okubeka isilinganiso somnotho wethu kumazinga ayeyiwo ngaphambi kokufika kobhubhane.

src_text: Mo kotareng ye, lefapha la bohlami be le lona le legolo la go šoma bokaone ikonoming ka tlhatlogo ya tšweletšo ya petroleamo le dikhemikhale, dijo le dino, le tšhipi le metšhene.
tgt_text: Kwikota, umkhakha wezokukhiqiza wawungummongo wezomnotho ngenxa yokukhula ekukhiqizeni uwoyela namakhemikhali, ukudla neziphuzo, kanye nezinsimbi nemishini.

src_text: Ditlhatlogo tše di kaonafetšego di tloga di laetša botse gore ikonomi ya gaborena santše tiile maatla le gore magato go swana le Leano la go Agwa Leswa ga Ikonomi le go Bušetšwa Sekeng ga yona le tloga le nale mošito.
tgt_text: Le mpumelelo emaphakathi ibonisa ukuthi umnotho wethu usalokhu uqinile futhi izingenelelo ezifana noHlelo Lokwakha Kabusha Nokuvuselela Umnotho zithola umfutho.

src_text: Kabinete dira boipiletšo go mang le mang go thekga dikgwebo tša ka mo nageng le diintasteri ka go reka ditšweletšwa le ditirelo tša go tšwa ka mo nageng..     Kabinete amogetše sephetho ka kemedi ya kelo ya dikoloto ebago S&P Global go sekaseka ponelopele ya Afrika Borwa ya kelo ya dikoloto go tloga maemong go tielela goya maemong go kgahliša.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi icela wonke umuntu ukuthi aseke amabhizinisi alapha ekhaya kanye nezimboni ngokuthi bathenge imikhiqizo kanye nezinsizakalo zalapha ekhaya.
