src_text: Kemedi ye ya kelo ya dikoloto netefaditše kharensi ya kelo ya dikoloto ya nako ye telele ya dinagadišele le ya ka mo nageng go tlogelwa maemong BB minus le BB ka go latelana.
Seemo seo se Gakalago sa Ditheko.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela isinqumo se-ejensi ehlola isimo sezimali i-S&P Global sokubuyekeza isimo sezikweletu seNingizimu Afrika - kusuka kwesizinzile kuya kwesihle kakhulu.

src_text: Leuba la Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19) le dithulano tšeo di tšwelago pele lefaseng di bile le seabe se še šoro dithekong tšeo di gaketšego tša bophelo lefaseng ka bophara.
tgt_text: I-ejensi ehlola isimo sezimali iphinde yaqinisekisa ukuthi ukukwazi ukumelana nezikweletu kwesikhathi eside kume ku-BB minus naku-BB ngokulandelana.

src_text: MaAfrika Borwa le bona ba hlobaetšwa ke ditheko tšeo di nyologelago godimo tša dibešeletšwa, dijo le tše dingwe tše bohlokwa..     Re swanetše go swarišana ka moka ga rena, re thušane le go seketša didirišwa tša rena mo nakong ye ye boima.
Mmušo le ona leka ka botšohle go imolla mang le mang, kudukudu bahloki.
tgt_text: Izindleko zokuphila  .

src_text: Panka ya gaborena ya Afrika Borwa ya Resefe ya go šoma gabotsebotse, ya go tielela le ya go ikema gare thuša go šireletša setšhaba sa gaborena kgahlanong le ditlamorago tše mpe tša infleišene ka go thea infleišene gore be ka fase ga kelo ya fasefase; go ba ka fase ga kelo yeo dinaga tše dingwe tše itemogelago yona ka motsotso wo.
tgt_text: Ubhubhane lweSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19) kanye nokungqubuzana emazweni omhlaba okuqhubekayo kube nomthelela omkhulu kakhulu ezindlekweni zokuphila emhlabeni jikelele.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše sephetho sa Matlotlo Bosetšhaba sa go fana ka koketšo ya phokoletšo ya Lebikakaretšo ya Dibešeletšwa (GFL).
tgt_text: Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika nabo badiniwe ukukhuphuka kwamanani ophethiloli, ukudla kanye nemikhiqizo ebalulekile..     Sonke kudingeka ukuthi sibambisane, sisizane futhi sigcine izinsiza zethu kulesi sikhathi esinzima.

src_text: GFL fokoditšwe ka  50 lithareng ka Moranang le ka Mopitlo, ebile phokoletšo ye tla tšwelapele go tloga ka la 1 Phupu go fihla ka la 6 Mosegamanye.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni wenza konke okusemandleni ukuhlinzeka ngosizo kuwo wonke umuntu, ikakhulukazi labo abadla imbuya ngothi.

IBhangengodla lethu laseNingizimu Afrika elisebenza kahle, eliqinile futhi elizimele lisiza ukuba yihawu lomphakathi ukuthi ungacekelwa phansi ukwehla kwamandla emali ngokuthi iyigcine isesilinganisweni esibekiwe; okungaphansi kwalokho okubhekane namanye amazwe amaningi njengamanje.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše sephetho sa Khomišene ya Diphenkgišano go bea leihlo ditheko tša dijo tša motheo, kudukudu peakanyetšo ya gore dikgwebo di swanetše go fahlela ka mabaka go kwagala ge di nyološa ditheko.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele isinqumo somnyango weZamafa kuZwelonke ukwelula isikhathi sokuncishiswa kweNtela Kaphethiloli i-General Fuel Levy (i-GFL).

src_text: Foramo ya Kgwebo ya Afrika Borwa le Japan.
tgt_text: I-GFL yehliswa nge-R. 50 ilitha elilodwa ngoMbasa nangoNhlaba, futhi lizoqhubeka kusuka mhla lu-1 kuNhlangulana kuze kube umhla wesi-6 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše dipoelo tša Foramo ya Kgwebo ya moragorago ya Afrika Borwa le Japan, yeo kwanetšego lenaneo la phišegelo ya mošomo leo le akaretšago tšhomišanommogo godimo ga go hlongwa ga diintasteri tša go šomiša dimatheriale tša tlhago, ditheknolotši tša difatanaga tša mohlagase le haedrotšene ya go mpshafatšega..     Foramo ye kwanetše go swara pontšho ya mebileng ka dikgokagano tša bidio go laetša menyetla ya Afrika Borwa go dikgwebo tša Japan ka bontši, tlhabollo ya mabokgoni ka gare ga intasteri ya naga ye ya difatanaga, magoro ao lego gona mošomo godimo ga dibaka tša bohlami le neelano ya maitemogelo sethekniki.

Japan ke ye nngwe ya bagwebišani ba bohlokwa kudu ba naga ya gaborena ebile ke yona eteletšego pele dipeeletšo mafapheng mmalwa Afrika Borwa, go thoma ka lefapha la difatanaga go fihla ka metšhenekgoparara yeo gatetšego pele ya tša meepo, le gape go dikgwebo tša temo go fihla ka ditirelo tša ditšhelete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela isinqumo seKhomishini Yokuncintisana sokuqapha ngeso lokhozi amanani okudla okusemqoka, ikakhulukazi ukuthi amabhizinisi kumele abe nezizathu ezibonakalayo zokukhuphula amanani.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše gape go hlongwa ga Lenaneo la Baromelantle ba Bathobaso ka Kgoro ya Kgwebišano, Intasteri le Diphenkgišano (the dtic), go kgobokantšha mmogo difeme tša go laolwa ke bathobaso tšeo gabjale di romelago ka ntle diphahlo tša go tšweletšwa ka mo nageng ye go ya dikarolong tše dingwe tša lefase.
tgt_text: UMhlangano Wezamabhizinisi phakathi kweJalimani neNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Lenaneo le le tla kgontšha go abelanwa ga tshedimošo, maitemogelo le tsebo ya mabokgoni, ebile le putla godimo ga dikatlego tša Lenaneo la Bahlomi ba Dikgwebo ba Bathobaso (BIS)..     Enetši.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele imiphumela yoMhlangano Wezamabhizinisi phakathi kweJalimani neNingizimu Afrika, ebivumelana nohlelo lomsebenzi obandakanya ukusebenzisana kwezimboni ezingangcolisi imvelo, ubuchwepheshe bezimoto ezihamba ngogesi kanye nehayidrojini engangcolisi imvelo..     Umhlangano uphinde wavumelana 'ngombukiso' ozokwenziwa ngobuchwepheshe be-inthanethi wokuqhakambisa amathuba eNingizimu Afrika kumabhizinisi amaningi aseJalimani, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakhono embonini eyakha izimoto yalapha ekhaya, izindlela zokusebenza ezehlukene kumathuba okukhiqiza kanye nokwabelana ngamakhono obuchwepheshe.

src_text: Magato rena go dira gore mo lebakeng le letelele le le tlago re se hlwe re sokodišwa ke mohlagase thušitše kudu ke magato go neelwa Yuniti 4 ya Setiši sa go Fehla Mohlagase sa Kusile gola Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: IJalimani ingomunye wabalingani bethu ababaluleke kakhulu kwezohwebo kanye nomtshalizimali ohamba phambili emikhakheni eminingi yaseNingizimu Afrika, kusuka emkhakheni wezimoto kuya emishinini yezimayini ephambili, kusuka kwezolimo kuya emkhakheni wezezimali.

src_text: Magato a bontšha gape maiteko mangwe Eskom go boetša sekeng peakanyo ya mohlagase ka kakaretšo ebile tla tlaleletša kabo ya mohlagase ka mo nageng ka dimekawate (MW) tše dingwe gape tše..     Kabinete lemogile gore go agwa ga diyuniti tša go fehla mohlagase tše nne godimo ga tše tshela go phethagaditšwe protšekeng ya Setiši sa Mohlagase sa Kusile..     Kabinete amogetše magato go tlaleletša mohlagase wo abiwago nageng ye ka go thomiša phehlo ye mpsha ya mohlagase, gomme ona kgonagetše ka baka la sephetho sa go dumelela bafehli ba mohlagase ba go ikema go tšweletša mohlagase.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela ukusungulwa kweNkundla Yabantu Abamnyama Yokuthunyelwa Kwempahla Kwamanye Amazwe i-Black Exporters Network nguMnyango Wezohwebo, Izimboni Nokuncintisana (i-DTIC), ukwakha ubumbano kumafemu abantu abamnyama njengamanje athumela izimpahla ezenziwe kuleli kwamanye amazwe omhlaba.

src_text: Mmušo malobanyana mo sanetše kwano ya go reka 150 MW ya mohlagase go tšwa go motšweletši wa mohlagase wa go mpshafatšega bago, Scatec ASA.
tgt_text: Le nkundla izovumela ukwabelana ngolwazi, isipiliyoni nendlela yokusebenza, futhi yakhela phezu kwempumelelo yoHlelo Losozimboni Abamnyama..     Ezamandla.

src_text: Lekgotlakeletšo la Matlafatšo yeo Nabilego ya Bathobaso Ikonoming (B-BBEE).
tgt_text: Ukutholakala kwezamandla kwesikhathi eside kukhuthazwe kakhulu kulandela ukuthengiswa kwe-Unit 4 eSiteshini Sikagesi saseKusile eMpumalanga.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše thwalo ka Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ya Lekgotlakeletšo le leswa la naga ye la B-BBEE.
tgt_text: Lokhu kudluliswa kube ngenye yengqophamlando emizamweni ka-Eskom ukuletha uzinzo ohlelweni logesi futhi luzokwengeza ama-800 megawatt (ama-MW) kwisizinda sikagesi..     IKhabhinethi ikuphawulile ukuthi ukwakhiwa kwezingxenye zeziphehlimandla ezine kweziyisithupha sekuphothuliwe kumklamo weSiteshi Sikagesi eKusile..     IKhabhinethi yamukele ukwengezwa komthamo omusha wesiphehlimandla kwisizinda sogesi, lokhu okwaphunyeleliswa isinqumo sokuvumela abakhiqizi bogesi abazimele ukuthi bakhiqize ugesi.

src_text: Lekgotla le le hlangwa ke dihlopha tša mafapha go fapafapana go thoma ka dikgwebo, diyunione tša bašomi, mekgatlo yeo thomilwego setšhabeng le dirutegi, bao ka moka ba tlo rwalago maikarabelo go hlahla mmušo go lebeletšwe diphetogo tša ikonomi.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni usanda kusayina isivumelwano sokuthenga ama-150 MW omthamo wogesi kumkhiqizi wogesi ovuselelekayo, okuyi-Scatec ASA.

src_text: Le ge le gore go bile le kgatelopele ye makatšago ya go bušetša morago megopolo ye fošagetšego ya kgethollo ikonoming, go santše go nale mošomo wo montši wo swanetšego go dirwa go rotoša taolo ya bolaodi bja bathobaso, go hlatloša mabokgoni le go nabiša dithekišetšano go nea basadi ba bathobaso le baswa menyetla.
tgt_text: UMkhandlu Oluleka Ngokuthuthukiswa Komnotho Wabantu Abamnyama (i-B-BBEE).

src_text: Mafula.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele ukuqokwa okwenziwe nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa koMkhandlu omusha wezwe we-B-BBEE.

src_text: Matsapa ao tšwelago pele mmušo kimollo diprofenseng tšeo di amilwego ke mafula moragorago tliša dipoelo tša go kgotsofatša.
tgt_text: Lo mkhandlu wakhiwe ngabantu abahlukahlukene abasuka kumabhizinisi, izinyonyana zohwebo, izinhlangano zomphakathi kanye nezifundiswa, umsebenzi wabo okuzoba ukuhlahlela indlela uhulumeni ngokuguqulwa kwesimo somnotho.

src_text: Mmušo beile pele kabo ya dijo, meetse le madulo bathong bao ba šutišitšwego le go lokiša mananeokgoparara ao senyegilego.
tgt_text: Ngesikhathi kube nenqubekelaphambili ebonakalayo ekubuyiseleni emuva ukuhlanekezelwa komnotho ngesikhathi sobandlululo, mningi umsebenzi okusamele wenziwe ekwenyuseni ukuphatha kwabantu abamnyama, ukuthuthukisa amakhono kanye nokusabalalisa amathuba okukhishwa kwemisebenzi ukuze kuzonikwa abesifazane abamnyama nentsha amathuba.

src_text: Mošomo wo gare ya kgatlampana go bušetša sekeng ditirelo tša motheo go swana le meetse, mohlagase, tlhwekišo le go thothwa ga ditlakala.
tgt_text: Izikhukhula.

src_text: Tšhelete ya go lekana R189, 217 milione gare ya šomišwa Kaonafatšong ya Lenaneo la Madulo Mekhukhung leo le nepilego go kaonafatša khwalithi ya maphelo bao ba dulago mafelong mekhukhung..     Tšhelete ya tlaleletšo ya go lekana R733, 086 milione abetšwe ka Thušo ya Tšhelete ya Tlhabollo ya Madulo Batho go thuša go direla batho madulo go swarelela nako ye telele le mohlakanelwa..     Kabinete amogetše thekgo ya moya wa botho go tšwa Mmušong wa Qatar ka sebopego sa dijo tša ka dikotikoting, diaparo, ditšenereitha, dihlwekišameetse, dihemiši, ditente le kabo ya didirišwa tša bongaka.
tgt_text: Imizamo eqhubekayo kahulumeni yokuxhasa izifundazwe ezikhahlanyezwe izikhukhula zakamuva yenza umehluko omkhulu.

src_text: Neelano ye tla hola badudi ba go feta 4 000 bao ba filwego madulo lebakanyana disenthareng tša tlhokomelo ya setšhaba.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni ubeke eqhulwini ukuhlinzeka ngokudla, amanzi kanye nezindawo zokufihla ikhanda kubantu abalahlekelwa izindawo zokuhlala nokulungiswa kwengqalasizinda eyonakele.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše gape thekgo ya moya wa botho go tšwa United Arab Emirates (UAE) ka sebogego sa dijo tša ka dikotikoting le meetse go thuša batšwasehlabelo ba mafula moragorago.
tgt_text: Umsebenzi omkhulu uyaqhubeka ukubuyisela izidingonqangi ezifana namanzi, ugesi, ukuthuthwa kwendle kanye nodoti.

src_text: Go Tsebagatšwa ga Sekhwama sa Tlhabollo ya Leago.
tgt_text: Zibalelwa kwizigidi ezingama-R. 217 izimali ezisetshenziswa kuHlelo loKwakha Kabusha Izindawo Zasemijondolo okuhloswe ngalo ukwenza ngcono izinga lempilo kubahlali basemijondolo.

src_text: 1    Kabinete amogetše go tsebagatšwa ga Sekhwama sa Mešomo ya Leago ka Koporasi ya Tlhabollo ya Diintasteri (IDC) ka tšhomišano le Kantoro ya Mopresidente le dtic.

Thekgo ye tla fana ka menyetla ya mathomomayo ya mešomo ya baswa ba go fihla 50 000 mo mešomong ye nago le mohola leagong yeo dirwago ke batho go tšwa mafelong mo ba dulago gona.. 2    Thekgo ye akaretša tlhokomelo ya maphelo le ya setšhaba, thekgo ya dijo le ya phepo go swana le mafelo go rekišetša batho ba go hloka madulo dijo, tlhohleletšo ya go bala le go ngwala, mananeo tlhago le phedišo ya phetogo ya klaemete gotee le masolo go thekga baswa.
tgt_text: Isamba esengeziwe sezigidi ezingama-R. 086 sibekelwe ukuthi sisize ekusunguleni izindawo zokuhlala zabantu ezisimeme nezihlanganisiwe ngohlelo lweSibonelelo Sokuthuthukiswa Kwezindawo Zokuhlalisa Abantu..     IKhabhinethi yamukele usizo lwesihe oluvela ezweni lase-Qatar lokudla okusemathinini, izingubo zokugqoka, ama-generator, okokuhlanza amanzi, okokungenisa umoya ohlanzekile, amathende kanye nemikhiqizo yokwelapha.

src_text: Sekhwama se se tla thekga batho go tšwa ditšhabeng tše 26 eupša se sekhwama sa go dira poelo ya go swana le ye dirwago ke dikgwebo.
tgt_text: Lo mnikelo uzosiza izakhamuzi ezingaphezu kwezi-4 000 ezisahlaliswe okwesikhashana ezikhungweni zomphakathi.

src_text: Bosenyi le Bomenetša.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela usizo lwesihe oluvela e-United Arab Emirates (e-UAE) lokudla okusemathinini kanye namanzi ukusiza labo abakhahlanyezwe izikhukhula zakamuva.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše go golegwa ga batho ka tee ka tee ka bontši go amana le boradia, go timeletša tšhelete mohlala le bomenetša.
tgt_text: Ukwethulwa kweSikhwama Sokusungula Imisebenzi Emphakathini.

src_text: Magareng ga bona go akaretšwa bašomedi ba maloba ba mmušo ba maemo godimo le ba makalakgwebo mmušo, ba bangwe ba bona ba lebane le melato ya go amana le go gatakwa ga Molao wa Taolo ya Ditšhelete tša Mmušo, 1999 (Molao 1 wa 1999).
tgt_text: 1    IKhabhinethi yamukele ukwethulwa kweSikhwama Sokusungula Imisebenzi Emphakathini sivulwa yiNhlangano Yokuthuthukiswa Kwezimboni (i-IDC) ngokubambisana neHhovisi likaMongameli ne-DTIC.

src_text: Dikgolego tše - tša go akaretša go golegwa ga mohlankedi wa Kgoro ya Merero ya Selegae kua Senthareng ya Kamogelo ya Bafaladi ya Desmond Tutu gola Pretoria yo go gononwago gore amogetše pipamolomo go tšwa go motšwantle – bohlatse bja go laetša botse ntlha ya gore ga go na motho yo lego ka godimo ga letsogo la molao le gore bašomedi ba go hloka potego ga bana bodulo le gatee lefapheng la mmušo..     Kabinete amogetše gape kgatelopele ye fihleletšwego go buša barwarre ba Gupta lego Rajesh le Atul go tšwa mo ba lego go boela ka mo Afrika Borwa go tlo lebana le letsogo la molao.
tgt_text: Ukweseka lokhu kuzohlinzeka ngamathuba omsebenzi afinyelela kwizi-50 000 kubantu abasha emsebenzini odingwa umphakathi owenziwa emiphakathini yendawo.. 2    Lokhu kweseka kuzobandakanya ukunakekela ngokwezempilo nokomphakathi, usizo lokudla nesondlo olufana nokuphekela labo abaswele, ukugqugquzelwa kokufunda nokubhala, izinhlelo zokunakekelwa kwemvelo kanye nokuqedwa kokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu kanye nemizamo yokweseka intsha.

src_text: Se se latela go golegwa ga bona malobanyana gola Dubai kua UAE morago ga gore Lebotho la Boditšhaba la Sephodisa sa Bosenyi (Interpol) le lokolle ditsebišo tša go golegwa ga bona.
tgt_text: ISikhwama sizosiza amabhizinisi omphakathi futhi angabheke nzuzo angama-.

src_text: Barrwarre ba ba nyakega ka mo Afrika Borwa go amana le tema ye go gononwago gore ba kgathile ya go gogwa ga mmušo ka nko, go akaretšwa le boradia le go timeletša tšhelete mohlala.
tgt_text: Ubugebengu nenkohlakalo.

src_text: Ditherišano magareng ga mabotho phethagatšo ya molao kua UAE le ka mo Afrika Borwa ka go bušwa ga bona ka mo nageng di gare.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukele ukuboshwa kwabantu abaningi okuxhumene nokukhwabanisa, ukushushumbiswa kwemali kanye nenkohlakalo.

src_text: Go golegwa ga bona go laetša maikemišetšo mmušo go lwantšha bosenyi le bomenetša ntle le poifo goba sepitša..     Go golegwa ga bona go tloga go laetša gore ditshepedišo le magato semolao šoma gabotse kudu go dira gore babonwamolato ba ikarabele ka magato bona boganka le go netefatša gore ga gona le motho tee yo lego ka godimo ga letsogo la molao..     Kabinete sotše maitekelo bohlaswa go nyatša ikonomi le naga ya gaborena morago ga tshenyo ya ka boomo ya kheibole kua Yuniti 1 ya Setiši sa Mohlagase sa Matla sa Eskom gola Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Lokhu kubandakanya abasebenzi baphambilini bakahulumeni ezikhundleni eziphezulu, abanye ababhekene namacala ahlobene nokuphula uMthetho Wokuphathwa Kwezimali Zikahulumeni, we-1999 (uMthetho woku-1 we-1999).

src_text: Ye ebile tiragalo ya bone ya kgonono ya tshenyo ye lakanwego setišing se sa mohlagase morago ga gore ditiragalo tša go swana le tše di begwe ditišing tše dingwe tše tharo tša mohlagase dibekeng tše mmalwa tša go feta.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuboshwa - okubandakanya ukuboshwa kwalowo oyisikhulu soMnyango Wezasekhaya esikhungweni sokwamukela ababaleki i-Desmond Tutu Refugee Reception Centre ePitoli osolwa ngokwamukela intshontsho kowokufika kuleli - kuyisibonelo sokuthi akekho ongaphezu komthetho futhi abasebenzi abangathembekile ngeke babekezelelwe emkhakheni kahulumeni..     IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela inqubekelaphambili eyenziwe ukubuyisa izelamani zakwa-Gupta, u-Rajesh no-Atul, eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Dipalopalo tša moragorago tša bosenyi ke seipone sa gore re swanetše go dira tšohle bjalo ka setšhaba go dira gore mo re tšwago gona go bolokege.
tgt_text: Lokhu kulandela ukuthi kamuva bekhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela e-Dubai e-UAE emva kokuthi Inhlangano Yamazwe Yamaphoyisa (i-Interpol) iwuhlabe yawulawula.

src_text: Seemo se sa makgonthe seo re lebaganego le sona se re gopotša gore go fediša bosenyi ke maikarabelo setšhaba le gore ka moka ga rena – go akaretšwa maphodisa, baetapele ba dipolotiki, setšhaba, malapa, boradikgwebo, bašomi le mekgatlo ye lego setšhabeng – ka moka re swanela ke go kgatha tema ya rena go lwantšha bosenyi..     Kabinete nale tshepho ya gore ditšhelete tše dingwe tšeo di beilwego ka thoko ke Kantoro ya Tona ya Maphodisa go šomišwa mo ditišing tša maphodisa tša go ba le palo ya godimo ya go begwa ga melato ya dipolao, ya go kata le ya bosenyi bjo bongwe bja dikgaruru di tla thuša go fetola seemo seo le go hlola setšhaba sa go bolokega bathong ka moka.
tgt_text: Lezi zelamani ziyafuneka eNingizimu Afrika ngezinsolo zokubandakanyeka ekuqhwagweni kwamandla ombuso, okufaka phakathi ukukhwabanisa kanye nokushushumbiswa kwemali.

src_text: Tsebišo ya Seemo sa COVID-.
tgt_text: Izingxoxo phakathi kwabomthetho e-UAE naseNingizimu Afrika ngokubuyiswa kwabo ziyaqhubeka.

src_text: Kabinete gopoditše motho mang le mang gore COVID-19 ga ya fela le gore kotsi ya diphetelo tše diswa tla nyologela godimo nakong ye ya sehla sa marega.
tgt_text: Ukuboshwa kwabo kubonisa ukuzimisela kukahulumeni ukulwa nobugebengu nenkohlakalo ngaphandle kokwesaba ukwenzelela..     Lokhu kuboshwa kubonisa ukuthi inqubo nezindlela-kusebenza zisebenza ngempumelelo ukuthi ababhebhezeli bobugebengu babhekane namacala ezenzo zabo futhi kuqinisekisa ukuthi akekho ongaphezu komthetho..     IKhabhinethi iyawugxeka kakhulu umzamo osobala nje wokudicilela phansi umnotho wethu kanye nezwe lakithi kulandela ukonakaliswa okubi kwentambo kagesi kwi-Unit 1 eSiteshini Sogesi i-Matla sakwa-Eskom eMpumalanga.

src_text: Re swanetše go tšwelapele go latela magato ka moka tlhokomelo gore re ipoloke le go šireletša bao re phelago le bona.
tgt_text: Lesi bekuyisigameko sesine okusolwa ukuthi ngesokucekela phansi esiteshini sogesi emva kokuthi kube nezigameko ezifanayo ezibikiwe kwezinye iziteshi zogesi ezintathu emavikini ambalwa edlule.

src_text: Magato a akaretša go hlapa goba go sanithaesa matsogo kgafetšakgafetša, go apara dimaseke ge re le ka meagong, go šielana sekgala sa go bolokega, go bula mafastere gore go hlabele ke moya le go hlaba meento.
tgt_text: Izibalo zakamuva zobugebengu zibonisa ukuthi kumele sisebenze kakhudlwana njengomphakathi ukuze senze ukuthi imiphakathi yethu iphephe.

src_text: Samiti ya Kopano ya Afrika (AU).
tgt_text: Lokhu kusikhumbuza ukuthi ukunciphisa ubugebengu kungumsebenzi womphakathi wonke kanye nathi sonke - kubandakanya amaphoyisa, abaholi bezepolitiki, imiphakathi, imindeni, osomabhizinisi, abasebenzi nomphakathi - kumele sidlale indima yethu ekulweni nobugebengu..     IKhabhinethi inethemba lokuthi izimali ezengeziwe ezibekwe eqhulwini nguNgqongqoshe Wamaphoyisa ezizoya eziteshini zamaphoyisa ezinamanani aphezulu amacala okubulala, awokudlwengula kanye nobunye ubugebengu obunodlame zizosiza ukuguqula isimo futhi kubuyise nokuphepha emiphakathini kuwo wonke umuntu.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše tsebagatšo, Dikano le maikgafo ao amogetšwego kua Samiting ya Go Se Tlwaelege ya AU ka Matšhošetši le Diphetho tša go thulana le Molaotheo ka mo Afrika yeo bego swaretšwe kua Malabo, Rephabliking ya Equatorial Guinea, ka Mokibelo, 28 Mopitlo..     Baetapele ba Afrika ba lekotše matšhošetši ao tšwelago pele, ba sekasekile magato bjale go rarolla seemo se le go ikgafa go matlafatša tšhireletšego ya mohlakanelwa ya mebušo ye lego maloko samiti ye yeo lebaganego le matšhošetši le dikgaruru tša boganka.
tgt_text: Ezakamuva nge-COVID-.

src_text: Bolwetši bja Mabora Dikgabo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikhumbuze wonke umuntu ukuthi i-COVID-19 ayikapheli futhi ubungozi bokutheleleka okusha buzokhula ngesikhathi sobusika.

src_text: Kabinete netefaleditše MaAfrika Borwa gore mafapha rena tša maphelo dutše komana go bea seemo leihlo le go thibela bolwetši bja Mabora Dikgabo, morago ga gore bolwetši bjo bo phulege dinageng tše mmalwa tšeo ka setlwaedi bolwetši bjo bo sego gona.
tgt_text: Kumele siqhubeke nokuqaphela ukuze sizozivikela thina kanye nabanye abantu.

src_text: Le ge le gore ga gona diphetelo tšeo di begilwego go fihla gabjale goba tšeo di humanwego ka mo Afrika Borwa, makgotlataolo tša maphelo ka mo nageng tšwela pele go bea seemo leihlo ka hloafalo     Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: Lokhu kufaka phakathi ukuhlanza izandla noma ukusebenzisa isibulali-magciwane njalo nje, ukugqoka isifonyo uma ungaphakathi kwesakhiwo, ukugcina igebe elanele phakathi kwabanye abantu, ukuvula amafasitela ukuze kuzongena umoya ohlanzekile kanye nokugoma.

src_text: Ditherišano tša Setšhaba ka Magato go Swaragana le Bogwebi bjo bo Sego Molaong bja Dikgerekgere tša Tšhipi.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela YoBumbano Lwamazwe ase-Afrika (i-AU).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore ditherišano tša setšhaba di swarwe ka ditšhišinyo tša go fediša go rekišwa ga dikgerekgere tša tšhipi tšeo di humanwego ka tsela ye sego molaong le ditšhipi tšeo di tološitšwego.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele isimemezelo, izethembiso kanye nezibopho ezithathwe kwiNgqungquthela Eyingqayizivele ye-AU ebimayelana noBuphekula Nezinguquko ezingalandeli Umthethosisekelo e-Afrika ebibanjwe e-Malabo, e-Riphabhulikhi yase-Equatorial Guinea, ngoMgqibelo, mhla wama-28 kuNhlaba..     Abaholi base-Afrika bahlolisise izinsongo ezilokhu zibelesele, bahlolisisa izindlela zamanje zokubhekana nalokhu futhi bazinikela ekuqiniseni ukuphepha ngokubambisana kwamazwe angamalungu abhekene nobuphekula namavukela-mbuso.

src_text: Bohodu bja dikgerekgere tša tšhipi le dikheibole tša koporo mo mananeokgoparareng mmušo bo šitiša go šoma gabotse ga ikonomi bjalo ka ge bo hlola gore dilo tše di rekišwago disenyegelo tša gona di ye godimo go feta tekano.
tgt_text: Isifo se-Monkeypox.

src_text: Tše dingwe tša ditšhitišo tše di akaretša kabo ya mohlagase le ditirelo tša ditimela ka baka la diporo tša ditimela tšeo di sentšwego.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekise abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi iziphathimandla zethu zezempilo zimehlo mane ukuqapha ngeso lokhozi nokugwema isifo se-Monkeypox, kulandela ukuqubuka kwaso emazweni amaningi angajwayele ukuhlaselwa izifo.

src_text: Di hlola disenyegelo tša tlaleletšo tša dinamelwa banameding ka baka la dinamelwa tšeo di šwalalantšwego tša banamedi.
tgt_text: Yize kungakatholakali noma kungakabikwa muntu onalesi sifo eNingizimu Afrika, iziphathimandla zezempilo kuleli lizwe ziyaqhubeka nokubeka iso isimo     Isinqumo seKhabhinethi.

src_text: Dikheibole tšeo di sentšwego le tša go lokaloka tša mohlagase di hlola kotsi ya polokego setšhabeng, kudukudu baneng..     Kabinete file tlhahlo ya gore dtic swanetše go etapele ditherišano mo nakong ye šetšego ye kopana, le go humana digopolo go tšwa setšhabeng le go tšwa mafapheng maleba ka magato mohola ao ka phethagatšwago ke mmušo go fediša go senywa ga mananeokgoparara bohlokwa ikonomi.
tgt_text: Ukukhulumisana nomphakathi ngezinyathelo zokubhekana nokuthengiswa okungekho emthethweni kwezinsalela zensimbi..     IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukuthi ukukhulumisana nomphakathi kuqale mayelana nezethulo zokunqanda ukuthengiswa okungekho emthethweni kwezinsalela zensimbi nensimbi uqobo.

src_text: Morago ga tshepedišo ye, Kabinete tla bolela ka magato ao dumeletšwego     Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.
tgt_text: Ukwebiwa kwezinsalela zensimbi nezintambo zekhopha kwizingqalasizinda zomphakathi kuthunaza ukusebenza komnotho ngokwengeza izindleko ezinkulu.

src_text: Simposiamo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Tšhomišanommogo ya Theknolotši go Reniša Khutšo (PTPS) ya Ditšhabakopano (UN).
tgt_text: Okunye kwalokhu kuphazamiseka kubandakanya ukuthunyelwa kogesi kanye nezinsizakalo zezitimela ngenxa yokucekelwa phansi kojantshi.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla swara PTPS ya Boselela kua Khanseleng ya Dinyakišišo tša Mahlale le tša Intasteri gola Pretoria go thoma ka Labobedi, 21 go fihla ka Labohlano, 24 Phupu.
tgt_text: Kwengeza ezindlekweni zokuthutha kubagibeli ngenxa yokucekelwa phansi kwezokuthutha umphakathi.

src_text: Go letetšwe gore go tle baemedi ba 300 go tšwa mebušong ya dinaga tše 50 tšeo di lego maloko yona.
tgt_text: Izintambo zogesi ezicekelwe phansi futhi ezingaphephile ziletha ubungozi emiphakathini, ikakhulukazi ezinganeni..     IKhabhinethi ikhiphe umyalelo othi i-DTIC kumele ihole phambili lezi zinkulumo esikhathini esibekiwe, futhi ithole imibono kubantu basemphakathini nakwimikhakha efanele uhulumeni angayisebenzisa ukuqeda ukucekelwa phansi kwezingqalasizinda ezibalulekile zomnotho.

src_text: Simposiamo ye kopantšha mmogo mašole ao nago le kgahlego, maphodisa le badudi go tšwa dinageng tšeo Mebušo ya tšona lego maloko UN go šomišana mmogo tirišong ya theknolotši ya sebjalebjale le ye gatetšego pele gotee le mareo ao šomišwago mererong ya sešole ye eteletšwego pele ke UN.
tgt_text: Emva kwalokho, iKhabhinethi izobe seyimemezela izinyathelo ezigunyaziwe     Imicimbi ezayo.

src_text: Simposiamo ye tla šomišwa bjalo ka sefala sa go abelana tshedimošo le sa go logišana maano mebušong ye lego maloko UN ebile amega masolong go reniša khutšo ka theknolotši ya moragorago mererong ya sešole ya go reniša moya wa khutšo..     Phenkgišano ya Bosetšhaba ya go Swarwa ka Morago ga Mengwaga ye Mebedi ya Wekšopo ya Bone ya Mabokgoni Afrika Borwa Maemo Bolefase (WSZA).
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela Yomhlaba yeNhlangano Yezizwe Ezibumbene (i-UN) Yokubambisana ngoBuchwepheshe Ekugcineni Ukuthula (i-PTPS).

src_text: Phenkgišano ya Bosetšhaba ya go Swarwa ka Morago ga Mengwaga ye Mebedi ya WSZA swarelwa Sentharengkgoparara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Inkosi Albert Luthuli gola KwaZulu-Natal go thoma ka la 7 go fihla ka la 10 Phupu 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Ga go Boelwe Morago ka go Hlatloša Tšweletšo ya Bašomi ba Diatla ba Mengwagalekgolo ya bo21”..     Tiragalo ye šomišwa go hlohleletša mabokgoni go šoma ka diatla bjalo ka mošomo wa makgonthe wo motho ka ikgethelago ona bophelong gotee le go bulela dikgwebišano tšeo di tshephišago le intasteri ye.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izosingatha i-PTPS yesithupha kuMkhandlu Wezesayensi Nocwaningo Lwezimboni ePitoli kusuka ngoLwesibili, mhla wama-21 kuya kuLwesihlanu, mhla wama-24 kuNhlangulana.

src_text: Tiragalo ye šomišwa gape go lekola maemo rena boithutelamošomo le tlhabollo ya go šoma ka diatla godimo ga tlhohleletšo ya go šušumetša go tšewa ga mešomo ya bophelo ka moka ya go šoma ka diatla bjalo ka mešomo yeo ka bago kgetho ya mathomo baithuting ba rena     Melaetša.
tgt_text: Kulindeleke ukuthi le ngqungquthela ihanjelwe izithunywa ezingama-300 ezivela emazweni angamalungu angama-..     Ingqungquthela le ihlanganisa bonke abezempi, amaphoyisa, kanye nezakhamuzi ezivela eMazweni Angamalunga e-UN ukuthi babe yimbumba ekusebenziseni ubuchwepheshe besimanjemanje, obuthuthukile kanye neminye imiqondo kulolu hambo oluholwa i-UN.

src_text: Mahloko Kabinete bile le Mopresidente Ramaphosa go lebiša mahloko Lapeng la Bogoši le setšhabeng sa Pušo ya amaMpondo morago ga go hlokofala ga Mohlomphegikgolo Kgoši Zanozuko Tyelovuyo Sigcau     Bao ba Thwetšwego MešomongBatho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona thuto tlo tiišeletšwa le go netefatšwa ka tsela ye maleba.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela izosetshenziswa njengenkundla yokwabelana ngolwazi nokuhlanganisa imiqondo yamazwe angamalungu e-UN ayingxenye yemizamo yokugcina ukuthula ngokusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanje ekugcineni ukuthula..     IMiqhudelwano Kazwelonke Yesine Yeminyaka Emibili Yamakhono Omhlaba eNingizimu Afrika (i-WSZA).

src_text: Morena Jacob Ganny Mbele bjalo ka Molaodipharephare (DG) Kgorong ya Methopo ya Diminirale le Enetši..     Mme Pumeza Nwabisa Nodada bjalo ka Motlatšamolaodipharephare: Taolo ya Kagodithokgwa Kgorong ya Kagodithokgwa, Boreatlhapi le Tikologo.
tgt_text: IMiqhudelwano Kazwelonke Yesine Yeminyaka Emibili ye-WSZA iyaqhubeka e-Inkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre KwaZulu-Natali kusuka mhla wesi-7 kuya mhla we-10 kuNhlangulana 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: "Senyusa Ukukhiqizwa Kwezingcweti Kwikhuluminyaka lama-21”..     Umcimbi usetshenziswa ukukhuthaza amakhono ezingcweti njengomkhakha womsebenzi ongakhethwa kanjalo nokuvuleleka kulabo okungasetshenziswana nabo nemboni.

src_text: Mme Susan Mafanedza Masapu bjalo ka Moeletšimogolwane wa Melao ya Mmušo wa Kgoro ya Toka le Tlhabollo ya Molaotheo..     Mme Doris Tshepe bjalo ka Mokomišinare wa Khomišene ya Diphenkgišano.
tgt_text: Uphinde wasetshenziswa ukuhlola amazinga ethu okufundelwa komsebenzi nokuthuthukiswa kwezingcweti ngaphezu kokukhulumela ukwenyusa imisebenzi yezingcweti njengemisebenzi ehamba phambili abafundi abangazikhethela yona     Umyalezo.

src_text: Ngaka Alex Mahapa bjalo ka Moeletši wa Moswananoši wa Goyagoile go Tona ya Motšwaoswere ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo.
tgt_text: Amazwi enduduzo     IKhabhinethi ihlanganyele noMongameli u-Ramaphosa ekudluliseni amazwi enduduzo eMndenini Wasebukhosini nasesizweni soBukhosi bamaMpondo kulandela ukukhothama kweNgonyama iNkosi uZanozuko Tyelovuyo Sigcau (Ah Zanozuko!)

src_text: Moadbokheiti Rams Ramashia bjalo ka Moeletši wa Moswananoši wa Lebakanyana go Tona ya Motšwaoswere ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo.
tgt_text: AbaqashiweUkuqashwa kwabo bonke abalandelayo kuzokwamukelwa ngokusemthethweni kuphela uma sekuqinisekiswe ubufakazi beziqu zabo zemfundo futhi uma sebenikeziwe izimvume ezifanelekile.

src_text: Phetogo ya Klaemete.
tgt_text: Ukuguquguquka Kwesimo Sezulu.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše ketelo ya go tla ka mo Afrika Borwa ka Morena Alok Sharma, Mopresidente wa Samiti ya bo-26 ya Phetogo ya Klaemete ya Ditšhabakopano (UN), go thoma ka la 19 go fihla ka la 21 Phupu 2022, gotee le phetleko ya gagwe ya gore Afrika Borwa laeditše boikgafo bja mošito godimo ga diphetogo tša go diriša mohlagase wa go hlweka..     Ka 2021, Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa bile le baetapele ba bangwe ba dinaga go tsebagatša tšhomišanommogo ye bohlokwa le mebušo ya Fora, Germany, United Kingdom le Amerika gotee le Kopano ya Yuropa, go thekga diphetogo tša go se tšee lehlakore tša ikonomi ya khabone ya maemo fase le setšhaba sa go tielela kgahlanong le diphetogo tša klaemete..     Afrika Borwa be šoma ga boima go itokišetša sefala sa diphetogo tša rena goya mohlagaseng wa go hlweka le go thoma go šomiša methopo ya mohlagase wa go hlweka go swana le haedrotšene ya tlhago, dilahlwa, mohlagase wa go fehlwa ka moya, mohlagase wa seetša sa letšatši le mohlagase wa go fehlwa ka meetse, magareng ga mehuta ye mengwe ya go mpshafatšega.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele uhambo lokuvakashela eNingizimu Afrika kuka-Mnu Alok Sharma, uMongameli wama-26 weNgqungquthela Yezokuguquguquka Kwesimo Sezulu yeNhlangano Yezizwe Ezibumbene (i-UN), kusuka mhla ziyi-19 kuya mhla zingama-21 kuNhlangulana 2022, kanye nokuhlola kwakhe isimo seNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ibonise ukuzinikela okucacile ekuqinisekiseni ukungangcoliswa kwemvelo..     Ngowezi-2021, uMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa wahlanganyela nabanye abaholi ekumemezeleni ingqophamlando yokusebenzisana nohulumeni base-France, e-Germany, e-United Kingdom kanye nowase-United States, kanjalo nowase-European Union, ukweseka ukuguqukela emnothweni onekhabhoni encane kanye nomphakathi omelana nesimo sezulu..     INingizimu Afrika ibilokhu isebenza kanzima ekulungiseleleni ukuguqukela nasekuyeni kwimithombo engangcolisi umkhathi ezifana nehayidrojini engangcolisi imvelo, i-biomass, amandla omoya, amandla adonswa elangeni kanye nasemanzini, phakathi kwezinye zamandla avuselelekayo.

src_text: Mehutahuta ye tswakanego ya mohlagase hlola tekatekano magareng ga methopo ya mohlagase go netefatša mohlagase wa go botega wa go kgona go fihlelela dinyakwa tša mohlagase tša naga ye tšeo di golelago godimo.
tgt_text: Le nhlanganisela yamandla ivumela ukuhambisana phakathi kwemithombo yezamandla ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthembeka kwamandla azohlangabezana nezidingo zamandla zezwe ezikhulayo.

src_text: Go Hlaba Meento ya Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Ukugomela iSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Kabinete amogetše phuhlamo ye kgolo ya diphetelo tša COVID-19 tšeo di gatišitšwego ka mo Afrika Borwa mo dibekeng tše mmalwa tša go feta ebile hlohleleditše batho ka moka bao ba nago le maswanedi go tšwelapele go entela, ka ge seo se thuša go efoga malwetši šoro, go amogelwa maokelong le go bolawa ke COVID-.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele ukwehla okubonakalayo kwabantu abatheleleka nge-COVID-19 eNingizimu Afrika emavikini ambalwa edlule futhi igqugquzele bonke abantu abafanelekile ukuthi baqhubeke bagome, lokho okusiza ukugwema ukugula kakhulu, ukulaliswa esibhedlela kanye nokufa imbala..     Ingxenye yabo bonke abantu abadala eNingizimu Afrika sebethole okungenani umthamo owodwa womgomo we-COVID-19 kuze kube manje.

Uhulumeni uhlose ukusebenzisa imali ebolekwe kamuva nje enenzalo ephansi esanda kugunyazwa yiBhange Lomhlaba ukuthenga eminye imigomo ye-COVID-19 ukuqinisekisa ukuthi isizwe sivikeleke ngokwanele egciwaneni.

src_text: Palo ya go feta seripa ya batho ba bagolo ba MaAfrika Borwa go fihla gabjale ba amogeditšwe selekanyo sa moento wa COVID-19 se ka bago se tee.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yacubungula udaba oluhlobene nokuqhubekayo ekulawulweni kobhubhane lwe-COVID-19, ikakhulukazi ngenqubekelaphambili eyenziwayo ukuthi sibuyele ngokuphelele emisebenzini yezenhlalo-mnotho eyejwayelekile.

src_text: Mmušo ikemišeditše go diriša dikadimo tša tswala ya fase tšeo di sa tšogo dumelelwa ke Panka ya Lefase go reka dilekanyo tša tlaleletšo tša moento wa COVID-19 le go netefatša gore setšhaba se šireletšegile ka fao go lekanego kgahlanong le diphetelo tše dingwe tše ka bago gona.
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Wezempilo, uDkt Joe Phaahla, uzohlinzeka ngeminye imininingwane.

src_text: Kabinete lebeletše gape merero ya go amana le dikgatelopele tša go laola leuba la COVID-19, kudukudu ka kgatelopele ye fihleletšwego ya go boela sekeng ka botlalo ga ditiragalo tša setlwaedi tša ikonomi maphelong rena.
tgt_text: Usuku Lukazwelonke Lwentsha  .

src_text: Tona ya Maphelo, Ngaka Joe Phaahla tla fa tshedimošo ka moka ka botlalo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibonge bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngokuhlanganyela emibungazweni yoSuku Lukazwelonke Lwentsha ngoLwesine, mhla we-16 kuNhlangulana 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: "Sigqugquzela izindlela zokuphila ezisimeme kanye nokuzimelelela ingomuso elingcono kwabantu abasha."

src_text: Letšatši la Bosetšhaba la Baswa.
tgt_text: Umoya wentshisekelo kanye nokuzimelela okuboniswe intsha kulolonke izwe nakanjani yikho okuyimbangela yokubungaza kanye nokuba nethemba lekusasa elingcono.

src_text: Kabinete lebogile MaAfrika Borwa ka moka ge ba tsenetše meketeko ya naga ye ya Letšatši la Bosetšhaba la Baswa ka Labone, 16 Phupu 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Go hlohleletša mekgwa ya go iphediša ya go tšea nako ye telele le tielelo ya baswa go fihlelela bokamoso bjo bo kaonafatšego.” Moya wa lethabo le go se boele morago wo laeditšwego ke baswa go ralala setšhaba ka moka ke lona lebakabaka la meketeko le tshepho ya bokamoso bjo bo kaonafetšego.
tgt_text: Njengoba iNyanga Kazwelonke Yentsha iya ekupheleni, masiqinise imizamo yethu yokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abasha bayafinyelela ezinhlelweni zokubeseka eziningi ezihlinzekwa nguhulumeni futhi sibheke ukuzibandakanya kwabo emnothweni..     Ezemisebenzi Kahulumeni, njengomqashi omkhulukazi, usebhekane nale nselele ngokuvulela labo abaqede izifundo zabo ezikhungweni eziphakeme abangasebenzi ukuthi bafunde umsebenzi bathole isipiliyoni ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lwe-Public Service Graduate Internship and Learnership Programme.

src_text: Ge Kgwedi ya Bosetšhaba ya Baswa ya mafelelong re ntšheng ka ga tšhwene mo maitekelong rena go netefatša gore baswa ba kgona go ikhweletša mananeo mantši go ba thekga ao tlago ka mmušo le go ba kgontšha go kgatha tema ka mafolofolo ikonoming..     Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Setšhaba, bjalo ka mongmošomo wa go thwala batho ka bontši arabetše tlhotlo ye ka go kgontšha dialoga tša go se šome go hwetša maitemogelo ka Lenaneo la Dialoga la Boithutelamaitemogelo la Ditirelo tša Setšhaba le la Boithutelamošomo.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uphinde waqalisa iSikhwama Sokusungula Imisebenzini Emiphakathini (i-SEF) futhi wavuselela imizamo yokusungulwa kwemisebenzi yoHlelo Lukazwelonke Lokusiza Intsha (i-NYS) ngayinye ezodonsela abantu abasha abayizi-50 000 emnothweni.

src_text: Mmušo phethagatša gape le Sekhwama sa Mešomo Setšhabeng (SEF) ebile tsošološitše masolo tlhomo ya mešomo Ditirelo tša Bosetšhaba tša Baswa (NYS) ao ka bobedi ga ona tlo batametšago baswa ba go lekana 50 000 ka gare ga ditiragalo tša ikonomi.
tgt_text: Le mizamo angeke nje kuphela isize ngesipiliyoni somsebenzi esidingekayo kodwa izogcizelela ukubaluleka kwezakhamuzi ezisebenzayo.

src_text: Masolo a ka se thuše fela ka go aba maitemogelo mošomo ao tsomegago kudu eupša tla thuša gape le ka go tsošološa mohola wa gore badudi ba kgathe tema ka mafolofolo.
tgt_text: I-SEF isebenzisana nezinhlangano ezingekho kuhulumeni (ama-NGO) ngesikhathi i-NYS ifaka ohlwini abantu abasha emisebenzini esiza imiphakathi kulolonke leli lizwe..     Ezokuthutha    .

src_text: SEF šomišana le mekgatlo ye sego ya mmušo (di-NGO) mola NYS ngwala fase maina baswa gore be bona ba khumanago mešomo mo ditirelong tša go hola batho setšhabeng go ralala naga ka bophara.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele iQhingasu Elinamaphuzu ayi-11 okubhekana nokuvalwa kwemigwaqo kanye nokuqashwa kwabantu bakwamanye amazwe njengabashayeli bamaloli.

Iqhingasu, elaqhamuka neKomidi Longqongqoshe Lezemigwaqo Nokuthuthwa Kwempahla (i-IMC) ngokubambisana nababambiqhaza embonini yezemigwaqo nokuthuthwa kwempahla, ligqugquzela phakathi kokunye ukuthotshelwa kwezidingo zezimvume zokuhamba kanye nokuthotshelwa kwemithetho yezabasebenzi.

src_text: Dinamelwa.
tgt_text: I-IMC yasungulelwa ukubhekana nokunyuka kwezinga lokuvalwa kwemigwaqo kanye nemibhikisho eyenziwa abashayeli bamaloli baseNingizimu Afrika abangeneme.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše Leano la Magato la Dintlha tše 11 go swaragana le go thibiwa ga ditsela le go goketšwa ga batšwantle bjalo ka baotleladilori.
tgt_text: Imibhikisho nokuvalwa kwemigwaqo kuphazamisa kakhulu ukuhamba, kufake itwetwe kubatshalizimali bangaphandle futhi ikakhulukazi, kuthunaza umnotho kanye nokuthunyelwa kwempahla ebalulekile esebenzisa imigwaqo esuke ivaliwe.

src_text: Leano le, la go hlangwa ke Komiti ya Ditona tša ka Nageng (IMC) yeo Šoganago le Mešomo ya Legoro la Difatanaga tša go Rwala Merwalo le ya Ditsela ka moka le bakgathatema ba intasteri ya merwalo le ya ditsela, magareng ga tše dingwe, le go hlohleletša go phethagatšwa ga dinyakwa tša VISA le go obamela melao ya bašomi..     IMC hlametšwe go kalokana le palo ye nyologelago godimo ya go thibiwa ga ditsela le ya megwanto ka baotleladilori ba MaAfrika Borwa bao ba sa kgotsofalago.
tgt_text: Ukuswelakala kwamanzi kuMkhandludolobha i-Nelson Mandela Bay (i-NMB).

src_text: Megwanto le go thibiwa ga ditsela ama gampe go sepela ga dinamelwa ka thelelo tšhoša babeeletši ba dinagadišele le gape go ama gampe dilo tše bohlokwahlokwa go swana le ikonomi le magatokamano kabo ya dilo tše bohlokwa tša go šomiša tšona ditsela tšeo di amegilego.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele ukungenelela koMnyango Wezamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle (i-DWS) kuMkhandludodlobha i-NMB eMpumalanga Kapa ukugwema ukwehla kweZinga Lamanzi emadamini njengoba lesi sifundazwe sibhekene nokuswelakala kwamanzi okunzima okuqale ngowezi-.

src_text: Tlhaelelo ya Meetse Mmasepaleng wa Metsesetoropo wa Boemakepe bja Nelson Mandela (NMB).
tgt_text: I-DWS isebenzisana nesifundazwe ukuqalisa izinyathelo zesikhathi esifishane, esiphakathi neside ukubhekana nokuqeda umthelela wesomiso ongaba khona.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše magato go tla ka Kgoro ya Meetse le Tlhwekišo (DWS) Mmasepaleng wa Metsesetoropo wa NMB gola Kapa Bodikela go efoga Letšatši la go Hloka Lerothi la Meetse ka ge profense ye lebagane le tlhaelelo ye šoro ya meetse yeo thomilego ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yanxusa abahlali base-NMB ukuthi bathobele imithetho yamanzi ebekwe kumasipala wendawo ukuqinisekisa ukutholakala kwamanzi.

src_text: DWS šoma le profense go phethagatša magato nakwana magareng le nako ye telele go šogašogana le go fediša ditlamorago tše ka bago gona tša komelelo.
tgt_text: Phezu kwakho konke, ukusetshenziswa kwamanzi kufanele kuncishiswe ngamalitha ayizigidi ezingama-50 ngosuku, kusuka ezingeni lamanje elingamalitha ayizigidi ezingama-280 ngosuku kuye emalitheni ayizigidi ezingama-230 ngosuku.

src_text: Kabinete hlohleleditše gape badudi ba NMB go latela ditaelo tšeo ba di filwego tša go fokoletšwa meetse tšeo ba di filwego ke mebasepala ya fao go netefatša gore meetse ga fele.
tgt_text: Ubugebengu nenkohlakalo  .

src_text: Ka kakaretšo, tšhomišo ya meetse swanetše go fokotšwa ka dilithara tše 50 milione ka letšatši, go tloga maemong gona bjale dilithara tše 280 milione ka letšatši go theošetšwa fase go dilithara tše 230 milione ka letšatši.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele ukuboshwa kwakamuva kwesikhulu soMnyango Wezasekhaya ehhovisi elise-Benoni ngokukhiphela owokufika wase-Bangladeshi iphasiphothi yomgunyathi.

src_text: Bosenyi le bomenetša.
tgt_text: Isikhulu lesi, okunguSibongile Simelane, uthole ibheyili yezi-R5 000 eNkantolo kaMantshi yase-Benoni ngoLwesibili, mhla wama-21 kuNhlangulana.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše go golegwa malobanyana mo ga mohlankedi wa Kgoro ya Merero ya Selegae wa go šomela kantorong ya Benoni mabapi le go gatiša pasporoto ya bofora go mofaladi wa go tšwa Bangladeshi.
tgt_text: Owokufika wase-Bangladeshi, uMnu Fahim Kazi, wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngesikhathi ezama ukuphuma kuleli mhla we-12 kuNhlaba 2022 esebenzisa igama elithi, ‘u-Lebogang Ndlovu’.

src_text: Mohlankedi yo, Mme Sibongile Simelane filwe peile ya R5 000 kua Kgorotsheko ya Maseterata ya Benoni ka Labobedi, 21 Phupu.
tgt_text: UMnyango Wezasekhaya (i-DHA) isanda kuxosha umlingisi we-Lithuanian, uNks Ieva Andrejevaite, obefuna ukuhlukumeza abaphathi abalawula ababaleki eNingizimu Afrika ngesikhathi eziqambela udaba lokufuna ukufaka isicelo sokukhoseliswa ngenxa "yempi ese-Ukraine".

src_text: Motšwantle yo wa Bangladeshi, Morena Fahim Kazi golegilwe le gare leka go tšwa ka mo nageng ka la 12 Mopitlo 2022 šomiša leina la gagwe la bofora la ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyawuncoma kakhulu umsebenzi owenziwe uPhiko lwe-DHA Olulwisana Nenkohlakalo.

src_text: Kgoro ya Merero ya Selegae (DHA) malobanyana mo bušeditše morago mmapadi wa Lithuania, Mohumagatšana Leva Andrejevaite, yo bego leka go šomiša bošaedi melao ya Afrika Borwa ya taolo ya bafaladi ge ihlamela maaka matala gore be nyaka go dira kgopelo ya asaelamo ka baka la ntwa ye kgatlampanago gola Ukraine.
tgt_text: Ishayela ihlombe futhi igqugquzela bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi baqhubeke nokubika lezi zenzo zobugebengu.

src_text: Kabinete lebogiša mošomo wo dirwago ke Yuniti ya go Lwantšha Bosenyi ya DHA opela diatla le go hlohleletša MaAfrika Borwa go tšwelapele go bega ditiragalo tša mohuta wo tša bosenyi.
tgt_text: Izenzo ezingekho emthethweni zabantu baseNingizimu Afrika abadayisa ubunikazi babo zinomthelela omubi kakhulu ekuvikelekeni kwezwe kanye nesimo senhlalo-mnotho.

src_text: Magato ao sego molaong MaAfrika Borwa ba go rekiša dipasa tša bona nale ditlamorago tše mpe kudu tša go fihla kgole godimo ga tšhireletšo ya naga ye le seemo sa ikonomi maphelong.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uzoqhubeka nokubhekana kanzima nanoma ngubani obandakanyeka ezenzweni ezingekho emthethweni ezibukela phansi imithetho yethu yokungena nokuphuma kuleli lizwe, ngaphandle kokusaba ukwenzelela.

src_text: Mmušo tla tšwelapele go tšea magato go tiišetšwa letsogo kgahlanong le motho mang goba mang yo amegago ditiragalong tše sego molaong tša go nyatša melao ya rena ya bofaladi, ntle le poifo goba sepitša.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela ukulahlwa yicala nokugwetshwa kothisha waseThekwini, uNks Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – owagwetshwa iminyaka emithathu azoyidonsa ngaphandle kanye neminyaka emine engaphakathi, kwalengiswa kuyoyonke emithathu, eNkantolo kaMantshi yaseMlazi KwaZulu Natali - ngokuphula uMthetho Wezokhetho Lohulumeni Basekhaya, wangowezi-2000 (UMthetho wama-27 wezi-2000).

src_text: Kabinete amogetše gape sephetho sa go phara molato le go ahlolelwa ga morutiši wa Durban Mohumagatšana Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – yo ahloletšwego kotlo ya mengwaga ye meraro ya go bewa leihlo ke ba tshokollo ya bagolegwa le go golegwa tekano ya mengwaga ye mene, yeo fegilwego ka botlalo lebaka la mengwaga ye meraro kua Kgorotsheko ya Selete ya Umlazi gola KwaZulu-Natal ka baka la go gataka Pušoselegae: Molao wa Dikgetho tša Mebasepala, 2000 (Molao 27 wa 2000).
tgt_text: Njengothisha wasesikoleni esasisetshenziswa njengesikhungo sokuvota ngesikhathi Sokhetho Lomasipala ngoMfumfu ngowezi-2021, uNks Gabuza uwavumile amacala okukhwabanisa amavoti angama-24, kufaka phakathi ayi-12 oKhetho Lomasipala namanye ayi-12 oKhetho Lwesigceme.

src_text: Bjalo ka morutiši sekolong seo se bego se šomišetšwa bjale ka setiši sa dikgetho nakong ya Dikgetho tša Mebasepala ka Diphalane 2021, Mohumagatšana Gabula ipone molato ka go lahlela ka dipaloto tša bofora tše 24 ka lepokisaneng la dikgetho, go akaretšwa tše 12 tša dipaloto tša Dikgetho tša Mebasepala le tše 12 tša dipaloto tša Dikgetho tša Wate.
tgt_text: Ukulahlwa yicala nokugwetshwa kubonisa ukuzinikela kweKhomishini Yezokhetho eNingizimu Afrika ukungenelela ngesikhathi kanye nokubhekana nemiphumela yesimo.

src_text: Go pharwa molato ga gagwe le kahlolelo ye e filwego di tloga di laetša boikgafo bja Khomišene ya Dikgetho ya Afrika Borwa bja go tsena gare seemo seo ka bonako le go diriša magato taolo ya ditlamorago.
tgt_text: Lokhu futhi kuyisiqinisekiso sezindlela zokusebenza kwezokhetho, ezilokhu ziqinile selokhu kwethulwa i-Voter Management Device evimbela ukuthi umuntu avote kabili.

src_text: Ye ke kgonthišišo ya go tiišetšwa letsogo ya dipeakanyo tša dikgetho, yeo go tloga kgale bego matlafetše nakong ya ge go be go tsebagatšwa Metšhene ya Sebjalebjale ya go Ngwadiša Bakgethi ya go kgona go thibela bakgethi go bouta gabedi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekise ukuthi ukhetho lungummongo wentando yeningi labantu futhi kumele luvikelwe ngazo zonke izindlela..      Ingqungquthela ye-12 YoNgqongqoshe (i-MC12) yeNhlangano Yezohwebo Yomhlaba (i-WTO).

src_text: Kabinete netefaditše gore dikgetho ke motheo wa temokrasi ya gaborena le gore di swanetše go šireletšwa ka fao go ka kgonagalago..     Khonferense ya Ditona ya bo-12 (MC12) ya Setheo sa Dikgwebišano Magareng ga Dinaga tša Lefase (WTO).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele imiphumela ye-WTO MC12 ebibanjwe e-Geneva, e-Switzerland kusuka mhla ziyi-12 kuya mhla ziyi-17 kuNhlangulana 2022, ikakhulukazi isinqumo sokuthi amazwe afanelekile angeqa ngaphezulu ilungelo lobunikazi bemigomo ye-COVID-19 kuze kube ngowezi-.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše dipoelo tša WTO MC12 ye bego swaretšwe kua Geneva, Switzerland go thoma ka la 12 go fihla ka la 17 Phupu 2022, kudukudu sephetho sa gore dinaga tše nago le maloka di ka kgona go fekeetša dilaesense tša maswanedi tšhireletšosemolao ya nako ye rileng ya meento ya COVID-19 go fihla ka ngwaga wa.
tgt_text: Isinqumo sokudlulisela lokhu kwezokwelashwa nokuhlonzwa kwe-COVID-19 simiswe izinyanga eziyisithupha.

src_text: Sephetho sa ge eba go swanetše go oketšwa mekgwa ya go alafa le go phekola COVID-19 se diegišitšwe ka dikgwedi tše tshela.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika beyilokhu ihamba phambili esicelweni sokuthi i-WTO isuse amalungelo obunikazi emigomweni ye-COVID-19 lokho okuzoqinisekisa ukufinyelela okulinganayo emigomweni futhi kuvumele namazwe anekhono lokuzikhiqizela imigomo ukuthi enze njalo.

src_text: Afrika Borwa be eteletše pele boipiletšo bja WTO bja go beelathoko maloka botlhami le boikgopolelo ao tlemaganego le meento ya COVID-19 ao tlo netefatšago gore go ba le khumanego ya go lekalekana ya meento le go kgontšha dinaga tša go ba le mabokgoni go itirela meento go dira bjalo.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela iphinde yazinikela kwinqubo evulelekile nebandakanya wonke umuntu ukuguqula yonke imisebenzi yayo futhi yavuma ukuhwebelana okuzobhekana nezinto ezifana nezempilo, ukubeka imikhawulo kuxhaso lwezokudoba, ukumiswa kwesikhashana kokuthengisa ngobuchwepheshe be-inthanethi kanye nokutholakala kokudla     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Khonferense ye ikgafetše gape go latela tshepedišo ya go se ute selo le ya go akaretša bohle ya go hlama leswa mediro le mehola ya yona ka moka le go dumelelana go tsenela sekgoboko sa dikwanelo tša dikgwebišano tša go swaragana le magoro go etša maphelo, go thea magomo go diphokoletšo tša boreahlapi, kiletšo ya dikgwebišano ka mokgwa wa elektroniki gotee le tšhireletšego ya dijo     Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: Inqubekelaphambili oHlelweni Lokushintshela Ekusakazeni Ngedijithali (i-BDM).

src_text: Kgatelopele Lenaneong la go Fetogela Kgašong ya Titšithale (BDM).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibikelwe ngezakamuva oHlelweni lwe-BDM futhi yayiphawula inqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe ngokuxhunywa kwamabhokisi njengengxenye yokushintshela ekusakazeni ngedijithali kusukwa kwi-analogi.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše tshedimošetšo ka Lenaneo la BDM le go lemoga kgatelopele ye dirilwego ka go lokelwa ga mapokisana dithelebišene bjalo ka karolo ya go fulara kgašo ya dieriele go fetogela kgašong ya titšithale.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yagcizelela ukuphuthuma kokuphothula i-BDM ukuze kuzovuleka amagagasi omoya adingwa omakhalekhukhwini, kanye neminye imisebenzi ehlobene nobunye ubuchwepheshe bolwazi nezokuxhumana..     UNgqongqoshe Wezokuxhumana Nobuchwepheshe Bedijithali uKhumbudzo Ntshavheni uzoba nesithangami sabezindaba kusasa (ngoLwesihlanu, mhla wama-24 kuNhlangulana) ukunikeza ngeminye imininingwane.

src_text: Kabinete gateletše gapegape nyakego ya ka pelapela ya go ruma BDM go kgona go bulela tsela maphoto ao nyakegago dikgokagano tša gohle tša motlalanaga, gotee le tshedimošo ye nngwe le theknolotši ya dikgokagano ya go amana le morero wo..     Tona ya Dikgokagano le Theknolotši ya Titšithale Khumbudzo Ntshavheni tla swara kopano ya tshedimošetšo ya babegaditaba gosasa (Labohlano, 24 Phupu) go fana ka tshedimošo ka botlalo.
tgt_text: UMbiko Kazwelonke Wonyaka Ngesimo Samalungelo Ezingane.

src_text: Pego ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ka Seemo sa Bosetšhaba sa Ditokelo tša Bana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze uMbiko wesibili kazwelonke Wonyaka Ngesimo samalungelo Ezingane ukuthi ushicilelwe.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ga Pego ya Bobedi ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya Bosetšhaba ya Ditokelo tša Bana.
tgt_text: Umbiko lo uhlinzeka ngezakamuva ekuqalisweni kweQhingasu Likazwelonke Lezingane lesikhathi sangowezi-2019 kuya ngowezi-.

src_text: Pego ye tsebiša ka seemo sa ditaba ka phethagatšo ya Leano la Magato Bosetšhaba la bana go lebeletšwe nako ya magareng ga 2019-. .

Pego ye laetša diphenyo tšeo di gatišitšwego mengwageng ya magareng ga 2020- laetša gape le magoro ao santše lego tlhotlo, go akaretšwa le polokego ya bana le dithulano tšeo di tšwetšego pele magareng ga bahloki le bahumi go lebeletšwe bana.
tgt_text: Umbiko ugqamisa lokho okuzuzwe ngesikhathi sangowezi-2020 kuya kowezi-.

src_text: Pego ye laetša ka fao leuba la COVID-19 le amilego bana ka yona mengwaga ye boletšwego..     Magato go namola seemo ao phethagatšwago ke mmušo nepile go lemoša batho ka moka ka ditokelo tša bana, go ya le ka fao go hlalošitšwego ka gare ga Molaotheo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: Uphinde ugqamise izingxenye ezisenezinselele, kubandakanya ukuphepha kwezingane kanye negebe elikhona phakathi kwabadla imbuya ngothi kanye nalabo abadla izambane likapondo uma kubhekwa ezinganeni.

src_text: Magato a thekga gape le ditlamego tša naga ye godimo ga Dikwano tša UN ka Ditokelo tša Bana (UNCRC) le Tumelelano ya Afrika ka Ditokelo le Boiketlo bja Bana (ACRWC).
tgt_text: Umbiko uphinde ubonise ukuthi ubhubhane lwe-COVID-19 luzithinte kanjani izingane ngalesi sikhathi..     Izinyathelo zokungenelela eziqaliswa nguhulumeni sihlose ukugcina amalungelo ezingane, njengokubeka koMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wangowe-.

src_text: Afrika Borwa ke ye nngwe ya naga ya go saenela kwano go bobedi UNCRC le ACRWC..     Pego ye hlamilwe ka go rerišana pele le dikgoro tša mmušo le palo ye bonagalago ya bakgathatema ba maleba maemong bosetšhaba le profense.
tgt_text: Ziphinde zeseke izibopho zezwe kwiZivumelwano ze-UN ngaMalungelo Ezingane (i-UNCRC) kanye noSomqulu Wase-Afrika weNhlalakahle Yezingane (i-ACRWC).

src_text: Pego ye feletšego ka botlalo tla phatlalatšwa websaeteng ya Kgoro ya Tlhabollo ya Leago mo go: www.dsd.gov.za.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika yasayina kokubili i-UNCRC kanye ne-ACRWC..     Umbiko wahlanganiswa ngokuxoxisana neminyango kahulumeni kanye nababambiqhaza abaningi abafanelekile emazingeni kazwelonke nakwizifundazwe.

src_text: Pego ye Kopantšwego ya Kgafetšakgafetša ya Afrika Borwa ya lekga la boraro go fihla go la boselela yeo hlagišeditšwego UNCRC.
tgt_text: Umbiko ogcwele uzofakwa kwiwebhusayithi yoMnyango Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi: www.dsd.gov.za.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go hlagišetšwa UNCRC Pego ya Kgafetšakgafetša ya boraro go fihla go ya boselela.
tgt_text: Umbiko Ohlanganisiwe weNingizimu Afrika wesithathu kuya kowesithupha oya ku-UNCRC.

src_text: Pego ye latela Pego ya bobedi ya Kgafetšakgafetša yeo hlagišeditšwego UNCRC ka..     Pego ye hlamilwe ka go tsamaišana le Kgatišo 44 ya UNCRC, ebile akaretša mebono le ditšhišinyo tšeo di dirilwego go tšwa pegong ya mafelelo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikugunyazile ukubekwa ezithebeni koMbiko wesithathu kuya kowesithupha ku-UNCRC.

src_text: UNCRC rometše mebono le ditšhišinyo tša yona tša naga ye ka..     Go hlangwa ga pego ye go dirilwe ka go rerišana pele le dikgoro ka moka tšeo di amegago le bakgathatema ka moka go ralala le naga.
tgt_text: Lo mbiko ulandela uMbiko wesibili owethulelwa i-UNCRC ngowezi-..     Umbiko uhlanganiswe ngokulandela iSihloko sama-44 se-UNCRC, futhi uqukethe okuboniwe kanye nezincomo ezenziwe kumbiko owedlule.

src_text: Pego ye feletšego ka botlalo tla dirwa phatlalatša ge šetše hlagišeditšwe UNCRC.
tgt_text: I-UNCRC yathumela lokho eyakuthola kanye nezincomo zezwe ngowezi-..     Ukuhlanganiswa kwawo kwenziwa ngokuxoxisana nayoyonke iminyango efanele kanye nababambiqhaza ezweni lonkana.

src_text: Pego ya Bosetšhaba phethagatšong ya Lenaneothero le Leswa la Metsesetoropo.
tgt_text: Umbiko ogcwele uzokhishelwa umphakathi uma usudlule ezithebeni ze-UNCRC.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go hlagišwa ga pego ya bosetšhaba ya mathomo ya Afrika Borwa ka phethagatšo ya Lenaneothero le Leswa la Metsesetoropo go Lenaneo la UN la Madulo Batho (UN-Habitat).
tgt_text: Umbiko kazwelonke ngokuqaliswa koHlelo Olusha Lokuthuthukiswa Kwamadolobha i-New Urban Agenda.

src_text: UN-Habitat amogetše Lenaneothero la yona le Leswa la Metsesetoropo kua Khonfereseng ya yona ka Dintlo le Tlhabollo ye Swarelelago ya Metsesetoropo ka Diphalane.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukulethwa kombiko kazwelonke wokuqala waseNingizimu Afrika ngokuQaliswa koHlelo Olusha Lokuthuthukiswa Kwamadolobha oHlelweni Lokuhlaliswa Kwabantu lwe-UN (i-UN-Habitat).

src_text: Mebušo ye lego maloko lenaneo le go be bo letetšwe gore romele dipego ka boithaopo tša gore mošomo tlela kae.
tgt_text: I-UN-Habitat yamukela UHlelo lwayo Olusha Lokuthuthukiswa Kwamadolobha kwiNgqungquthela yayo Yokwakha kanye Nokuthuthukiswa Okusimeme Kwamadolobha ngoMfumfu ngowezi-.

src_text: Afrika Borwa thekgile go amogelwa ga Lenaneothero le Leswa la Metsesetoropo le go le phethagatša ka morago ga gore le amogelwe ka go šomiša Tlhako ya naga ye ya Mohlakanelwa ya Tlhabollo ya Metsesetoropo (IUDF).
tgt_text: Amazwe angamalungu ayelindeleke ukuthi alethe imibiko yenqubekelaphambili ngokuzithandela.

src_text: Nepo ya IUDF ke go hlahla go hlabollwa ga madulo metsesetoropo go akaretša batho ka moka go tielela le go phelega..     Pego ye ya kgatelopele ya mošomo hlamilwe ka go rerišana pele le didiko tša mmušo tša bosetšhaba, tša profense le tša selegae gotee le di-NGO tše maleba.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika yakweseka ukwamukelwa koHlelo Olusha Lokuthuthukiswa Kwamadolobha futhi yalandelisa ngokuqalisa ukulisebenzisa oHlakeni Oludidiyelwe Lokuthuthukiswa Kwamadolobha (i-IUDF).

src_text: Leanopeakanyo la Mohlakanelwa la Tlhabollo ya Baswa (IYDS).
tgt_text: I-IUDF ihlose ukuhlahla indlela ekuthuthukisweni kwezindawo zamadolobha ezifaka wonke umuntu, ezinamandla nekuphilekayo kuzona..     Umbiko wenqubekelaphambili wahlanganiswa ngokuxoxisana nezinhlaka zikahulumeni kuzwelonke, ezifundazweni nasemakhaya, kanye nama-NGO afanele.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phethagatšwa ga IYDS.
tgt_text: IQhingasu Elididiyelwe Lokuthuthukiswa Kwentsha (i-IYDS).

src_text: Leanopeakanyo le le kgontšha Pholisi ya Bosetšhaba ya Baswa ya 2020 go fihla ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukuqaliswa kwe-IYDS.

src_text: Yona hlatholla magato, diprotšeke le mananeo ao tlo dirwago ke bakgathatema ba go fapafapana go tšwa dihlophaneng tša baswa swaragana gape le ka go fokotša go ipušeletša gantši ga magato mmušo le go fa tlhahlo ya ka fao mekgatlo ye lego setšhabeng le lefapha la praebete ka thekgago baswa gore ba ka ikhweletša bjang menyetla ya mešomo.
tgt_text: Leli qhingasu lingumphumela weNqubomgomo Kazwelonke Yentsha yangowezi-2020 kuya kowezi-.

src_text: Ge go be go hlangwa leanopeakanyo le, mafapha go fapafapana setšhaba amegile go lona go fa dikgopolo le go ntšha sa bona sa mafahleng.
tgt_text: Icacisa izinyathelo, imiklamo kanye nezinhlelo okumele zithathwe ngababambiqhaza abehlukahlukene abaphuma ezinhlanganweni zentsha.

src_text: Sengwalwa sa Makgoraditsela ka Pabalelo le Tšhomišano ye Swarelelago ya Diphedi tša go Fapafapana tša Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Iphinde ibhekane nokunciphisa ukuphindaphinda izingenelelo zikahulumeni futhi iphinde ibe ngumhlahlandlela wokuthi umphakathi kanye nomkhakha ozimele ungabeseka kanjani abantu abasha ukuthi bafinyelele emathubeni.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše seakanywa sa Mokgoraditsela ka Pabalelo le Tšhomišo ye Swarelelago ya Diphedi tša go Fapafapana tša Afrika Borwa gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona.
tgt_text: Ukuhlanganiswa kwaleli qhingasu kubandakanya imibono eyehlukene ephuma kwimikhakha eyehlukene yomphakathi.

src_text: Diphedi tša go fapafapana tša Afrika Borwa di fana ka motheo wo bohlokwa wa go kgontšha kgolo ya ikonomi le tlhabollo, ebile wona motheo wo tloga le bohlokwa kudu go lebeletšwe mekgwa yeo batho ba iphedišago ka yona..     Sengwalwa se sa makgoraditsela ke sona se kgontšhago ditšhišinyo tšeo di dirilwego ke Sehlopha sa Maemo Godimodimo sa Ditsebi tšeo di thwetšwego ka 2019 go fetleka dipholisi tša rena tša bjale, melao le ditlwaedi ka merero ya go amana kudu le diphedi tše tša mohuta wa moswananoši..     Pego ye šišintše gore go hlangwe pholisi ye akaretšago tšohle ka pabalelo le tšhomišo ye swareleago ya diphedi tša go fapafapana tša naga ye.
tgt_text: UMthetho Odingidwayo Osahlongozwa Ngokongiwa Kwemvelo kanye Nokusetshenziswa Okusimeme Kwezitshalo Nezilwane Eziphilayo eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Pholisi ye tla phethagatšwa go ralala didiko ka moka tša mmušo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze uMthetho Odingidwayo osahlongozwa Ngokongiwa Kwemvelo kanye Nokusetshenziswa Okusimeme Kwezitshalo Nezilwane Eziphilayo eNingizimu Afrika ukuthi umphakathi uphawule ngawo.

src_text: Pabalelo tloga le bohlokwa lesolong la naga ye la go akgofiša kgolo ya ikonomi le tlhomo ya mešomo.
tgt_text: Izitshalo nezilwane eziphilayo eNingizimu Afrika kunikeza ngesisekelo esibalulekile ekukhuleni nasekuthuthukeni komnotho, futhi zibucayi kakhulu ezindleleni zokuziphilisa zabantu.

src_text: Leanopeakanyo la Nama ya Diphoofolo tša Lešoka.
Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ga seakanywa sa Leanopeakanyo la Nama ya Diphoofolo tša Lešoka gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona.
tgt_text: UMthetho Osadingidwa ungumphumela wezincomo ezenziwa iThimba Eliphezulu Lezingcweti elabekwa ngowezi-2019 ukubuyekeza izinqubomgomo zethu esinazo, imithetho kanye nemikhuba esenza ngayo ezindabeni ezihlobene nezitshalo nezilwane ezibalulekile.

src_text: Leanopeakanyo le le šeditše go botsefatša le go fetoša gabotse intasteri ya nama ya diphoofolo tša lešoka.
Le šetšane gape le go kgatha tema tšhireletšegong ya dijo ka mokgwa wo swarelelago.
tgt_text: Umbiko ubeke isincomo sokuthuthukiswa kwenqubomgomo egcwele yokongiwa kwemvelo nokusetshenziswa okusimeme kwezitshalo nezilwane eziphilayo zakuleli lizwe.

src_text: Intasteri ya nama ya diphoofolo tša lešoka ka boati ke intasteri ya go se lefišwe metšhelo ya go šoma thokwana le noši.
tgt_text: Le nqubomgomo izoqalisa ukusebenza kuzozonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni.

src_text: Leanopeakanyo le le šišintšwego le fana ka leano la phethagatšo leo le tla botsefatšago le go matlafatša intasteri ye bjalo ka bobedi moabi wa tšhireletšego ya dijo le lefapha la kgolo ya ikonomi leo le tla thušago go hloma menyetla ya mešomo     Melaokakanywa.
tgt_text: Ukongiwa kwemvelo kubalulekile emkhankasweni wezwe wokuqhubela phambili ukukhula komnotho nokusungulwa kwemisebenzi.

src_text: Molaokakanywaphetošwa ka Kakaretšo wa 2022 wa Merero ya Setšo.
tgt_text: IQhingasu Ngenyama Yenyamazane.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go hlagišwa Palamenteng ga Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2022 wa Merero ya Setšo gore Palamente go sekaseke goya pele.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthetho Ohlongozwayo weQhingasu Ngenyama Yenyamazane ukuze umphakathi uzophawula ngawo.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di šetšane le go fetleka Molao wa Setšo le wa Boetapele bja maKhoi-San, 2019 (Molao 3 wa 2019), wo tsentšwego tirišong ka la 1 Moranang.
tgt_text: Leli qhingasu lihlose ukufaka emthethweni futhi liguqule imboni yenyama yenyamazane.

src_text: Molaokakanywaphethošwa wa 2022 wa Tšhireletšo ya Temokrasi ya Molaotheo Kgahlanong le Ditiragalo tša Matšhošetši le tše dingwe tša go amana le tšona.
tgt_text: Liphinde lihlose ukufaka igalelo ekutholakaleni kokudla ngendlela esimeme.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go hlagišwa Palamenteng ga Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2022 ka Tšhireletšo ya Temokrasi ya Molaotheo Kgahlanong le Matšhošetši le tše dingwe tša go amana le ona gore Palamente go sekaseke goyapele.
tgt_text: Imboni yenyama yenyamazane ngokuvamile iyimboni engahlelekile esebenza ngokwehlukana phakathi.

src_text: Ge šetše amogetšwe, Molaokakanywa wo tla fetoša Molao wa bjale wa Tšhireletšo ya Temokrasi ya Molaotheo Kgahlanong le Matšhošetši le Ditiragalo tša go Amana le ona, 2004 (Molao 33 wa 2004).
tgt_text: Iqhingasu elihlongoziwe lihlinzeka ngesu lokuliqalisa elizokwenza ukuthi umkhakha lo uhleleke futhi uqine njengomhlinzeki wokudla kanye nomkhakha okhulisa umnotho lokho okuzosiza ukusungula amathuba omsebenzi     IMithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo fetile pele ditherišanong tšeo di tseneletšego tša setšhaba morago ga gore dumelelwe ke Kabinete ka Mopitlo.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wezezindaba Zendabuko wangowezi-.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di šetšane le go bea madulong didirišwa tšeo di tšweleditšwego ka nageng ye tša go lwantšha matšhošetši gotee le magato lefaseng ka bophara ao hlomilwego.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukulethwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wezezindaba Zendabuko wangowezi-2022 ePhalamende ukuze kuzoqhutshekwa nokuthi udingidwe.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di šogašogane gape le ditemana tšeo go tšeerwego sephetho ke Kgorotsheko ya Molaotheo sa gore ga di gate ka mošito tee le Molaotheo.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zihlose ukubuyekeza uMthetho Wamasiko Nobuholi babaThwa, wangowezi-2019 (uMthetho wesi-3 wezi-2019), owaqala ukusebenza mhla lu-1 kuMbasa.

src_text: Bjalo ka ye nngwe ya naga ye lego leloko la Khansele ya UN ya Tšhireletšego, Afrika Borwa tlamegile goya ka mohola wa yona go batametša kgauswi melao ya boditšhabatšhaba yeo šetšanego le go maatlafatša magato le go lwantšha matšhošetši lefaseng ka bophara     Ditiragalo tše di Tlago.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wokuvikelwa kweNtando Yeningi Labantu Engumthethosisekelo kuMaphekula kanye nezenzo Ezihlobene nakho wangowezi-..     IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukulethwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wokuvikelwa kweNtando Yeningi Labantu Engumthethosisekelo kuMaphekula kanye nezenzo Ezihlobene nakho wangowezi-2022 ePhalamende ukuthi kuqhutshekwe udingidwe.

src_text: Samiti ya bo-14 ya Brazil, Russia, India, China le Afrika Borwa (BRICS).
tgt_text: Uma sewamukelwe, lo Mthethosivivinywa uzochibiyela uMthetho wamanje Wokuvikelwa kweNtando Yeningi Labantu Engumthethosisekelo kuMaphekula kanye nezenzo Ezihlobene nakho, wangowezi-2004 (uMthetho wama-33 wangowezi-2004).

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla eta pele go kgatha tema ga Afrika Borwa Samiting ya bo-14 ya go swarwa ka dikgokagano tša bidio ya Baetapele ba BRICS yeo swerwego ke Rephabliki ya Bohle ya China go thoma ka Labone, 23 go fihla ka Labohlano, 24 Phupu.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa udlule emphakathini waphawula ngawo emva kokuthi wagunyazwa iKhabhinethi ngoNhlaba ngowezi-.
Izichibiyelo zihlose ukulinganisa izindlela zaleli lizwe zokulwa nobuphekula nezindlela zomhlaba ezibekiwe.

src_text: Maloko rena BRICS ba tšwelapele go hola naga ye.
tgt_text: Ziphinde zaphendula iziqeshana iNkantolo Yomthethosisekelo ezithole ukuthi azihambisani nomthethosisekelo.

src_text: Ngwageng wa go feta, diromelwantle tša go feta 17% tša Afrika Borwa di be di nepišitšwe dinageng tše dingwe tša BRICS, le gona palomoka ya go feta 29% ya ditšwantle tša rena di be di tšwa go tšona dinaga tše.
tgt_text: Njengezwe elisayine kuMkhandlu Wezokuvikela we-UN, iNingizimu Afrika ibophezelekile ukuthi ithathe imithetho yamazwe ngamazwe ekuhloswe ngayo ukuqinisa izindlela zokulwa nobuphekula emhlabeni iyisebenzise kuleli     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Boleng bja theko ya kgwebišano ye bo tšwelapele go golela godimo, ka palomoka ya dikgwebišano tša Afrika Borwa le dinaga tše dingwe tša BRICS batamela R702 bilione ka 2021, morago ga gore golele godimo go tloga go R487 bilione ka.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela ye-14 ye-Brazil, i-Russia, i-India, i-China neNingizimu Afrika (i-BRICS).

UMongameli u-Ramaphosa uzohola ukubamba iqhaza kweNingizimu Afrika kwiNgqungquthela Yabaholi ye-14 ye-BRICS ezobanjwa ngobuchwepheshe be-inthanethi ezosingathwa iRiphabhulikhi yaseShayina kusukela ngoLwesine, mhla wama-23 kuya kuLwesihlanu, mhla wama-24 kuNhlangulana.

src_text: Tšhomišanommogo gare ga dinaga tše lego maloko BRICS magorong go fapafapana go swana le maphelo le dikgwebišanong tše kaonafetšego godišitše intasteri ya ka mo nageng, le go hola dinaga ka moka tše lego maloko BRICS.

Dipeeletšo tša rena diprotšekeng tša tlhabollo ya mananeokgoparara le matsapa go fokotša go raragana ga magatotshepedišo mmušo ge go dirwa kgwebo di nepile go oketša diromelwantle go bagwebišani ba rena ba BRICS.
tgt_text: Ubulungu bethu be-BRICS buyaqhubeka nokuzuzela izwe.

src_text: Sekolo sa Marega sa Tshepedišo ya Ikonomi Mmušong.
tgt_text: Ngonyaka odlule impahla engaphezu kwama-17% yaseNingizimu Afrika yathunyelwa kwamanye amazwe angamalungu e-BRICS, futhi impahla engaphezu kwama-29% evela kwamanye amazwe ibibuya kula mazwe.

src_text: Sekolotlhahlo sa Bosetšhaba sa Mmušo (NSG) se tla be se swere Lenaneo la sona la Boraro la Balaodiphethiši ba tša Dipolotiki gola Johannesburg go thoma ka la 27 Phupu go fihla ka la 1 Mosegamanye.
tgt_text: Inani laloku kuhwebelana liyaqhubeka nokukhula, ngenani eliphelele lokuhweba kweNingizimu Afrika namanye amazwe elifika kwizigidigidi ezingama-R702 ngowezi-2021, lisuka kwizigidigidi ezingama-R487 ngowezi-.

src_text: Thuto ye go yona go tla tla Ditona go tšwa Côte d'Ivoire; Borwa bja Sudan le Afrika Borwa gotee le Balaodipharephare ba go tšwa Lesotho, Zambia, DRC, Tanzania le Ghana.

Dimeyara tša Afrika Borwa, gotee le maloko dikomiti tša meyara le makgotlaphethiši le bona ba tla ba gona..     Go letetšwe gore baetapelephethiši ba sepolotiki go tšwa dinageng tša go fapafapana ba ngwathelane dikgopolo le tšeo ba ithutilego go tšwa go tšona maemong go fapafapana ditiragalo ao ba itemogetšego ona mešomong ya bona ya tšatši ka tšatši.
tgt_text: Ukusebenzisana namalungu e-BRICS ezingxenyeni ezehlukene ezifana nezempilo kanye nokuhweba okuthuthukile kukhulise imboni yethu yasekhaya, futhi kwazuza wonke amalungu e-BRICS.

src_text: NSG hlamile lenaneo la ngwaga ka ngwaga go maloko lekgotlakhuduthamaga ka 2020, bjalo ka karolo ya thekgo ya lona ya boikgafo bja mmušo bja go hlola mmušo wo kgonago.
tgt_text: Utshalomali lwethu kwimiklamo yokuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda nemizamo yokunciphisa ubungozi uma kuqhutshwa ibhizinisi luhlose ukukhuphula impahla ethunyelwa kozakwethu abaku-BRICS.

src_text: Lenaneo le, magareng ga tše dingwe, le šetšane le go tlabela lekgotlakhuduthamaga ka tsebo mo didikong tše tharo tša mmušo ka boetapele bjo bjo kaonafetšego le mabokgoni go bea leihlo mošomo wo dirilwego gore go kgonagale go lekolaleswa ditlhotlo tša pušo tšeo di šitišago go akaretšwa ga bohle le kgolo yeo swarelelago ya ikonomi.
tgt_text: Isikole Esifundisa Ngokuphathwa Komnotho.

src_text: Letšatši la Boditšhabatšhaba la Nelson Mandela.
tgt_text: ISikole Sikahulumeni Kuzwelonke (i-NSG) izosingatha uHlelo lwesithathu Lwesikole Sokufundiswa Ngokuphathwa Komnotho esizofundisa Abaphathi Bezepolitiki eGoli kusuka mhla wama-27 kuNhlangulana kuya kumhla lu-1 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Letšatši la Boditšhabatšhaba la Nelson Mandela la lenyaga ka Mošupologo, 18 Mosegamanye le tla ketekelwa ka fase ga morero wa lefase ka bophara wo latelago: “Dira se se kgonago, ka seo nago le sona, kae goba kae mo lego gona”.
tgt_text: Sizohanjelwa ngoNgqongqoshe base-Côte d'Ivoire; e-South Sudan naseNingizimu Afrika; kanye nabaQondisi-Jikelele abasuka e-Lesotho, e-Zambia, e-Democratic Republic of Congo, e-Tanzania nase-Ghana.

src_text: Bjo ke boipiletšo bjo bo kwalakwaditšwego gore batho ba thekge le go kgatha tema lesolong le ka go logišana maano magato ao swarelelago nako ye telele go ba le ditlamorago tša go tšea telele.
tgt_text: Osodolobha baseNingizimu Afrika, kanye namakomidi osodolobha nesigungu esiphezulu, nabo bazohambela lezi zifundo..     Abaphathi abaphezulu bezepolitiki abasuka emazweni ahlukene balindeleke ukuthi babelane ngemibono kanye nezifundo ezisuselwa ezigamekweni ezehlukene abahlangabezana nazo emsebenzini wabo wansuku zonke.

src_text: Ye nngwe ya magato mohuta wo ke Dipoledišano tša Baswa tša Nelson Mandela le Lenaneo la Boetapele bja Potego leo le lebeletšego kudu merero ye diragalago gona bjale ya go ama baswa ka mo Afrika Borwa le go potologa lefase ka bophara.
tgt_text: I-NSG ihlanganisele amalungu eziphathimandla lolu hlelo lonyaka ngowezi-2020, njengengxenye yokweseka ukuzinikela kukahulumeni ekwakheni umbuso onekhono.

src_text: Sehla sa Metšhelo.
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezinye izinto, luhlose ukucijisa iziphathimandla ngaphakathi kwazo zontathu izinhlaka zikahulumeni ngobuholi obuthuthukisiwe kanye nangamakhono okwengamela ukuze zizokwazi ukuphinde zihlolisise izinselele ezibhekene nohulumeni ezicindezela ukubandakanywa kwawo wonke umuntu kanye nokukhula komnotho okusimeme.

src_text: Sehla sa go faela metšhelo ya 2022 se tla bulwa go thoma ka la 1 Mosegamanye go fihla ka la 24 Diphalane.
tgt_text: USuku Lomhlaba Lokubungaza u-Nelson Mandela.

src_text: Balefametšhelo ba hlohleletšwa go faela bohlatse bja bona bja tefo ya metšhelo mo go eFiling (www.sarsefiling.co.za) goba mo go MobiApp, elego sedirišwa sa Ditirelo tša Metšhelo tša Afrika Borwa (SARS)..     Ngwaga wo SARS tla tšwelapele ka go sekaseka balefametšhelo ka tee ka tee ka mokgwa wa go itiriša ka noši lego mokgwa wa go lefiša metšhelo ya letseno wo tlabetšwego pele ga nako go thuša go nolofatša tshepedišo ye ya go romela bohlatse bja tefo ya metšhelo.
tgt_text: Kulo nyaka uSuku Lokubungaza u-Nelson Mandela, mhla ziyi-18 kuNtulikazi 2022  luzogujwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo somhlaba wonke esithi: "Yenza lokho okwaziyo ukukwenza, ngalokho onakho, noma ikuphi lapho ukhona".

src_text: Ka 2021 balefametšhelo ba go feta dimilione tše tharo ba sekasekilwe ka ona mokgwa wo wa go itiriša ka noši.
tgt_text: Leli ikhwelo elicacile kubantu ukuthi beseke futhi babambe iqhaza emkhankasweni wokufaka igalelo kwizingenelelo ezisimeme ezizoba nomthelela oyohlale uhleli.

src_text: Thomelo ya bonako le ye nepagetšego ya bohlatse bja metšhelo ga netefatše fela gore balefametšhelo ba dula ba latela molao eupša thuša mmušo go abela MaAfrika Borwa ditirelo tšeo ba di hlokago kudu     Melaetša.
tgt_text: Esinye sezingenelelo saminyaka yonke iNkulumo-mpendulwano Yentsha ye-Nelson Mandela noHlelo Lokuhola Ngobuqotho olugxile ezihlokweni ezithinta abantu abasha eNingizimu Afrika nasemhlabeni jikelele.

src_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebišitše ditebogišo tša yona le go lakaletša bao ba latelago mahlogonolo: Moahlodi Owen Lloyd Rogers morago ga gore thwalwe malobanyana mo bjalo ka Moahlodi wa Kgorotsheko ya Molaotheo ya Afrika Borwa.Kabinete bile le Mopresidente Ramaphosa go lakaletša Mopresidente wa peleng Thabo Mbeki Letšatši le Lethabo la Matswalo Mengwaga ye 80 leo le ketekilego ka la 18 Phupu.
tgt_text: Isikhathi seNtela.

src_text: Morena Mbeki ke wo mongwe wa go bonelapele bokamoso bjo bjo gadimago bja šebešebe bja MaAfrika Borwa ka moka     Bao ba Thwetšwego MešomongBatho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona thuto tlo tiišetšwa le go netefatšwa ka tsela ye maleba.
tgt_text: Isikhathi sentela sangowezi-2022 sizovulwa kusuka lu-1 kuNtulikazi kuya mhla zingama-24 kuMfumfu.

src_text: Balaodi bao sego ba Lekgotlaphethiši ba Lekgotlataolo la Afrika Borwa la Diphofo     Ntate Ernest Khosa     Mme Bulelwa Koyana     Ntate Surendra Sooklal; led.
tgt_text: Abakhokhintela bayagqugquzelwa ukuthi bagcwalise amaphepha okubuyiswa kwentela ku-eFiling (www.sarsefiling.co.za) noma basebenzise i-MobiApp yoPhiko Lwezokuqoqwa Kwentela eNingizimu Afrika (u-SARS)..     Kulo nyaka u-SARS uzoqhubeka nokuthi uzenzele wona uhlolo lwabakhokhintela, okuwuhlelo abalenza bona ukusiza ukwenza lula ukubuyiswa kwamaphepha entela.

src_text: Mme Rejoice Edith Phewa.
tgt_text: Ngowezi-2021 bangaphezu kwezigidi ezintathu abakhokhinteka abahlolwa ngalolu hlelo oluzenzelayo.

src_text: Maloko Kantoro ya Kutullo ya Dikadimo tša Magae le Kutullo ya Dipeelo     Mme Kenosi Pearl Louisa Selane (Modulasetulo)     Mme Catharina Maria Van der Sandt     Ntate Errol Vincent Magerman     Moadbokheiti Mandla Dludlu     Morena Matsobane Gabriel Mello     Mme Palesa Mawasha     Mme Penelope Anne Beck-Paxton     Mme Sphiwe Dorris Mayinga     Mme Tshifhiwa Victor Mphigalale; lej.
tgt_text: Le ndlela yokubuyisa intela eyenzeka ngesikhathi futhi enembayo ayiqinisekisi nje kuphela ukuthi abakhokhintela balandela umthetho, kodwa iphinde isize uhulumeni ukuhambisa izidingonqangi kubantu baseNingizimu Afrika abazidinga kakhulu     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Tsebišo ka Seemo sa Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Ezakamuva ngeSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Kabinete lebogišitše batho ka moka mo Afrika Borwa ge ba tšeere sephetho sa go hlaba meento le go latela ditshepedišo ka moka tša COVID-19  tšeo pheletšo ya tšona kgontšhitšego naga ye go efoga palo ye hlatlogelago godimo ya diphetelo tše diswa ka nako ya leuba la bohlano la bolwetši bjo..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lincome bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abaqoke ukuphuma bayogonywa futhi abayithobelayo yonke imigomo ye-COVID-19, osekuholele ekutheni izwe likwazi ukugwema ukukhula kwezigameko ezintsha zokutheleleka kwabantu ngegciwane ehlandleni lesihlanu lobhubhane..     Kepha-ke, akumele neze sidembesele njengoba i-COVID-19 iselokhu ikhona phakathi kwethu.

src_text: Le ge go le bjalo, ga se ra swanela go iketla kudu ka ge COVID-19 santše sale gona.
tgt_text: Nakuba kamuva nje izwe likuqedile ukugqokwa kwezifonyo okuphoqelelekile emphakathini, abantu abanezifo ezingamahlalakhona kanye nalabo abagulayo bayakhuthazwa ukuba baqhubeke nokugqoka isifonyo.

src_text: Le ge le gore malobanyana mo naga fedišitše dinyakwa tša kgapeletšo tša go apara dimaseke mafelong bohle, batho ba go ba le malwetši mangwe le bao ba sa ntšego ba lwala ba hlohleletšwa go tšwelapele go apara dimaseke.
tgt_text: Kumele futhi siqhubeke nokugeza izandla noma sizihlanze ngesibulalimagciwane futhi siqinisekise ukuqhelelana ngendlela efanele phakathi kwethu nabanye abantu, futhi siqinisekise ukuthi endaweni okuhleli kuyona abantu kungena umoya ohlanzekile owanele.

src_text: Re swanetše go tšwelapele go hlapa matsogo rena goba go sanithaesa, le gape go šielana sekgala le go netefatša gore go hlabela moya ka tsela ye maleba..  Meento santše le mokgwa wa go itšhireletša malwetšing wo hlatsetšwego ka sesaentshe kgahlanong le COVID-19 ebile Kabinete hlohleletša batho ka moka bao ba sa kago ba hlaba meento go ya go hlaba meento ya bona ya go tsošeletša mafelong kgauswi le bona go hlaba meento ntle le tefo..  Mabora dikgabo.

Kabinete sedimošitšwe ka seemo sa moragorago seo se gatetšego pele mabapi le go phatlalala ga Mabora Dikgabo ka mo nageng morago ga kgonthišišo ye lokolotšwego ya moragorago ya gore go na le motho wa bobedi yo nago le bolwetši bjo ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Ukugonywa kusalokhu kuyiyona ndlela yokuzivikela ku-COVID-19 eqinisekisiwe ukuthi iyasebenza efakazelwa yisayensi futhi iKhabhinethi liyabakhuthaza bonke abantu abangakagonywa ukuba baphume ngokushesha bayogonywa, kanti ngokunjalo futhi abantu esebegonyiwe nabo kumele baphume bayothola umjovo oweseka futhi ulekele umgomo egazini mahhala esikhungweni sokugoma esiseduze nabo..     Isifo i-Monkeypox.

src_text: Batho bao ba fetetšwego ba ipeetše thoko ka magaeng bona ebile lesolo la go lota mehlala ya batho bao ba ka bego ba kgokagane le bona le gare le kgatlampana go ba humana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lithulelwe umbiko wakamuva mayelana nokusabalala kwesifo i-Monkeypox ezweni kulandela ukuqinisekiswa kamuva nje kwesigameko sesibili sokutheleleka komuntu kuleli.

Labo bantu abathelelekile bagonqile emakhaya futhi kulandelwa umkhondo wabo bonke abanye abantu abake basondelana nabo ukuze kuhlonzwe futhi kutholwe labo okungenzeka ukuthi nabo bathelelekile..     UMnyango Wezempilo kanye NeSikhungo Sikazwelonke Sezifo Ezithathelwanayo basebenzisana neNhlangano Yezempilo Emhlabeni ukubheka nokuhlola ubungozi bokusabalala nokutheleleka kwabantu ngalesi sifo ezweni ngokuhambisana neMithethonqubo Yezempilo Yamazwe Ngamazwe..
