Igciwane le-monkeypox alisabalali kalula futhi lidluliseka kuphela emuva kokusondelana kakhulu kwabantu njengokuqabulana, ukwangana noma ukuthintana namalunga omzimba onezilonda ze-monkeypox.

src_text: Kgoro ya Maphelo le Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Malwetši ao Fetelanago se šomišana mmogo le Mokgatlo wa Lefase wa tša Maphelo go lekola kotsi ya diphetelo tša ka mo nageng ka go sepedišana le Melao ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Maphelo..   Baerase ye ya Mabora Dikgabo ga phatlalale bonolo ebile phetelo ya gona gantši diragala morago ga go kgomana go swana le go atlana, go kgwathakgwathana goba go swaraswara ditho tša mmele tša go ba le dišo tša motho wa go swarwa ke mabora dikgabo.
tgt_text: Abantu abangenazo izimpawu ze-monkeypox abalidluliseli igciwane kwabanye abantu..     IKhabhinethi liluleke abantu abanezimpawu ezinjengemfiva, kanye nezimpawu ezijwayelekile zomkhuhlane ezilandelwa wukuqubuka okunamabhamuza ukuba baphuthume esikhungweni sezempilo esiseduzane ukuze baxilongwe futhi bathole ukwelashwa kusenesikhathi.

src_text: Batho bao ba se nago dika tša mabora dikgabo ga go kgonagale gore ba fetetše ba bangwe ka baerase ye..  Kabinete eleditše batho bao ba itemogelago dika tša letadi, dika tša go tlwaelega tša go swana le tša mokhohlane, le menyabidi ya mmala wo mohubitšwana go bega ditiragalo tše dikliniking tša maphelo tša kgauswi le bona gore bolwetši bjo bo humanwe ka bonako le go phekolwa..  Masetlapelo Thabeneng ya East London.
tgt_text: Isibhicongo esenzeke endaweni yokucima ukoma eMonti.

src_text: Masetlapelo go tšhabiša namana tša mmele kua Thabeneng ya Enyobeni gola East London Profenseng ya Kapa Bohlabela ka la 26 Phupu 2022 ao tšeerego maphelo batšwamahlalaging ba 21 tšhošitše kudu batho ka moka ka nageng.
tgt_text: Isibhicongo esesabekayo esenzeke endaweni yokucima ukoma Enyobeni eMonti eMpumalanga Kapa ngeSonto, mhla zingama-26 kuNhlangulana 2022 esidlule nemiphefumulo yamabhungu namatshitshi angama-21, sishiye izwe lethu lonkana likhungathekile futhi lisosizini.

src_text: Go tloga go le boima kudu go gopola ka tlalelo ya malapa bao ba lobilego bana ba bona ka mokgwa wo wo sehlogo..  Kabinete lebišitše melaetša ya yona ya mahloko go malapa ao lobilego bao ba phelago le bona le go leboga motho mang le mang ka thekgo ya bona ya moya wa botho go malapa ao llelago metswalle ya bona mo nakong ye ye boima..  Go hlobaetša gore bana ba bannyane ba mengwaga ya go lekana 13 ba ile ba dumelelwa go tsena lefelong leo le go gamola madila.
tgt_text: Kunzima ngisho ukucabanga nokubona ngamehlo engqondo usizi nobuhlungu obesabekayo obubhekene nemindeni elahlekelwe yizingane zayo ngendlela ebuhlungu kangaka..     IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukudabuka kwalo futhi ladlulisa namazwi enduduzo emindenini elahlekelwe yizingane zayo ezithandayo futhi lizwakalise amazwi okubonga kubo bonke labo abafake isandla ngokulekelela nokuhlinzeka ngosizo emindenini esemanzini kulesi sikhathi esinzima kangaka ebhekene naso..     Kuyinto ekhathazayo ukuthi izingane ezisencane kangaka, ngisho nalezo ezineminyaka yobudala eyi-13 imbala, zivunyeliwe ukuba zingene kule ndawo yokucima ukoma futhi zavunyelwa nokuphuza utshwala.

src_text: Re dira boipiletšo bathong ka moka setšhabeng go kgatha tema ya bona go dira gore bana ba dule ba bolokegile ka dinako tšohle..  Bana ba mengwaga ya ka fase ga ye 18 ga ba dumelelwe go tsena ka dipareng, ka dithebeneng, le ka mabenkeleng go rekiša madila.
tgt_text: Sinxusa imiphakathi ukuba idlale indima yayo ukugcina izingane zethu ziphephile ngaso sonke isikhathi..     Izingane ezineminyaka yobudala engaphansi kweyi-18 azivumelekile ukungena emathaveni, emashibhini, ezinkantini kanye nasemabhodlela-sitolo.

src_text: Bagwebi ba madila bao go ka humanwago ba gataka ye mengwe ya melao ye ba swanetše go pharwa ka bosenyi le go tšeelwa dilaesense tša bona tša go rekiša madila..  Dipoelo go tšwa Samiting ya Baetapele ba Seboka sa Dinaga tše Šupa (G7).
tgt_text: Abathengisi botshwala abayotholakala bephula noma yimiphi kule mithetho bayobekwa amacala futhi kuhoxiswe nezimvume zabo zokuthengisa utshwala..     Imiphumela Yengqungquthela Yabaholi Beqembu Lamazwe Ayisikhombisa (i-G7).

src_text: Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa kgathile tema Samiting ya Baetapele ba Seboka sa Dinaga tše Šupa (G7) yeo bego swaretšwe kua Bavaria, Germany ka Mošupologo, 27 Phupu.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ubebambe iqhaza eNgqungqutheleni Yabaholi Bamazwe e-G7 ebibanjelwe e-Bavaria, kwelaseJalimane ngoMsombuluko mhla zingama-27 kuNhlangulana.

src_text: Mopresidente – yo kgathilego tema dikopanong tša mošomo fao go tšona go ahlaahlilwego merero ya klaemete, mohlagase, maphelo le tšhireletšego ya dijo lefaseng ka bophara – be memilwe ke moswarakopano ye, Mokhanseliri Olaf Scholz..  G7 ke foramo ya sepolotiki ya magareng ga didiko tša mmušo ya go hlangwa ke Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom le Amerika  Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: UMongameli – obambe iqhaza ezigcawini zokusebenza lapho kubhungwe khona ngezindaba eziphathelene nesimo sezulu, amandla kagesi, ezempilo, ukutholakala kokudla okwanele kanye nokulingana ngokobulili – ubemenywe ngumsingathi wengqungquthela uShansela Olaf Scholz..     I-G7 wumbimbi lwezepolitiki olubandakanya ohulumeni bamazwe ahlukahlukene olubandakanya i-Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom kanye ne-United States     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Seakanywa sa Melao ya Lefapha la Semolao (Seakanywa sa LSC).
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lwemithethomgomo Yomkhakha Wezomthetho (uHlaka lwe-LSC).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletšwe go phatlalatšwa ga Seakanywa sa LSC gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukushicilelwa koHlaka lwe-LSC ukuze umphakathi uphawule ngalo.

src_text: Dinepo tša melao ye ke go kgontšha diphetogo ka lefapheng la semolao go fihlelela tekatekano ya batho goya le ka dipalopalo tša ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Izinjongo zale mithethomgomo wukuletha uguquko emkhakheni wezomthetho ukuze kube nokumeleka ngendlela efanele kwabantu bonke bakuleli.

src_text: Melao ye tla netefatša gape le gore go ba le setheo seo se tla tšweletšago baabaditirelo bao ba hlahlilwego gabotse le ba bokgoni ditirelong tša semolao.
tgt_text: Imithethomgomo izoqinisekisa futhi nokusungulwa kwenhlangano ezokhiqiza abahlinzeki bezinsizakalo zomthetho abaqeqeshwe kahle futhi abawenza ngobunyoninco umsebenzi wabo.

src_text: Go hlangwa ga Seakanywa se sa LSC go lekotšwe ke Khansele ya Phethagatšo ya Semolao bago setheo sa mmušo seo se hlamilwego goya ka Karolo 4 ya Molao wa Phethagatšo ya Semolao, 2014 (Molao 28 wa 2014) le go hlahlwa ke Molao wa Matlafatšo ya Ikonomi ya Bathobaso yeo Nabilego (B-BBEE), 2013 (Molao 46 wa 2013).
tgt_text: Umsebenzi wokwakhiwa koHlaka lwe-LSC bewenganyelwe nguMkhandlu Womsebenzi Wezomthetho, okuyinhlangano esemthethweni esungulwe ngokweSigaba sesi-4 soMthetho Womsebenzi Wezomthetho, wonyaka wezi-2014 (uMthetho wama-28 wonyaka wezi-2014) futhi ngokuholwa nokuqondiswa nguMthetho Wezokufukulwa Nokuhlonyiswa Kwabantu Abamnyama Kwezomnotho (i-B-BBEE), wonyaka wezi-2013 (uMthetho wama-46 wonyaka wezi-2013).

src_text: Molao wa B-BBEE wa 2013 bolela ka gore Tona ya Dikgwebišano, Diintasteri le Diphenkgišano tla lokolla ditlhathollo tša phethagatšo ye maleba matlafatšong ya ikonomi ya bathobaso mo mafapheng go ikgetha.
tgt_text: UMthetho we-B-BBEE wonyaka wezi-2013 uhlinzekela ukuthi uNgqongqoshe Wezohwebo, Izimboni Nokuncintisana akhiphe imithethomgomo yenkambiso enhle okumele ilandelwe ekufukulweni nokuhlonyiswa kwabantu abamnyama kwezomnotho emikhakheni ethile ehlosiwe.

src_text: Maloko profešene ya semolao ka motsotso wo ga ba na melao ya lefapha le ya go ba hlahla go kalokana le go fetafetana le go se lekalekane profešeneng ya semolao.
tgt_text: Amalungu omsebenzi wezomthetho njengamanje awanayo imithethomgomo eqondene nalo mkhakha ezowahola futhi iwaqondise ekubhekaneni ngqo nokungalingani okukhona emsebenzini wezomthetho.

src_text: Seakanywa sa LSC se tlo phatlalatšwa ka gare ga Kuranta ya Mmušo mo matšatšing 60 go dumelela setšhaba go fa ditshwayotshwayo tša sona..  Dipego tša Kgatelopele ya Mošomo tša go Lokollwa Gabedi mo Ngwageng.
tgt_text: UHlaka lwe-LSC lwashicilelwa kuSomqulu Kahulumeni isikhathi esiyizinsuku ezingama-60 ukuze umphakathi ukwazi ukuphawula ngalo..     Imibiko Yenqubekelaphambili Yokusebenza Ekhishwa Kabili Ngonyaka.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše dipego tša kgatelopele ya mošomo tša go lokollwa gabedi mo ngwageng tša go thoma ka Diphalane 2021 go fihla ka Hlakola.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyigunyazile imibiko yenqubekelaphambili yokusebenza ekhishwa kabili ngonyaka yesikhathi esifaka phakathi uMfumfu 2021 kuya kuNdasa.

src_text: Dipego tše di bopa karolo ya Tlhako ye Logetšwego Maano ya Paka ya Magareng (MTSF) ya 2019-.
tgt_text: Le mibiko iyingxenye yoHlaka Lwamaqhinga Esikhathi Esimaphakathi (i-MTSF) 2019-.

src_text: MTSF ya 2019-2024 ke leano la phethagatšo le tlhako ya go lekola mošomo ya go fihlelela Leanotlhabollo la Bosetšhaba: dinyakwa tše beilwego pele tša Ponelopele ya 2030 go basepediši ba lekga la boselela la mmušo.
tgt_text: I-MTSF 2019-2024 iwuhlelo lokuqalisa umsebenzi kanye nokusebenza kohlaka lokuqapha okuhloswe ngalo ukufezekisa izinto ezibekwe eqhulwini nguhulumeni wehlandla lokuphatha lesithupha ngaphansi kweNhlosombono yowezi-2030 yoHlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezwe.

src_text: Dipego tše di be di šetšane le ditlapele tše šupa tša mmušo lego (1) Diphetogo tša ikonomi le tlhomo ya mešomo; (2) Thuto, mabokgoni le tša maphelo; (3) Go kopantšha mmogo meputso ya leago ka ditirelo tša go botega le tše hlwahlwa tša motheo; (4) Go momaganywa ga mafelo, madulo batho le pušoselegae; (5) Phedišano setšhabeng le setšhaba sa go bolokega; (6) Mmušo wa bokgoni, wa potego le wo gatelago pele; le (7) Afrika le lefase le kaonafetšego, le magato go amana le go rarolla seemo basepediši ba mmušo ba lekga la boselela..  Kabinete amogetše magoro mošomo wo gatetšego pele godimo ga dinepo tšeo di theilwego tša paka ye re lego ka gare ga yona.
tgt_text: Imibiko ibigxile ezintweni eziyisikhombisa ezibekwe eqhulwini nguhulumeni, okuyilezi (1) Uguquko kwezomnotho nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi; (2) Ezemfundo, amakhono kanye nezempilo; (3) Ukuqiniswa kwezibonelelo zikahulumeni nokubhekelelwa komphakathi kangcono ngokuthi kuhlinzekwe izidingongqangi ezithembakele ezitholakala ngendlela efanele ngaso sonke isikhathi futhi ezisezingeni elifanele; (4) Ukudidiyelwa ngendlela efanele kwezindawo okutholakala kuzona ingqalasizinda nezikhungo eziwusizo, izindawo zokuhlaliswa kwabantu kanye nohulumeni basekhaya; (5) Ubumbano lomphakathi kanye nemiphakathi ephephile; (6) Umbuso onekhono lokusebenza ngendlela efanele, olandela inkambiso elungileyo emsebenzini owenzayo futhi othuthukisayo; kanye (7) ne-Afrika nomhlaba ongcono, kanye nezinhlelo zokungenelela zikahulumeni wehlandla lokuphatha lesithupha ezihlobene nalokho..     IKhabhinethi liyamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe imikhakha okwenzeke kuyona inqubekelaphambili emigomweni obekuhloswe ukufinyelela kuyona kulesi sikhathi sokubika esibuyekezwayo.

src_text: Kabinete lemogile gape le magoro ao nyakago magato gore go tle go fedišwe go nanya ga seemo seo se amilwego gampe ke leuba la COVID-.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyiphawulile futhi naleyo mikhakha edinga ukuthi kube nezinhlelo zokungenelela ukuze kulungiswe inkinga yokubambezeleka okwenzekile ngenxa yokukhahlamezeka okudalwe wubhubhane lwe-COVID-.

src_text: Ditona di tlo swara ditshedimošetšo tša babegaditaba mo dibekeng tše tlago go hlatholla dipego tša bona ka go latelana ga tšona le go hlalošiša magoro ao go ona mošomo swanetšego go tiišeletšwa letsogo  Ditiragalo tšeo di Tlago.
tgt_text: ONgqongqoshe bazobamba izithangami nabezindaba kula maviki ezayo ukuze bakwazi ukwenaba kabanzi ngemibiko yabo ngokwehlukana kwabo futhi bachaze kabanzi nangalezo zindawo lapho kudingeka khona ukuba kuqiniswe isandla kusetshenzwe ngokuzikhandla     Umcimbi ozayo.

src_text: Khonferense ya Bahlomi ba Diinstasteri ba Bathobaso le ya Baromela ka Ntle ga Naga (BIEC).
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yosozimboni Abamnyama Abathumela Impahla Nemikhiqizo Emazweni Angaphandle (i-BIEC).

src_text: Khonferense ya Pulamadibogo ya BIEC tla swarelwa Sentharengkgoparara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Sandton gola Johannesburg ka Laboraro, 20 Mosegamanye.
tgt_text: I-BIEC yokuqala ngqa izobanjelwa e-Sandton International Convention Centre eGoli ngoLwesithathu mhla zingama-20 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Khonferense ye latela tsebagatšo ya mathomong ngwaga wo ya Tšhomišanommogo ya Diromelwantle tša Bahlomi ba Diintasteri ba Bathobaso ka mmušo, yeo thekgago bahlomi ba diintasteri ba bathobaso go kgona go tsenelela mebarakeng ye meswa, le go kgona go fihlelela thekgo ya ditšhelete ya diromelwantle le mekgwa ya go bapaletša ba bangwe  Melaetša.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela ilandela ukwethulwa kweNethiwekhi Yosozimboni Abamnyama Yokuthunyelwa Kwempahla Nemikhiqizo Emazweni Angaphandle, phecelezi, i-Black Industrialists Export Network, ethulwe nguhulumeni ngasekuqaleni konyaka, esekela osozimboni abamnyama ukuze bakwazi ukungena ezimakethe ezintsha futhi bakwazi ukufinyelela kuxhasomali lokuthumela impahla nemikhiqizo emazweni angaphandle kanye namathuba nezindlela zokukhangisa nokwazisa ngempahla nemikhiqizo yabo     Imiyalezo.

src_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebiša ditebogišo tša yona le go lakaletša bao ba latelago mahlogonolo: Springboks, ka phenyo ya yona ya go thabiša kudu ya motsotso wa mafelelo kgahlanong le Wales nakong ya phenkgišano ya mathomo godimo ga diteko tše tharo tša dipapadi Lepatlelong la Loftus Versveld gola Pretoria ka Mokibelo, 2 Mosegamanye.
tgt_text: Amazwi okuhalalisaIKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi okuhalalisa kanye nezilokotho ezinhle kulaba: amaBhokobhoko, ngokunqoba kwawo ngomzuzu wokugcina emdlalweni wawo ne-Wales olethe injabulo enkulu kubalandeli, obekungumdlalo wokuzwana amandla wokuqala kwemithathu obubanjelwe enkundleni i-Loftus Versveld Stadium ePitoli ngoMgqibelo mhla zi-2 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Banyana Banyana, ka phenyo ya yona ya go nweša dino tše pedi go ye tee papading ya pulamadibogo ya Mogopo wa Basadi wa Ditšhaba tša Afrika kgahlanong le Nigeria yeo bego bapalelwa gola Morocco, ka Mošupologo, 4 Mosegamanye  Bao ba Thwetšwego MešomongBatho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona thuto tlo tiišetšwa le go netefatšwa ka tsela ye maleba.
tgt_text: iBanyana Banyana, ngokunqoba kwayo ngamagoli amabili kwelilodwa emdlalweni wayo wokuvula obuphakathi kwayo ne-Nigeria weNdebe Yabesifazane Yamazwe ase-Afrika, esingethwe yi-Morocco, ngoMsombuluko mhla zizi-4 kuNtulikazi     Abaqashiwe    Bonke abaqashiwe kumele kuqinisekiswe iziqu zabo futhi bahlolwe ngokufanele.

src_text: Ngaka Nyameko Barney Pityana bjalo ka Modulasetulo wa Khomišene ya Bosetšhaba ya Lotto..     Moadbokheiti Rory Voller bjalo ka Mokomišinare wa Khomišene ya Dikhamphani le ya Tsebo ya Kgopolo.
tgt_text: UDkt Nyameko Barney Pityana oqokwe njengoSihlalo we-National Lotteries Commission..     U-Adv Rory Voller oqokwe njengoKhomishana we-Companies and Intellectual Property Commission.

src_text: Mohlagase.
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Kabinete amogela ditsenogare tšeo di tsebišitšwego ke mmušo go šogana le mathata mohlagase ka nageng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele izingenelelo ezethulwe nguhulumeni ukubhekana nenkinga kagesi ebhekene nezwe.

src_text: Magato bohlokwa ao tšerwego kgora tsela ya go fokotša go kgaotšwa ga mohlagase, le go fetoša lekala la mohlagase le go fihlelela tšhireletšo ya mohlagase ya nako ye telele.
tgt_text: Lezi zinyathelo ezizohamba ibanga elide ekuhlahleni indlela yokunciphisa ukuncishwa kogesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, ukuletha uguquko emkhakheni kagesi kanye nokuqinisekisa ukutholakala kogesi isikhathi eside.

src_text: Mo go thekgeng kabo ya mohlagase le go thuša naga ya rena ka kabo ya mohlagase yeo imelwago, re nyaka go fokotša tšhomišo ya mohlagase nageng ya rena ka dimekawate tše 600 mo dikgweding tše tharo tše di latelago.
tgt_text: Ukuze seseke isizinda sikagesi futhi sisize izwe lethu ngokuthunyelwa kogesi olinganiselwe, sidinga ukunciphisa ukusetshenziswa kogesi njengezwe ngama-600 megawatts ezinyangeni ezintathu ezizayo..  Amakhaya angadlala indima yawo ekongeni ugesi ngokucisha zonke izibani ezingabalulekile kanye nezinto ezisebenzisa ugesi omningi ngezikhathi lapho ugesi usetshenziswa kakhulu khona.

src_text: Malapa ka kgatha tema ya wona mo go bolokeng mohlagase ka go tima didirišwa tšeo di sego bohlokwa le tšeo di šomišago mohlagase wo montši mo dinakong tšeo tšhomišo lego godimo.
tgt_text: Amabhizinisi ayagqugquzelwa ukuthi aqale ukusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe obonga ugesi emkhiqizweni yawo futhi azibandakanye emizamweni yokunciphisa ukudingeka kogesi..  Umkhankaso we-Operation Vulindlela.

src_text: Dikgwebo di hlohleletšwa go šomiša theknolotši ya tšweletšo ya mohlagase ya mohola gape ye ntši le go kgatha tema mo mananeong go fokotša tšhomišo ye ntši ya mohlagase..     Operation Vulindlela.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele inqubekelaphambili eyenziwe emkhankasweni we-Operation Vulindlela wokususa zonke izihibe emikhakheni yezamandla, owezokuxhumana, nowamanzi kanye nezokuvakasha ngenhloso yokuvuselela umnotho.

src_text: Kabinete amogela tšwelopele yeo dirilwego ka fase ga Operation Vulindlela go fediša dititelego tše di lebanego le mohlagase, dikgokagano tša megala, meetse le lekala la boeti go tsošološa ekonomi.
tgt_text: Izinguquko kwizakhiwo eziyisishiyagalolunye kwezingama-26 sezikhona, neziyi-11 nazo ziqhubekela phambili kahle kakhulu.

src_text: Dimpshafatšo tša meago tše senyane go tše 26 di feditšwe, mola go na le tšwelopele ya dimpshafatšo tše.
tgt_text: Ukuphumelela kwalokhu kubandakanya ukwenyusa isilinganiso sokukhishwa kwemvume yokuphehlwa kogesi ovuselelekayo, ukuguqulwa kwe-Transnet National Ports Authority ibe yinkampani, ukukhishwa kohlu olubuyekeziwe lwamakhono abucayi kanye nokuqaliswa kohlelokusebenza lwe-e-Visa kumazwe ayi-14, kubandakanya nezimakethe zabavakashi ezinkulukazi ezintsha okuyi-China, i-India, i-Kenya ne-Nigeria..  Udlame Olubhekiswe Kwabobulili Obuthile Nokubulawa Kwabesifazane (i-GBVF).

src_text: Dikatlego di akaretša go thoma ga dilaesense go tšweletšo ye tiilego, go fetošetša ga Taolo ya Maemakepe Setšhaba Transnet, tokollo ya mabokgoni bohlokwa ao lekotšwego lefsa le phethagatšo ya lenaneo la e-Visa mo dinageng tše 14, go akaretša mebaraka ya boeti ye mefsa ye megolo go swana le China, India, Kenya le Nigeria..     Dikgaruru le Dipolao tšeo di Hlolwago ke Bong (GBVF).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lizwakalise intukuthelo ngokudlwengulwa okunesihluku kwakamuva kwabesifazane abayisishiyagalombili e-Krugersdorp e-Gauteng.

src_text: Kabinete tšweleditše pefelo mo go katweng go go šoro ga basadi ba seswai mo Krugersdorp ka Gauteng.
tgt_text: Lezi zenzo ezimbi nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane kudicilela phansi isithunzi sethu emphakathini.

src_text: Ditiro tše tše dimpe le tlhorišo kgahlanong le basadi di nyatša mokgwa wa rena wa leago.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde lancoma uPhiko Lwamaphoyisa eNingizimu Afrika ngokusheshe abophe abasolwa abaningana abasolwa ngalo bugebengu obunyantisayo..  IKhabhinethi linxuse imiphakathi ukuthi isebenzisane nabomthetho ngokunikezela ngolwazi noma ngokubika izenzo ezisolisayo.

src_text: Kabinete retile gape Tirelo ya Maphodisa Afrika Borwa ka go swara babelaelwa ba mmalwa malebana le bosenyi bjo bošoro..     Kabinete ipiletša go ditšhaba go šoma le maphodisa le makala mangwe phethagatšo ya molao ka go abelana ka tshedimošo goba go bega mešongwana ya go belaetša.
tgt_text: Ngokusebenza ngokubambisana, singenza imiphakathi yethi iphephe kubantu besifazane nasezinganeni..  Wonke umuntu waseNingizimu Afrika unomsebenzi wokulwa nababhebhezeli bodlame ngokulandela umthetho.

src_text: Ge re šoma mmogo, re ka dira gore ditšhaba tša rena di bolokege go basadi le bana.
tgt_text: Bika zonke izigameko ezihlobene ne-GBVF esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduze nawe noma ushayele inombolo yokunqanda ubugebengu ye-Crime Stop ku: 0860 01 0111, isikhungo i-National GBVF Command Centre ku: 0800 428 428 noma iNombolo Yosizo Yokunqandwa Kodlame Olubhekiswe Kubulili Obuthile ku: 0800 150. .

src_text: Moafrika Borwa yo mongwe le yo mongwe na le mošomo wa go ba kgahlanong le basenyi ba dikgaruru ka karolong ya molao.
tgt_text: INyanga Yabesifazane.

src_text: Bega ditiragalo ka moka tša GBV setišing sa kgauswi sa maphodisa goba leletša nomoro ya Crime Stop: 08600 10111, Senthara ya Taolo ya Setšhaba: 0800 428 428 goba Mogala wa go Emiša Dikgaruru tša Bong: 0800.
tgt_text: INyanga Yabesifazane yaminyaka yonke ngoNcwaba ibungaza abesifazane ababa negalelo emzabalazweni wenkululeko nabobonke abesifazane emphakathini wakithi..  Kulo nyaka iNyanga Yabesifazane ibungazwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Amalungelo Enhlalo-mnotho Nokuthuthukiswa Kwabesifazane: Sakha Kabusha Ukuthuthukisa Amandla Abesifazane”..  Abesifazane abangaphezu kwezi-20 000 abamashela eZindlini Zombuso ePitoli mhla we-9 kuNcwaba 1956 baba negalelo ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi ukulingana ngokobulili nokunithuthukiswa kuhlala kuseqhulwini eNingizimu Afrika yentando yeningi labantu.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi.
tgt_text: Isibindi sabo sagqugquzela abanye besifazane jikelele ukuthi nabo bathathe indawo yabo ePhalamende, kuhulumeni nasemphakathini, futhi siyaqhubeka nokwakhela phezu kwale ntuthuko kusukela sazuza inkululeko ngowe-.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi ya ngwaga le ngwaga ka Phato hlompha basadi bao ba kgathilego tema ntweng ya tokologo le basadi ka moka mo setšhabeng.
tgt_text: Isikhumbuzo sase-Marikana.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi ya ngwaga wo ketekwa ka fase ga morero: “Ditokelo tša Basadi tša Ekonomi ya Leago: Go Aga Lefsa Bokaone go Matlafala ga Basadi moo go Kaonafetšego”..     Basadi ba go feta 20 000 bao ba gwantetšego Union Buildings ka Pretoria ka la 9 Phato 1956 ba kgathile tema go kgonthiša gore tekatekano ya bong le matlafatšo di dule di le bohlokwa ka temokrasing ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: NgoLwesibili, mhla we-16 kuNcwaba 2022, uhulumeni uhlanganyele nezwe lonkana ekukhumbuleni isibhicongo esenzeka e-Marikana eNyakatho Ntshonalanga ngowezi-.

src_text: Dikgato tša bona tša bogale di hlohleleditše basadi ka kakaretšo go tšea maemo bona ao ba swanetšego ka Palamenteng, mmušong le setšhabeng, gomme re dira dikaonafatšo tše ga nnyane ga nnyane go tloga mola re hwetšago tokologo ka.
tgt_text: Ubuhlungu obazwiwa ngabasebenzi, imindeni yabo kanye nesizwe sonke buzohlale buqoshiwe emlandweni wethu..  UHlelo Lokwakha Kabusha i-Marikana seluqaliwe ukuze kuzokwakhiwa kabusha futhi kwenziwe isimondawo esivumela ukuthuthukisa izimpilo zomphakathi wase-Marikana.

src_text: Segopotšo sa Marikana.
tgt_text: Ngonyaka owedlule uhulumeni wakhokha izigidi eziyi-R176 njengesinxephezelo emindenini yabagilwa futhi amacala asasele asaqulwa kulindeleke ukuthi aphothulwe uma kuphela uNcwaba ngowezi-.

src_text: Ka Labobedi, 16 Phato 2022, mmušo kopane le naga ka moka go gopola masetlapelo ao diragetšego ka Marikana Leboa Bodikela ka.
Bohloko bjoo bo kwelwego ke bašomi, malapa bona le naga ka bophara bo tla dula bo le gona mo historing ya rena.
tgt_text: Izindlu eziningi ezilungisiwe noma ezintsha zidluliselwe kubafelokazi base-Marikana kanti ezinye zizoqedelwa kulo nyaka.

src_text: Lenaneo la Mpshafatšo la Marikana le phethagaditšwe go aga lefsa le go hlola tikologo ya go dumelela go kaonafatša maphelo setšhaba sa Marikana.
tgt_text: Umklamo wokwakhiwa kwezindlu wezigidi ezingama-R700 uzoholela ekuboneni abasebenzi basezimayini bethola izindlu ezisezingeni elihle.

src_text: Ngwaga wa go feta mmušo lefile R176 milione go lliša malapa batšwasehlabelo gomme melato ye sa šetšego ye lego dikgorotshekong go letetšwe gore phethwe mafelelong .
tgt_text: Ingqalasizinda ebucayi kwezenhlalo iyahlinzekwa ukwenza ngcono izimo zokuhlala emiphakathini yasezimayini..  Imbizo kaMongameli yoHlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezifunda (i-DDM) e-Gauteng.

src_text: Dintlo tše di mpshafaditšwego goba tšeo di agilwego lefsa di filwe bahlologadi ba Marikana gomme tše dingwe di tla phethwa ngwaga wo.
tgt_text: Kulandela impumelelo yeZimbizo zikaMongameli ezintathu ze-DDM ebezibanjwe eNyakatho Ntshonalanga, eFreyistata naseMpumalanga, uMasipala Wesifunda i-Sedibeng e-Gauteng usingathe imbizo yesine ngoLwesihlanu, mhla we-12 kuNcwaba..  Ngaphansi kwesiqibulo eithi: “Masingashiyi muntu ngemuva”, uMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa uhole ithimba lezikhulu eziphezulu kuzwelonke, kwisifundazwe kanye nakohulumeni basekhaya.

src_text: Protšeke ya dintlo ya R700 milione dira gore go bonwe bašomi ba moepong ba fiwa dintlo tša seriti.
tgt_text: Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngokwehlukahlukana kwabo banxenxwa ukuba basebenze ngokubambisana ukulwa namazinga akhulayo obubha kanye nobuphofu okudalwa izinselele zezimo zomnotho..  ISifunda i-Sedibeng senze inqubekelaphambili ekuqalisweni kohlelo lwe-Vaal River Special Economic Zone (i-SEZ), oluthembisa kakhulu ekuthuthukisweni kwezimboni zesifunda, zesifundazwe kanye nasezweni lonkana.

src_text: Go filwe infrastraktšha ya leago ye bohlokwa go kaonafatša maemo go phela ditšhaba tša moepong.
tgt_text: I-Vaal River SEZ ihlele ukubandakanya le mikhakha ebucayi elandelayo: iDolobha Elisha Lobuchwepheshe Besimanje e-Vaal River; Isiphehlimandla Esiphehla Ugesi Ngamanzi Nangomoya; isizinda esikhiqiza insangu; ukuthuthwa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo; idolobha elizungeze isikhumulo sezindiza; isikhumulo sezindiza esincane; ukuthuthwa kwempahla ngezindiza kanye nokuvuselelwa komkhakha okhiqiza insimbi.

src_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya ka Gauteng ka Mmotlolo wa Tlhabollo ya Dilete (DDM).

Go latela katlego ya Izimbizo tša Mopresidente tše tharo tšeo di swerwego ka Leboa Bodikela, Freistata le Mpumalanga ka tsela yeo, Mmasepala wa Selete wa Sedibeng ka Gauteng swere karolo ya bone ka Labohlano, 12 Phato..     Ka fase ga morero: “Akaretša batho ka moka”, Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa etile pele sehlopha sa bahlenkedi ba maemo godimo go tšwa go mebušo ya bosetšhaba, ya profense le ya selegae.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela kaMongameli Yomkhakha Wezenhlalo.

src_text: Maafrika Borwa ka mekgatlo le makala bona ba beakantšwe gore ba šome mmogo kgahlanong le magato ao golago bohloki le mathata ao hlotšego maemo ao hlotlago ekonomi.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela kaMongameli Yomkhakha Wezenhlalo ebibanjwe Ekurhuleni, e-Gauteng kusuka mhla we-4 kuya mhla we-5 kuNcwaba 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Sikhuthaza Ukubumbana Kwezenhlalo Ukuvumela Ukubamba Iqhaza kwiNhlalo-mnotho Emiphakathini”, iqoqele ndawonye ababambiqhaza ababuya kwizifunda ezehlukene ukuthi basebenze nohulumeni ukubhekana nezinselele zenhlalo-mnotho kanye nokunxenxa izinsiza zomphakathi, phakathi kwezinye izinjongo..  Ingqungquthela ibheke imibiko yezinkulumo-ngxoxo yezifundazwe eziyisishiyagalolunye kwizinselele lezi zifundazwe ezibhekene nazo, okufaka phakathi ukufinyelela kuxhaso-mali, izinkinga zokulawula, ukuguqulwa komkhakha wezenhlalo ngokombono wokuqinisa ubudlelwano phakathi kukahulumeni nemiphakathi ukuze kuzobhekanwa nezinselele ezihlobene nobubha, ukungalingani kanye nokuntuleka kwemisebenzi..  IKhabhinethi linxuse izinhlangano zomphakathi nezakhamuzi ukuthi badlale indima yabo ebonakalayo ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi sakha ikusasa elingcono, njengoba kucatshangiwe kuHlelo Lwentuthuko Lukazwelonke: NgokoMbono wezi-  Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Selete sa Sedibeng se na le tšwelopele mo phethagatšong ya Vaal River Special Economic Zone (SEZ), yeo lego bohlokwa go kaonafatšeng selete, profense le naga.
tgt_text: UHlelo-kusebenza Lwezimboni Zamasiko Nobuciko.

src_text: Vaal River SEZ beakanya go swara makala bohlokwa a latelago: Vaal River Smart City; Hapo ya Tlhabollo ya Green Hydrogen; hapo ya khabisi; agro-logistiki, aerotropolisi; aetrome, sefofane sa merwalo le lekala la tšweletšo ya tšhipi ye matlafaditšwego.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze uHlelo-kusebenza Lwezimboni Zamasiko Nobuciko ukuthi luqaliswe ukusebenza.

src_text: Samiti ya Lekala la Leago ya Mopresidente.
tgt_text: Lolu hlelo-kusebenza lugxile kubuciko obubonakalayo; imisebenzi yezandla nemiklamo; ubuciko obulalelwayo nobubukwayo kanye nobuciko obenziwa ngekhompyutha; izinsizakalo zokuklama nobuciko; ukudlala nokubungaza, kufaka phakathi umculo, ukuxhumana ngokubhaliwe nokushicilelwe phansi..  Uhlelo-kusebenza luzongenelela kule mikhakha ekwakheni umkhakha omusha oguqukile ozokwaziwa emhlabeni jikelele futhi uncintisane ezingeni.

src_text: Samiti ya Lekala la Leago ya Mopresidente yeo swerwego ka Ekurhuleni, Gauteng go tloga ka la 4 go fihla ka la 5 Phato 2022 ka fase ga morero “Go godiša Tirišano ya Leago go kgontšha go Kgatha Tema go Ekonomi ya Leago mo Ditšhabeng” kopantše bakgathatema go tšwa dileteng go šoma le mmušo go šogana le ditlhohlo tša ekonomi ya leago le go beakanya methopo ya ditšhaba tša leago, gare ga dinepo tše dingwe..     Samiti lebeletše dipego tša dipoledišano go tšwa go diprofense tše 9 ka ditlhohlo tša tšona, tšeo di akaretšago thekgo ya ditšhelete, ditaba tša taolo, phetogo ya lekala la leago ka kgopolo ya go godiša tirišano ya go šogana le ditlhohlo tšeo di lebanego le bohloki, go se lekalekane le tlhokego ya mešomo.
tgt_text: Luzosebenzela imboni yobuciko eNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ikwazi ukufinyelela ezimakethe zakuleli nasemhlabeni jikelele..  UHlaka Lwenqubomgomo Olubuyekeziwe Lokuboleka KoMasipala Nezimo Eziphuthumayo Zemali.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletša go mekgatlo ya selegae le badudi go kgatha tema ya bona ka mafolofolo go kgonthiša gore re aga bokamoso bjo bokaone, bjalo ka ge go beakantšwe go Leano la Tlhabollo la Setšhaba: Pono ya     Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi libuyekeze ukuchitshiyelwa koHlaka lwenqubomgomo yamanje Yokuboleka Komasipala Nezimo eziphuthumayo Zemali.

src_text: Leanolegolo la Diintasteri tša Boithomelo le Setšo.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo lezi zibhekele kwisahluko sokuboleka salolu hlaka.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore leanolegolo la Diintasteri tša Boithomelo le Setšo le phethagatšwe.
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezichibiyelo eziphakanyisiwe ngokwethula isikhathi eside sokuboleka ukuze sizohambisana nesikhathi sokusebenza kwempahla esuke ibolekwa futhi ikhokhelwa nemali.

src_text: Leanolegolo le nepiša bokgabo bja pono; tiroatla le moakanyetšo; bobegaditaba bja go bonwa le go kwa le bja kgokaganyo, ditirelo tša moakanyetšo le tša bokgabo; phethagatšo le keteko, go akaretša mmino, phatlalatšo le bobegaditaba bja kgatišo.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zibuye zicacise umsebenzi wezikhungo zokuthuthukiswa kwezimali endimeni yokweboleka yomasipala.

src_text: Leanolegolo le tla tsena ka bogare mo makaleng go aga lekala la kaonafatšo ya boithomelo leo le tla lemogwago lefaseng ka moka le go phadišana mo lefelong.
tgt_text: ISahluko sama-230 soMthethosisekelo waseRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika we-1996 unika amandla omasipala ukuthi baboleke imali ukuze bathole imali yokuqalisa ukusebenza noma ukukhokhela izindleko ezikhona.

src_text: Le tla šoma intastering ya boithomelo ya Afrika Borwa la kgona go fihlelela mebaraka ya gae le ya boditšhabatšhaba..     Tlhako ye Mpshafaditšwego ya Ditšhelete tša Dikadimo go Mebasepala ka moka le Ditšhelete tša Merero ya Ditšhoganetšo.
tgt_text: Uhlaka lokuqala lwagunyazwa yiKhabhinethi ngowezi-2000 ukuhlahlela indlela iSahluko se-6 nese-13 soMthetho Wezezimali Komasipala, wezi-2003 (Umthetho wama-56 wezi-2003).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše dimpshafatšo go Tlhako ye Mpshafaditšwego ya Ditšhelete tša Dikadimo go Mebasepala ka moka le Ditšhelete tša Merero ya Ditšhoganetšo.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ezigunyaziwe zihlose ukukhuthaza ababolekisi abaningi ezimakethe zomasipala kodwa zibe ziqhubeka nokugcina izimiso ezingumongo eziyisisekelo sokuboleka komasipala..  Ukukhishwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kwekhalenda ukuze lizoshicilelwa lezibalo zobugebengu zekota zangonyaka wezimali wezi-2022/.

src_text: Dimpshafatšo di go karolo ya kadimo ya tlhako ye.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukukhishwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kwekhalenda okuphakanyisiwe ukuze lizoshicilelwa lezibalo zobugebengu zekota zangonyaka wezimali wezi-2022/.

src_text: Gare ga dimpshafatšo tšeo di akantšwego go thoma paka ya go adima ya nako ye telele go sepelelana le nako ya mohola ya tše dingwe tša dithoto tšeo di thekgilwego ka ditšhelete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukukhishwa kwezibalo zobugebengu zekota.

src_text: Dimpshafatšo di hlakiša mohola wa diinstitušene tša ditšhelete tša tlhabollo mo sekgobeng sa kadimo sa mebasepala.
tgt_text: Lokhu kwenziwe ukuze kuzoshintshwa izikhathi zokukhishwa kwezibalo zobugebengu zonyaka ezedlule zezwe.

src_text: Karolo ya 230 ya Molaotheo wa Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa ya 1996 matlafatša mebasepala go kgoboketša dikadimo tša matlotlo bona goba ditshenyagelo tša gonabjale.
tgt_text: Ikhalenda eliphakanyisiwe lezibalo zobugebengu nguNcwaba 2022 ukuthi kukhishwe elekota yokuqala bese kuthi ngoLwezi 2022 kukhishwe elekota yesibili.

src_text: Tlhako ya kgale dumeletšwe ke Kabinete ka 2000 go hlahla Kgaolo ya 6 le 13 ya Molao wa Ditšhelete wa Mebasepala, wa 2003 (Molao wa 2003).
tgt_text: Izibalo zobugebengu zekota yesithathu nekota yesine zizokhishwa ngoNhlolanja nangoNhlaba ngowezi-2023 ngokulandelana..  Ukuphela kweSimo Senhlekelele Kuzwelonke (i-NSoD).

src_text: Dimpshafatšo tše di dumeletšwego di nyaka go hlohleletša baadimiši ba bantši mo mebasepaleng go hlokomela melao ya motheo yeo hlohleletšago go adima ga mebasepala..     Tšhupamabaka ye Lokolotšwego Pele ga Nako ya Phatlalatšo ya Dipalopalo tša Bosenyi tšeo di Begilwego tša Kotara ya Ngwaga wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukuphela kweSimo Senhlekelele Kuzwelonke (i-NSoD) esamenyezelwa emva kwezikhukhula ezadala umonakalo eMpumalanga Kapa naKwaZulu Natali..  I-NSoD iphele mhla we-18 kuNcwaba 2022 kulandela ukwelulwa mhla we-18 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Tšhupamabaka ye lokolotšwego Pele ga Nako ya Phatlalatšo ya Dipalopalo tša Bosenyi tšeo di Begilwego tša Kotara ya Ngwaga wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.
tgt_text: Ukwelulwa kwakungenxa yesidingo sokuqhubeka ngokwengeza izinyathelo eziphuthumayo ezikhona ezazithathwe yizinhlaka zikahulumeni ukuqeda nokubhekana nomphumela odalwe isimo esibi sezulu ezifundazweni ezithintekayo..  IKhabhinethi livumile ukuthi izimo zamanje azisafanele izinyathelo ezinqala njengezinhlaka zikahulumeni, umkhakha ozimele kanye nomphakathi sizoqhubeka siqinisekise usizo, ukuvuselela kanye nokwakha kabusha okuqhubekayo  Imithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go lokollwa ga dipalopalo tša bosenyi tša kotara.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ukubhaliswa Komhlaba wezi-.

src_text: Se be le go fetoša tokollo ya ngwaga yeo dirilwego ya dipalopalo tša bosenyi tša naga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ukubhaliswa Komhlaba wezi-2020 ePhalamende ukuze ucutshungulwe.

src_text: Dinako tšeo di beilwego tšeo ka tšona go tla lokollwago tšhupamabaka ye ya dipalopalo tša bosenyi tla ba ka Phato 2022 mo go tla lokollwago tša kotara ya pele gomme ye nngwe be ka Dibatsela 2022 mo go tla lokollwago tša kotara ya bobedi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lagunyaza lo Mthethosivivinywa ngoNhlangulana wezi-2020 ukuthi kuxoxisanwe nomphakathi ngawo.

src_text: Dipalopalo tša bosenyi tša kotara ya boraro le kotara ya bone di tla lokollwa ka Dibokwane le Mopitlo 2023 ka go latelana .
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ezethuliwe zizobonisa ubunikazi bomhlaba obufakwe ngokomthetho kwiSahluko sama-25(6) soMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika we-.

src_text: Go fedišwa ga Seemo sa Masetlapelo Setšhaba (NSoD).
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlinzeka ngokuqoqwa kwemininingwane ngokobuhlanga, ubulili, ubuzwe kanye nokuba isakhamuzi kwalabo abanamalungelo omhlaba eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go fedišwa ga Seemo sa Masetlapelo Setšhaba (NSoD) seo se tsebišitšwego go latela mafula ka Kapa Bohlabela le KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuzoholela ekubeni nemibiko yokuhlolwa kwamabhuku eqondile kanye nocwaningo esikhathini esizayo olumayelana nokuguqulwa kobunikazi bomhlaba..  UMthethosivivinywa We-ejensi Kazwelonke Yengqalasizinda Yomthombo Wamanzi (i-NWRIA) wezi-.

src_text: NSoD se fedišitšwe ka la 18 Phato 2022 go latela katološo ya sona ka 18 Phupu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthethosivivinywa we-NWRIA wezi-2022 ukuze umphakathi uphawule ngawo isikhathi esiyizinsuku ezingamashumi ayisishiyagalolunye (90).

src_text: Katološo lebeletše tlhokego ya go tšwela pele go matlafatša magato tšhireletšo ao lego gona ao thomilego ke dibopego tša mmušo go fokotša le go šogana le maemo boso šoro mo diprofenseng tšeo di amegilego.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlongoza ukubekwa kwe-NWRIA ukuthi umsebenzi wayo kube ngukuhlela, ukuxhasa ngezimali kanye nokuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda yamanzi kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Kabinete dumetše gore maemo gonabjale ga sa nyaka magato go se tlwaelege ka ge dibopego tša mmušo, lekala la praebete le ditšhaba tša segae di tla tšwela pele go kgonthiša gore go ba le kimollo ye tšwelago pele, mpshafatšo le kagolefsa     Melaokakanywa.
tgt_text: Izophinde ibhekele ukunakekelwa kwengqalasizinda yamanzi ekhona njengamanje.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Ngwadišo ya Mangwalo Bodulo wa.
tgt_text: I-ejensi izoqinisekisa ukuthunyelwa kwamanzi okusimeme, okulingene nokuthembakele okuzohambisana nezimiso zomthethosisekelo zokuba nelungelo lokufinyelela emanzini nokuhlala endaweni ephephile enempilo.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Ngwadišo ya Mangwalo Bodulo wa 2020 Palameneteng gore lebelelwe gape.
tgt_text: I-ejensi izokwakheka njengeNkampani Kahulumeni ngaphansi kweSahluko sesi-2 soMthetho Wokwenganyelwa Kwezimali Zikahulumeni, we-1999 (Umthetho woku-1 we-1999).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Molaokakanywa ka Phupu 2020 gore lebelelwe gape ke setšhaba.
tgt_text: I-ejensi izokwenza imisebenzi okwamanje eyenziwa i-Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..  UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezamandla Ezimali Nemisebenzi Yomasipala wezi-.

src_text: Dimpshafatšo tše di šišintšwego di tla huetša gore go lemogwe nako ya naga yeo šireleditšwego ka semolao ka go Karolo ya 25(6) ya Molaotheo wa Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezamandla Ezimali nemisebenzi Yomasipala wezi-.

src_text: Molaokakanywa dumelela go kgoboketšwa ga dipalopalo go ya ka morafe, bong, naga, bodudi bja beng ba ditokelo tša naga ka Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uchibiyela uMthetho Wamandla Ezimali Nemisebenzi Yomasipala, wangowezi-2007 (Umthetho we-12 wezi-2007).

src_text: Peakanayo ye tla kgontšha gore go be le dipego tša tlhakišo ya naga le dinyakišišo tšeo di nepagetšego ka moso malebana le phetošo ya go ba mong wa naga.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zilawula amandla omasipala ekufakeni intela ezindlekweni zentuthuko ngokwezicelo zokuthuthukiswa komhlaba ezilethwe komasipala.
Lezi zichibiyelo zizoqinisekisa ukuthi omasipala basebenzisa lezi zindleko ngeqiniso, obala futhi ngendlela eqondile.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wa Mokgatlo wa Infrastraktšha wa Mothopo wa Meetse wa Setšhaba (NWRIA) wa 2022 .
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lagunyaza lo Mthethosivivinywa ngowezi-2020 ukuze umphakathi uphawule ngawo..  UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Izindaba Zezimali wezi-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ga Molaokakanywa wa NWRIA wa 2022 gore setšhaba se swayeswaye ka mo nakong ya matšatši   Molaokakanywa akanywa go beakanywa ga NWRIA gore tšeye maikarabelo go beakanya, go thekga ka ditšhelete le go kaonafatša infrastraktšha ya naga tla ba gape le maikarabelo go hlokomela infrastraktšha ya gonabjale ya meetse.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Izindaba Zezimali, wezi-.

src_text: Mokgatlo ke wa go kgonthiša go abja ga meetse ga go swarelela, ga go kwagala go sepelelana le maikarabelo molaotheo go fihlelela meetse le go šireletša tikologo ye botse.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlongoza ukuchibiyela iMithetho eyisikhombisa, okuyilena (1) uMthetho Wempesheni Yezikhungo Ezisebenzisanayo, we-1963 (Umthetho wama-41 we-1963); (2) uMthetho Wempesheni Womkhosi Wezempi, we-1976 (Umthetho wama-84 we-1976); (3) uMthetho Wempesheni Yabasebenzi Bakahulumeni we-1996; (4) uMthetho Wekhomishini Yezezimali, we-1997 (Umthetho wama-99 we-1997); (5) uMthetho weBhange Lokuthuthukiswa Komhlaba Nezolimo, wezi-2002 (Umthetho we-15 wezi-2002); (6) uMthetho Wabacwaningi-mabhuku wezi-2005 (Umthetho wama-26 wezi-2005) kanye (7) noMthetho Ochitshiyelwe Wabacwaningi-mabhuku wezi-2021 (Umthetho wesi-5 wezi-2021).

src_text: Mokgatlo tla beakanywa bjalo ka Lekala la Setšhaba ka fase ga Lenaneo la 2 la Molao wa Taolo ya Ditšhelete tša Setšhaba, wa 1999 (Molao wa 1 wa 1999).
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ezihlongozwayo zibandakanya, ngaphansi koMthetho Wempesheni Yomkhosi Wezempi we-1996, ukubandakanywa kwabalingani kwizinzuzo kubuyelwa emuva kusuka ngama-27 kuMbasa.

src_text: Mokgatlo tla tšea mešomo yeo šetšego dirwa ke Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zemithetho yempesheni zizovumela amakhosikazi nabayeni ukuthi bathole inzuzo yempesheni yabo masinya nje emva kokuhlakazwa komshado.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Maatla le Mešomo ya Ditšhelete tša Mmasepala .
tgt_text: Ngaphezu kokucacisa umsebenzi kaNgqongqoshe Wezezimali nasekucwaningeni amabhuku, izichibiyelo ziphinde zilinganise amandla ekomidi eliqinisa umthetho lapho umcwaningi-mabhuku ethole khona kunecala.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Maatla le Mešomo ya Ditšhelete tša Mmasepala wa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa washicilelwa ngoNhlolanja wezi-2022 ukuthi umphakathi uphawule..  UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Imithetho Engujikelele (Ukulwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwemali noKulwa Nokuxhasa Ngezimali Izenzo Zobudlova) wezi-.

src_text: Molaokakanywa mpshafatša Molao wa Maatla le Mešomo ya Ditšhalete tša Mmasepala, wa 2007 (Molao wa 12 wa 2007).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Imithetho Engujikelele (Ukulwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwemali Nokulwa Nokuxhasa Ngezimali Izenzo Zobudlova) wangowezi-2022 ePhalamende ukuthi uzocutshungulwa.

src_text: Dimpshafatšo di laola maatla mebasepala mo go kgoboketšeng ditshenyagelo tša tlhabollo malebana le dikgopelo tša tlhabollo ya naga tšeo di išitšwego mebasepaleng.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa unguMthethosivivinywa oyingxubevange ochibiyela iMithetho ekhona njengamanje okuyi  uMthetho Wesikhungo Sobunhloli Bezezimali, wezi-2001 (Umthetho wama-38 wezi-2001); (ii) uMthetho Wezinhlangano Ezingenzi Nzuzo, we-1997 (Umthetho wama-71 we-1997); (iii) uMthetho Wokulawulwa Kwempahla eku-Trust, we-1988 (Umthetho wama-57 we-1988); (iv) uMthetho Wezinkampani, wezi-2008 (Umthetho wama-71 we-2008) kanye  noMthetho Wokulawulwa Komkhakha Wezimali, wezi-2017 (Umthetho we-9 wezi-2017).

src_text: Dimpshafatšo tše di tla kgonthiša gore mebasepala diriša ditshenyagelo tše ka go lekana, go sa khutiše selo le gabotse.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ziphendula ukuntula okubonakele ngesikhathi sokubuyekezana kwamazwe okwenziwa yithimba le-Financial Action Task Force (i-FATF).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Molaokakanywa ka 2020 gore setšhaba se swayeswaye..     Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafditšwego wa Ditaba tša Ditšhelete wa 2022 .
tgt_text: Umbiko wokuhlolwa ofanayo waqhamuka nezincomo ezingama-40 ezingasiza ekubekeni iNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ihambisane nezinyathelo zomhlaba zokulwa nokushushumbiswa kwemali kanye nokuxhasa ngezimali izenzo zobudlova..  INingizimu Afrika yatholakala ukuthi isemuva ezindaweni ezingama-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Ditaba tša Ditšhelete, wa.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa ubhekene nezindawo eziyi-14 zalezi zindawo ezibonakele.

src_text: Molaokakanywa akanya mpshafatšo go Melao ye šupa lego (1) Molao wa Diinstitušene tše di Amanago le Sekhwama sa Diphenšene, wa 1963 (Molao wa 41 wa 1963); (2) Molao wa Diphenšene tša Mašole, wa 1976 (Molao wa 84 wa 1976); (3) Molao wa Diphenšene tša Bašomi ba Mmušo wa 1996; (4) Molao wa Ditšhelete le Khomišene ya Ditšhelete, wa 1997 (Molao wa 99 wa 1997); (5) Molao wa Panka ya Tlhabollo ya Naga le Temo, wa 2002 (Molao wa 15 wa 2002); (6) Molao wa Profešene ya Tlhakišo wa 2005 (Molao wa 26 wa 2005) le (7) Molao wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Profešene wa 2021 (Molao wa 5 wa 2021).
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika selokhu yaba yilungu le-FAFT kusukela ngowezi-.

src_text: Dimpshafatšo tše di šišintšwego di akaretša, ka fase ga Molao wa Diphenšene tša Mašole wa 1996, kakaretšo ya balekane ba bophelo ka moka go dikholego go tloga morago go la 27 Phato.
Molao wo mpshafaditšwego wa diphenšene tla kgontšha balekane go lemoga dikgahlego tša bona tša diphenšene ka bjako ge ba hlalana.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezezidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa kwazo wezi-.

src_text: Go tlaleletša go hlaloša mošomo wa Tona ya Matlotlo le go hlakiša, dimpshafatšo di fetoša gape maatla komiti ya phethagatšo moo motlhakiši amogelago molato.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezezidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwazo wezi-2022 ukuthi ucutshungulwe.

src_text: Molaokakanywa phatlaladitšwe gore setšhaba se swayeswaye ka Dibokwane.
tgt_text: UMthetho Wezidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwazo, we-1992 (Umthetho we-140 we-1992) ukwenza kube licala ukukhiqizwa nokusatshalaliswa kwanoma isiphi isidakamizwa kwezibalulwe ngaphansi kweSahluko soku-1 neSahluko sesi-2 soMthetho..  Izichibiyelo zibhekana nokungasebenzi kweSahluko sama-63, okwatholakala ukuthi akuhambisani nomthethosisekelo uma uNgqongqoshe ezonikwa amalungelo okuchibiyela izahluko ngaphandle kokubandakanya inqubo yomthetho.

Ngowezi-2020, iNkantolo Yomthethosisekelo yamemezela ukuthi iSahluko sama-63 esimayelana neZidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwazo we-1992 asihambisani nomthethosisekelo futhi yamisa ukungasebenzi kwaso ukuya mhla ziyi-17 kuZibandlela 2022 ukunikeza iPhalamende isikhathi sokulungisa leli phutha  Umcimbi ozayo.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Melao ya Kakaretšo (Molaokakanywa wo lego Kgahlanong le go Sepetša Tšhelete ka Tsela yeo Sego Molaong le go Lwantšha go Adimiša Tšhelete ka Tswala ya Godimo) wa.
tgt_text: Indebe yomhlaba i-Rugby World Cup Sevens.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Melao ya Kakaretšo (Molaokakanywa wo lego Kgahlanong le go Sepetša Tšhelete ka Tsela yeo Sego Molaong le go Lwantšha go Adimiša Tšhelete ka Tswala ya Godimo) wa 2022 Palamaneteng gore lekolwe gape.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izosingatha imidlalo yendebe yomhlaba i-World Cup Sevens 2022 eKapa phakathi komhla we-9 nomhla we-11 kuMandulo.

src_text: Molaokakanywa ke Molaokakanywa wa dikgoboketšo woo mpshafatšago Melao ya gonabjale lego  Molao wa Senthara ya Bohlale bja Ditšhelete, wa 2001 (Molao wa 38 wa 2001); (ii) Molao wa Mokgatlo wo se Nago Poelo, wa 1997 (Molao wa 71 wa 1997); (iii) Molao wa Taolo ya Traste ya Dithoto, wa 1988, (Molao wa 57 wa 1988); (iv) Molao wa Dikhamphani, wa 2008 (Molao wa 71 wa 2008) le  Molao wa Melawana ya Lekala la Ditšhelete, wa 2017 (Molao wa 9 wa 2017).
tgt_text: Lo mcimbi wombukiso uzosingathwa okokuqala ezwenikazi i-Afrika futhi kuzobonakala amaqembu amadoda angama-24 nawesifazane ayi-16 aphuma emhlabeni jikelele encintisana  Imiyalezo.

src_text: Dimpshafatšo di arabela diphošo tšeo di hweditšwego nakong ya tshekatsheko ya balekane ya naga yeo dirilwego ke Sehlopatšhomo sa Magato Ditšhelete (FATF).
tgt_text: UkuhalalisaIKhabhinethi lihalalisela futhi lifisela okuhle kodwa laba: I-Banyana, ngokuqopha umlando benqoba indebe yokuqala ngqa yaseNingizimu Afrika ye-Women's Africa Cup of Nations (i-WAFCON), emdlalweni wamanqamu we-2022 WAFCON obudlalwa e-Rabat, e-Morocco ngoMgqibelo, mhla wama-23 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Pego ya tekolo yeo kopanetšwego file maele 40 ao ka thušago gore Afrika Borwa sepelelane le magato boditšhabatšhaba go lwantšha go sepetša tšhelete ka mokgwa wo sego molaong le go lwantšha go adimiša tšhelete ka tswala ya godimo..     Go hweditšwe gore Afrika Borwa hlaelela dikarolong tše.
tgt_text: Ngokuphumelela kwabo, bazodlulela emincintiswaneni yeNdebe Yomhlaba Yabesifazane ye-FIFA ngonyaka ozayo ezobe isingathwe ngokuhlanganyela i-Australia ne-New Zealand kusuka mhla wama-20 kuNtulikazi kuya mhla wama-20 kuNcwaba.

src_text: Molaokakanywa šogana le dikarolo tše dingwe tšeo di utollotšwego.
tgt_text: IQembu laseNingizimu Afrika, ngokuhlabana ngezindondo ezingama-27 emidlalweni enhlobonhlobo ye-2022 Commonwealth Games ebidlalwa e- Birmingham, e-England kusuka mhla wama-28 kuNtulikazi kuya mhla wesi-8 kuNcwaba.

src_text: Afrika Borwa dutše le leloko la FATF go tloga ka.
tgt_text: Bathathe indawo yesishiyagalolunye ngezindondo eziyisikhombisa zegolide, eziyisishiyagalolunye zesiliva kanye nezili-11 zethusi.Iqembu Labesifazane lama-Springbok, ngokunqoba i-Spain emdlalweni wabo wokuqala kwemibili yokuzwana amandla ye-Women’s Winter Series e-Emirates Airline Park e-Johannesburg.Nks Ndavi Nokeri (23), ngokwethweswa isicoco sikaZime waseNingizimu Afrika wezi-.
Nks Ashleigh Buhai, ngokuhlabana ku-2022 AIG Women’s Open waba ngowesifazane wesithathu waseNingizimu Afrika ukuhlabana ngendondo yegolide.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Diokobatši le go Rekišwa ga Diokobatši wa.
tgt_text: Amazwi enduduzo         IKhabhinethi lidlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini nakubangani baka: ● Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), umculi kanye nombhali wamaculo owadlondlobala waduma ngesikhathi yena nabangani bakhe ababili beqala iqembu lomculo we-kwaito ngowe-1996 elalibizwa nge-TKZee.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Diokobatši le go Rekišwa ga Diokobatši wa 2022 go lekolwa go ya pele.

Molao wa Diokobatši le go Rekišwa ga Diokobatši, wa 1992 (Molao wa 140 wa 1992) re ke bosenyi go dira le go aba seokobatši se sengwe le se sengwe seo se akareditšwego ka fase ga Lenaneo la 1 le Lenaneo la 2 la Molao.
tgt_text: Abaqashiwe.

src_text: Dimpshafatšo di šogana le go se nepagale ga Karolo ya 63, yeo go hweditšwego gore ga sepelelane le molaotheo malebana le ge Tona filwe ditokelo tša go mpshafatša mananeo ntle le go akaretša ditshepetšo tša palamente.
tgt_text: Bonke abaqashiwe kumele kuqinisekiswe iziqu zabo futhi bahlolwe ngokufanele.

src_text: Ka 2020, Kgorotsheko ya Molaotheo tsebišitše gore Karolo ya 63 ya Molao wa Diokobatši le go Rekišwa ga Diokobatši wa 1992 ga go sepelelane le molaotheo gomme gwa emišwa nakwana go se be molao ga gona go fihla ka la 17 Manthole 2022 go fa Palamente nako ya go lokiša     Tiragalo  Tlago.
tgt_text: Nks Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo njengePhini loMqondisi-Jikelele (i-DDG): Kwezocwaningo Lenqubomgomo Nomthethonqubo kuMnyango wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni Nengqalasizinda (i-DPWI).

src_text: Papadi ya Sebjana sa Lefase ya Rugby ya.
Afrika Borwa tla ba monggae wa Sebjana sa Lefase sa Rugby sa 2022 ka Motsekapa gare ga la 9 le la 11 Lewedi.
tgt_text: Dkt Bongani Elias Sithole njenge-DDG: kwiSikhungo Sokulawulwa Kwesimo Senhlekelele kuMnyango Wezokubusa Ngokubambisana..  Mnu Adam Mthombeni njenge-DDG: KweZobudlelwano Phakathi Kukahulumeni e-DPWI.

src_text: Tiragalo ya papadi swarwa la mathomo ka kontinenteng ya Afrika gomme go tla bonwa dihlopha tša banna ba 24 le basadi ba 16 go tšwa lefaseng ka moka ba phadišana     Melaetša.

Ditebogišo        Kabinete lebogiša le go lakaletša tše dibotse: Banyana Banyana, ka go dira histori le go thopela Afrika Borwa Africa Cup of Nations ya Basadi (WAFCON), mo makgaolakgang WAFCON 2022 yeo bego swerwe ka Rabat, Morocco ka Mokibelo, 23 Mosegamanye.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi livumelana nokuqashwa kwalaba abalandelayo:.

src_text: Ka nako ye tee, ba fihleletše dinyakwa tša go phadišanela Sefoka sa Lefase sa FIFA go swarwa mmogo ke Australia le New Zealand go tloga ka la 20 Mosegamanye go fihla ka la 23 Phato.
tgt_text: Dkt Zwanani Titus Mathe njengeSikhulu Esiphezulu Esiphethe eSikhungweni Sokuthuthukiswa Kwezamandla eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Team South Africa, ka go thopa dimetale tše 27 mo dikarolong tša go fapana mo Dipapading tša Commonwealth tšeo di swerwego Birmingham, England go tloga ka la 28 Mosegamanye go fihla ka la 8 Phato.
tgt_text: Amalungu angasebenzi ngokuphelele kuBalawuli Bezamandla Kuzwelonke eNingizimu Afrika  Mnu Thembani Bukula (uSihlalo)  Mnu Zandile Mpungose (iPhini likaSihlalo)  Nks Precious Sibiya  Nks Thembeka Semane; no-e. Mnu Fungai Sibanda (ophinde wabekwa).

src_text: Sehlopha sa Basadi sa Springbok, ge ba thopile kgahlanong le Spain mo phadišanong ya mathomo ya tše pedi ya diteko tša Mohlwaela wa Marega tša Basadi mo Emirates Airline Park go la Johannesburg.Mohumagadi Ndavi Nokeri (23), go thopa sefoka sa Mohumagadi Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: USihlalo kanye nelungu loMkhandlu WeBhodi Lezobuchwepheshe Bezezimbiwa  Dkt Thibedi Ramontja (uSihlalo); no-b.

src_text: Ekonomi.
tgt_text: Umnotho.

src_text: Kabinete amogela go ya fase gannyane ga palo ya batho bao ba sa šomego ka nageng, yeo ilego fase ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukwehla kancane kwezinga labantu abangasebenzi kuleli lizwe, okwehle nge-.

src_text: 6%, go tloga go.
tgt_text: 6%, kusuka kuma-.

src_text: 5% mo kotareng ya mathomo go ya go.
tgt_text: 5% kwikota yokuqala kwaya kuma-.

src_text: 9% mo kotareng ya bobedi ya.
tgt_text: 9% kwikota yesibili ngowezi-.

src_text: Dipalopalo tšeo di phatlaladitšwego ka Dinyakišišong tša Bašomi tša Kotara ye Nngwe le ye Nngwe ke Dipalopalo tša Afrika Borwa di bontšha gore mešomo ye mentši bile gona ka go Ditirelo tša Setšhaba le tša Leago (276 000), ka lekaleng la Kgwebo (169 000), la Ditšhelete (128 000) le lekaleng la Kago (104 000).
tgt_text: Amanani ashicilelwe kuCwaningo Lwabasebenzi Lwekota ngabeZezibalo eNingizimu Afrika abonisa ukuthi imisebenzi eminingi ebe khona ibe semkhakheni wezoMphakathi Nezinsiza Zenhlalo (276 000), wezoHwebo (169 000), weZezimali (128 000) kanye nowoKwakha (104 000)..     Inani eliphelele labantu abaqashiwe lime kwizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Palomoka ya batho bao ba thwetšwego eme go 15, 6 milione mo kotareng ya bobedi ya 2022, gomme palo ya batho bao ba sa šomego oketšegile ka batho ba 132 000 gomme ya fihla dimilione tše seswai mo kotareng ya bobedi ya 2022 ge go bapetšwa le kotara ya go feta.
tgt_text: 6 kwikota yesibili ngowezi-2022, kwathi inani labantu abangasebenzi lakhula ngezi-132 000 laya ezigidini eziyi-.

src_text: Dipoelo tše tša go kgahliša gape tša go kwagala di bontšha gore maitapišo ao kopanetšwego mmušo le badirišani ba wona ba leago go godiša ekonomi le go hlola mešomo yeo hlokegago thoma go tšweletša dipoelo tše dibotse.
tgt_text: 0 kwikota yesibili ngowezi-2022 uma kuqhathaniswa nekota eyedlule.

src_text: Se ke bohlatse bja gore ge ka moka re šoma mmogo ka go kopanya bokgoni bja rena, re ka fenya ditlhohlo tšeo di lebanego le ekonomi ya rena.
tgt_text: Le mpumelelo engatheni kodwa ejabulisayo ibonisa ukuthi inhlanganisela yemizamo kahulumeni ekanye nozakwabo emiphakathini yokukhulisa umnotho nokusungula imisebenzi edingekayo isiqala ukuthela izithelo..     Lokhu kungubufakazi bokuthi uma sonke sisebenza ngokubambisana siphikelele phambili ngamandla ahlangene, singazinqoba izinselele ezibhekene nomnotho wethu..     IKhabhinethi liyakuqonda ukukhungatheka kwabantu baseNingizimu Afrika njengoba bethwele kanzima ukuphila nsuku zonke ngenxa yezindleko eziphezulu zempilo kanye nezinga eliphezulu labantu abangasebenzi.

src_text: Kabinete kwešiša matshwenyego maAfrika Borwa ge ba palelwa ke go phela gabotse ka lebaka la bophelo bja go bitša tšhelete ye ntši le palo ya godimo ya go hloka mošomo.
tgt_text: Njengohulumeni onakekelayo, silokhu sizimisele futhi sizinikele ekusebenzisaneni nozakwethu emiphakathini ukwakha ikusasa elingcono lawo wonke umuntu.

src_text: Bjalo ka mmušo wo hlokomelago batho ba wona, re dula re tiile le go ikgafa go šoma mmogo le badirišani ba rena ba leago go aga bokamoso bjo bokaone bja yo mongwe le yo mongwe.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni usalokhu ezinikele ekwesekeni amabhizinisi alapha ekhaya ngokuthenga impahla nokusebenzisa izinsiza zalapha ekhaya.

src_text: Mmušo dula ikgafile go thekga dikgwebo tša gae ka go reka dithoto le go šomiša ditirelo tša tšona.
tgt_text: Ingqalasizinda Yomphakathi.

src_text: Infrastraktšha ya Setšhaba.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi liyakugxeka kakhulu ukucekelwa phansi kwengqalasizinda ngabahlali basoThongathi KwaZulu Natali ngesikhathi bebhikishela amanzi.

src_text: Kabinete kgala ka bogala go senywa ga infrastraktšha ke badudi ba Tongaat ka KwaZulu-Natal nakong ya megwanto ya go nyaka meetse.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi licela ukuthi kwehliswe amaphaphu futhi kubekezelwe njengoba umsebenzi usuqalile wokulungisa iSizinda Samanzi oThongathi.

src_text: Kabinete ipeletša gore batho ba iše matswalo fase gape ba be le kgotlelelo ka ge mošomo tšwela pele go lokiša Tongaat Water Treatment Works..  Kabinete kwešiša matshwenyego badudi bao ba swanelago ke go šomiša ditanka tša meetse nako ye telele go tloga mola go bago le mafula pejana mo ngwageng wo.
Le ge go le bjalo, dikgaruru le tlhakahlakano ga se tharollo, gomme go senywa ga infrastraktšha ya setšhaba go kweša setšhaba seo se dulago moo bohloko.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyakuqonda ukukhungatheka kwabahlali okufanele basebenzise izimoto zamathangi amanzi isikhathi esengeziwe selokhu kwaba nezikhukhula ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka.

src_text: Molao wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Mananeo Mebasepala ya Mmušo wa Selegae wa.
tgt_text: Noma kunjalo, udlame nesiphithiphithi akusona isixazululo, futhi ukucekelwa phansi kwengqalasizinda yomphakathi kulimaza imiphakathi esendaweni kuphela.

src_text: Kabinete amogela go saenelwa go ba molao ga Molao wo Mpshafaditšwego wa Mananeo Mebasepala ya Mmušo wa Selegae, wa 2022 (Molao wa 3 wa 2022) ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: ISichibiyelo soMthetho Wezindlela Zokusebenza Zomasipala Bohulumeni Basekhaya sezi-.

src_text: Maikemišetšo molao ke go kaonafatša bokgoni le maemo maitshwaro mmušo wa selegae.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukusayinwa kufakwe emthethweni iSichibiyelo Somthetho Wezindlela Zokusebenza Komasipala Bohulumeni Basekhaya, sezi-2022 (Umthetho wesi-3 wezi-2022) nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Mmušo bopa karolo ya maitapišo go dira gore Tirelo ya Setšhaba be ya profešene le go kgonthiša go swarelela ga kabo ya ditirelo go batho, bjalo ka tokelo ya motheo yeo šireleditšwego ka go Molaotheo wa Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa wa..  Molao hlaloša ditshepetšo tšeo di swanetšwego go latelwa mo go thwaleng ga bahlankedi ba mmasepala maemong godimo.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uhlose ukuthuthukisa ikhono kanye namazinga okuziphatha kohulumeni basekhaya.

src_text: Bjale ga sa dumela gore bahlenkedibagolo ba mmušo ba sware gape maemo godimo mo mekgatlong ya dipolotiki.
tgt_text: Lo mthetho uyingxenye yemizamo kahulumeni yokusebenza ngokulandela umthetho Kwezemisebenzi Kahulumeni kanye nokuqinisekisa ukuhlinzekwa okusimeme kwezinsiza kubantu, njengelungelo elihamba phambili elilotshwe kuMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika wangowe-..

src_text: Se sengwe gape ke gore ge molao wo tsene tirišong, diposo tša bolaodi bja mmasepala tšeo di se tlatšwago di swanetše go kwalakwatšwa nageng ka bophara go goka batho ba bantši bao ba nago le maswanedi.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho ucacisa inqubo okumele ilandelwe uma kuqashwa abantu ezikhundleni zokuphatha.

src_text: Kabinete tshepa gore diphetogo tše di tla kgonthiša gore bao ba thwetšwego goba ba kgethilwego mo maemong ba tla kgona go phethagatša ditshepišo tša bona gore re fihlelele bophelo bjo bobotse go batho ka moka.
tgt_text: Manje usuvimbela izikhulu eziphethe kuhulumeni ukuthi zibe nezikhundla emahhovisi amaqembu epolitiki.

src_text: Bosenyi.
tgt_text: Ngalo Mthetho futhi, izikhundla ezingenabantu zabaphathi bomasipala kulindeleke ukuthi zikhangiswe kuzwelonke ukuze kuzohehwa abantu abaningi abafanelekile abangafaka izicelo zalezi zikhundla..     IKhabhinethi liyazethemba ukuthi lezi zinguquko zizoqinisekisa ukuthi labo abaqashwayo noma abakhethwayo kulezi zikhundla bazokwazi ukugcina izethembiso zabo ukuze sizokwazi ukuba nempilo engcono yawo wonke umuntu.

src_text: Kabinete retile bahlenkedi ba metšhelo ba Tirelo ya Metšhelo ya Afrika Borwa ka go thopa seokobatši sa crystal meth seo ge se rekiša ka bago R236 milione mo Boemafofaneng bja Boditšhabatšhaba bja OR Tambo ka Lamorena, 28 Phato.
tgt_text: Ubugebengu.

src_text: Go thopša ga seokobatši go tla romela temošo ye maatla go dihlopha tša basenyi gore matseno le matšo maemafofane rena šireleditšwe gabotse gomme bahlankedi ba rena ba šoma ka maatla go fediša bosenyi bofe goba bofe  Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lincome izikhulu ezisebenza ngentela eSikhungweni Esiqoqa Intela eNingizimu Afrika ngokushaqa izidakamizwa ze-crystal meth ezingama-785 kg ezingabiza inani eliyizigidi ezingama-R236 esikhumulweni sezindiza i-OR Tambo International Airport ngeSonto, mhla wama-28 kuNcwaba.

src_text: Pego ya Khansele ya Thuto ya Godimo (CHE) ya Nyakišišo ya Megolo ya Batlatšabakhanseliri ba Diyunibesithi le Baolaodibagolophethiši ka Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Ukushaqwa kwalezi zidakamizwa kuzothumela isexwayiso kuzigelekeqe sokuthi imingcele yethu engenayo nephumayo ivikelwe kakhulu futhi amahhovisi ethu asebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuqeda nya ubugebengu     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete tsebišitšwe ka dipoelo tša nyakišišo ya CHE yeo dumeletšwego ka 2020 ke Tona ya Thuto ya Godimo, Saense le Kaonafatšo, Ngaka Blade Nzimande, go lekola magato megolo le mekgwa ya go phela ya bahlenkediphethiši ba yunibesithi mo nakong ya mengwaga ye 15 go tloga ka 2005 go fihla ka..  Dinyakišišo be le tša go utolla go swarelela, kgonagalo le kaonafatšo ya diyunibesithi goba lekala la thuto ya godimo ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: UMbiko Womkhandlu Wezemfundo Ephakeme (i-CHE) Wophenyo lokuKhokhelwa kwamaPhini oShansela Emanyuvesi kanye Nabaphathi Abakhulu eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Pego ye akaretša dikutollo tša motheo gammogo le maele tukišo ao akantšwego.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi litshelwe kafushane ngemiphumela yophenyo lwe-CHE eyayijutshwe ngowezi-2020 nguNgqongqoshe Wezemfundo Ephakeme, Ezesayensi Nokuqamba Kabusha, uDkt u-Blade Nzimande, ukuthi iphenyisise ngezigaba zokukhokhelwa nokuhola kwezikhulu eziphezulu emanyuvesi esikhathini seminyaka eyi-15 kusukela ngowezi-2005 kuya kowezi-..     Uphenyo lwalusungulelwa ukuthola ukusimama, ukusebenza kahle kanye nokuthuthukiswa komkhakha wamanyuvesi noma wemfundo ephakeme kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Maele akanya, gare ga tše dingwe, tshepetšo ya ditefo ya go se khutiše selo yeo matlafaditšego.
tgt_text: Lo mbiko ucacisa lokho okutholiwe kanye nezincomo ezethuliwe zokulungisa isimo..     Izincomo lezi ziphakamisa, phakathi kokunye, inqubo yokukhokhelwa eqinile nengafihli lutho.

src_text: Go beakanya mokgatlo wa taolo wa ka ntle wa go ikema go lebelela tshepetšo ya go tšea sephetho sa megolo akanya gape go matlafatša mananeo tekolo ya phethagatšo mo diinstitušeneng.
tgt_text: Ukusungulwa kwethimba langaphandle futhi elizimele ukuqapha inqubo yokuthathwa kwezinqumo ngamaholo.

src_text: Dinyakišišo di lebeletše gape bogolo bja go fapana bja diinstitušene gape dirile gape papetšo ya boditšhabatšhaba.
tgt_text: Uphinde waphakamisa ukuqiniswa kwezindlela zokuhlola ukwenziwa komsebenzi ezikhungweni.

src_text: Go letetšwe gore Tona ya Thuto ya Godimo, Saense le Kaonafatšo boledišane ka pego ye le boetapele bja yunibesithi bjalo ka magato go matlafatša diinstitušene tše tša thuto.
tgt_text: Ucwaningo luphinde labhekisisa ubukhulu balezo nalezo zikhungo futhi wabe sewenza isilinganiso esihambelana nesamazwe ngamazwe.

src_text: Pego tla re ka morago ya phatlalatšwa wepsaeteng ya Kgoro ya Thuto ya Godimo le Tlhahlo: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Wezemfundo Ephakeme, Ezesayensi Nokuqamba Kabusha ulindeleke ukuthi axoxisane ngalo mbiko nobuholi basemanyuvesi njengesinyathelo sokuqinisa lezi zikhungo zemfundo.

src_text: Phetošo ye Potlakišitšwego ya Bokgoni bja Dinyakišišo le Go ruta mo Lekaleng la Thuto ya Godimo.
tgt_text: Umbiko uzobe emva kwalokho sewuchicilelwa kwiwebhusayithi yoMnyango Wezemfundo Ephakeme Nokuqeqeshwa ethi: www.dhet.gov.za.

src_text: Kabinete thekgile maele dinyakišišo tše pedi tšeo di dirilwego go eletša ka magato ao swanetšwego go tšewa go potlakiša go bokgoni bja phetošo ya dinyakišišo le go ruta mo diinstitušeneng tša thuto ya godimo.
tgt_text: Uguquko Olusheshisiwe Lwezocwaningo kanye Nekhono Lokufundisa Emkhakheni Wezemfundo Ephakeme.

src_text: Pego ya mathomo dirilwe ke Sehlophatšhomo sa Ditona seo se nyakišišago mapheko ao thibelago kalatšo, go swarelela le tšwelopele ya dirutegi tša maAfrika Borwa bathobaso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi leseke izincomo zocwaningo olubili obelwenzelwe ukweluleka ngezinyathelo okumele zithathwe ukuze kuzosheshiswa uguquko kwezocwaningo kanye nekhono lokufundisa ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.

src_text: Pego ya bobedi – yeo dirilwego ke Kgoro ya Saense le Kaonafatšo le Setheo sa Dinyakišišo sa Setšhaba – Mokgatlo wa Diyunibesithi wa Afrika Borwa, mokgatlo wo mogolo wa go emela diyunibesithi tše 26 ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Umbiko wokuqala wenziwa iThimba LikaNgqongqoshe elaliphenya imigoqo evimbe ukuqashwa, ukugcinwa emsebenzini kanye nenqubekelaphambili ezifundisweni zabantu abamnyama eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Dipego tše ka moka di akanya mekgwa ya go tsena gare go potlakiša phetogo mo dikarolong tše dikgolo tše hlano lego tatelano ya dialogadigolwane; go kgatha tema ga bašomi; setšo le tirišo ya institušene; pholisi le mekgwa, le methopo ye mennyane.
tgt_text: Umbiko wesibili - owayalelwa nguMnyango Wezesayensi Nokuqamba Kabusha kanye neNhlangano Kazwelonke Yezocwaningo - yenziwa yibhodi i-Universities South Africa, okuyibhodi eliyinhlanganisela elimele amanyuvesi angama-26 kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Tumelelano ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka ga Methopo ya Leabela la Dimela tša Dijo le Temo (Tumelelano).
tgt_text: Yomibili le mibiko iphakamisa amaqhingasu okungenelela ukuze kuzolethwa ngokushesha uguquko emikhakheni emihlanu ebanzi, okubalwa kuyo umkhakha wasebeneziqu; ukubamba iqhaza kwabasebenzi; usikompilo nemikhuba yesikhungo; inqubomgomo neqhingasu, kanye nezinsiza-kusebenza ezinganele.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Tumelelano ya Palamente gore hwetšagale.

Se se tla kgontšha Afrika Borwa go ba karolo ya mekgatlo ya Tumelelano, yeo hlahlago maloko dinaga go šireletša le go kgonthiša tšhomišo ya go swarelela ya methopo ya leabela la dimela tša dijo le temo.
tgt_text: ISivumelwano Samazwe Ngamazwe Ngemithombo Yofuzo Lwezitshalo Zokudla Nezolimo (iSivumelwano).

src_text: Go fihlelela Tumelelano ye go tla matlafatša boikgafo bja naga mo go bolokeng le go swareleleng tšhomišo ya methopo ya leabela la dimela, le go fa thekgo go ditšhaba tša magaeng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukungeniswa kweSivumelwano ePhalamende.

src_text: Tlhako ya Phetogo ye Botse ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuzovumela iNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ibe ingxenye yamazwe ahambisana nalesi Sivumelwano, esikhomba indlela amazwe angamalungu ekugcineni nasekuqinisekiseni ukusetshenziswa okusimeme kwemithombo yofuzo lwezitshalo ukuze kuzokhiqizwa ukudla nezolimo.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore Tlhako ya Phetogo ye Botse ya Afrika Borwa phethagatšwe.
tgt_text: Ukungena kulesi Sivumelwano kuzophinde kuqinise ukuzinikela kwaleli lizwe ekugcineni nasekusebenziseni ngokusimeme imithombo yofuzo lwezitshalo, kuphinde kweseke imiphakathi yasemakhaya.

src_text: Tlhako tšweletša pono ya go abelana ya Afrika Borwa ya go kwagala, ya klaemete ye maatla hlaloša melao le dikarolo tša pholisi go fihlelela se.
tgt_text: UHlaka Loguquko Lwesimo eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Tlhako ya phetogo tla huetša mang le mang ka Afrika Borwa, gomme ya fa sebaka sa go šogana le go se lekalekane ga kgale le go hlola ekonomi ye holago batho ka moka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze uHlaka Loguquko Lwesimo ukuthi luqale ukusebenza.

src_text: Khomišene ya Klaemete ya Mopresidente dirile mokgwa wa poledišano wo mogolo le badirišani ba leago gomme ya amogela thekgo ye kgolo ya tlhako.
tgt_text: Uhlaka lolu luletha umbono owodwa weNingizimu Afrika elinganayo, nemelana nesimo sezulu.

src_text: Kabinete kgonthišitše gore phetogo go tloga go ekonomi ye se nago khapone ka 2050 swanetše go thekga maikemišetšo tlhabollo ya setšhaba, go akaretša mešomo ye mekaone go batho ka moka, kakaretšo ya leago le go fedišwa ga bohloki.
tgt_text: Licacisa izimiso nenqubomgomo ezoholela kulokhu.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletša go badirišani ka moka ba leago go thekga le go amogela tlhako ye.
tgt_text: Uhlaka loguquko luzothinta wonke umuntu eNingizimu Afrika, futhi lunika ithuba lokubhekana nokungalingani kwangesikhathi esedlule futhi lwakha umnotho okuzozuza kuwona wonke umuntu.

src_text: Leano la phethagatšo leo le tletšego la tlhako le tla dirwa, gomme le tla kopanywa le peakanyo ya mmušo le lenaneo la tekanyetšo.
tgt_text: IKhomishini KaMongameli Eqaphe Isimo Sezulu yaqhuba inqubo ejulile yokuxoxisana nokusetshenzisanwa nabo emphakathini futhi yathola ukwesekwa okukhulu ngalolu hlaka.

src_text: Karata ya Laesense ya go Otlela ye Mpsha ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likuqinisekisile ukuthi ukuguqukela emnothweni ongenayo ikhabhoni ngowezi-2050 kumele kweseke izifiso zentuthuko zezwe, kubandakanya imisebenzi engcono yawo wonke umuntu, ukubandakanywa komphakathi kanye nokuqedwa nya kobubha.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore Karata ya Laesense ya go Otlela ya gonabjale tšeelwe legato ke ye mpsha ya go ba le dibopego tša go bolokega kudu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi selicele bonke okusetshenziswana nabo emphakathini ukuthi beseke futhi bamukele lolu hlaka.

src_text: Karata ye šomišwago gonabjale thomile go šomišwa go tloga ka.
tgt_text: Uhlelo olunemininingo lokuqalisa lolu hlaka luzokwenziwa, futhi luzohlanganiswa nezinhlelo zikahulumeni kanye nesabelomali.

src_text: Theknolotši fetogile gomme go bitša tšhelete ye ntši go hlokomela dikarata tše.
tgt_text: Ikhadi Elisha Lelayisensi Yokushayela eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Karata ye mpsha ye tla šomišwago tla dira gore laesense ya naga ya rena ya go otlela sepelelane le Theknolotši ya Boditšhaba ya go Obamela Tshedimošo ya Boitsebišo bja Motho mo Laesenseng ya go Otlela (ISO18013).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukushintshwa kweKhadi Lelayisensi Yokushayela lamanje kube yileli eliklanywe lafakwa izici zokuphepha..     Indlela yamanje selokhu yasetshenziswa kusukela ngowe-.

src_text: Pholisi ya Lenaneo la Mešomo ya Setšhaba ye Katološitšwego (EPWP).
tgt_text: Ubuchwepheshe buyaguquguquka futhi sekuyizindleko ukugcina ingqalasizinda ekhona njengamanje.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ka kuranteng ya setšhaba Pholisi ya EPWP ye akantšwego gore setšhaba se swayeswaye.
tgt_text: Ikhadi elisha eliphakanyisiwe lizokwenza ukuthi ilayisensi yokushayela kuleli lizwe ihambisane nobuchwepheshe be-International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (i-ISO18013).

src_text: EPWP ke ye nngwe ya mananeo motheo mmušo ao maikemišetšo lego go fa kimollo go bohloki le letseno ka go hlola dibaka tša mešomo ya nakwana, kudu go bafsa le basadi.
tgt_text: INqubomgomo Yohlelo Olweluliwe Lwezemisebenzi Kahulumeni (i-EPWP).

src_text: Pholisi ye mpsha ye akantšwego tla matlafatša lenaneo gomme ya hlaloša dikarolo tša go swana le megolo, mmotlolo wa thekgo ya ditšhelete le tšhireletšo ya leago, ya nyalantšha EPWP le ditirišo tša mešomo tše diswa tla godiša ditirišano gare ga mmušo le lekala la praebete mo go kgonthišeng gore EPWP kgatha tema kudu mo go hloleng mešomo ya seriti le go fokotša bohloki.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukufakwa kusomqulu kweNqubomgomo ye-EPWP ehlongozwayo ukuze kubonisanwe ngayo emphakathini.

src_text: Pholisi tla godiša gape kaonafatšo mo go phethagatšeng ga mananeo mešomo ya setšhaba go phatlalala le naga.
tgt_text: I-EPWP ngenye yezinhlelo ezingumongo zikahulumeni okuhloswe ngazo ukuletha usizo ekubhekaneni nobubha kanye nosizo lwemalingena ngokusungula amathuba emisebenzi yesikhashana, ikakhulukazi entsheni nakwabesifazane..     Inqubomgomo entsha ehlongozwayo izoqinisa uhlelo futhi icacise ngodaba lwamaholo, uxhasomali kanye nokuvikeleka komphakathi, futhi luzolinganisa i-EPWP nezindlela zesimanje zokusebenza.

src_text: Dimpshafatšo tša Mohlwaela wa Khoine ya Desimale ya Bone ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Izogqugquzela ubudlelwano phakathi kukahulumeni nomkhakha ozimele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi i-EPWP inegalelo elikhulu ekwakheni imisebenzi engcono nokuqedwa kobubha.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše sebopego, moakanyetšo le kgoboketšo ya Mohlwaela wa Khoine ya Desimale ya Bone ya Afrika Borwa dumeletše lenaneo la go šielana la ngwaga le ngwaga la tšhomišo ya dipolelo tša semmušo mo go mohlwaela wa khoine ya desimale ya bone.
tgt_text: Le nqubomgomo izophinde igqugquzele ukuqamba kabusha ekuqalisweni kwezinhlelo zemisebenzi kahulumeni kulolonke izwe..     Izichibiyelo zoChungechunge Lwesine Lwezinhlamvu Zemali eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Lentšu “Afrika Borwa” le tla tsenywa ka lehlakoreng le lengwe la dikhoine gomme la gatišwa ka dipolelo ka moka tša semmušo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ububanzi, umklamo kanye nokuhlanganiswa koChungechunge Lwesine Lwezinhlamvu Zemali eNingizimu Afrika Lwangowezi-.

src_text: Dipolelo tše tharo di tla šomišwa go khoine ya R5; dipolelo tše pedi go dikhoine tša R2; 50c, 20c le 10c gomme R1 tla ba ka polelo tee.
tgt_text: Ligunyaze uhlelo lokusebenza lokushintshanisa njalo ngonyaka ukusetshenziswa kwezilimi ezisemthethweni kulolu chungechunge lwesine lwezinhlamvu zemali.

src_text: Dipolelo tše ka moka di tla šomišwa ka go šielana mo mengwageng ye.
tgt_text: Igama elithi "iNingizimu Afrika" lizofakwa ngakwelinye icala lohlamvu futhi lizobhalwa ngazo zonke izilimi ezisemthethweni.

src_text: Pholisi ya 2022 ye Kopantšwego ya Taolo ya Boleng bja Meetse ye Akanywago.
tgt_text: Izilimi ezintathu zizofakwa kuhlamvu luka-R5; izilimi ezimbili ku-R2; bese kuthi izinhlamvu zika-50c, 20c no-10c kanye no-R1 kufakwe ulimi olulodwa.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go phatlalatšwa ka kuranteng ya mmušo ga Pholisi ya IWQM ye Akanywago gore setšhaba se swayeswaye.
tgt_text: Zonke lezi zilimi zizosetshenziswa ngokushintshana njalo ngonyaka isikhathi esiyiminyaka eyishumi ezayo.

src_text: Pholisi ye akantšwego tla ema legato la Pholisi ya WQM ya kgale ya 1991 le mokgwa wa yona wo beakantšwego ka..  Pholisi hlaloša sehlopha sa melao yeo dirago motheo wa taolo ya boleng bja meetse sepelelana le melao ka moka ye lebanego le meetse le maikgafo ka moka lefase naga go maemo le pabalelo ya meetse bjalo ka mothopo wo hlokegago.
tgt_text: INqubomgomo Ehlongozwayo Ngokuphathwa Kwezinga Lamanzi (i-IWQM) yangowezi-.

src_text: Pholisi ya Mehuta ya Boipoeletšo bja Radio ya Moloko wa go Latela ye Akanywago.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukufakwa kosomqulu kweNqubomgomo Esahlongozwa ye-IWQM ukuze kuzoxoxisanwa nomphakathi.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše go phatlalatšwa ga Pholisi ya Mehuta ya Boipoeletšo bja Radio ya Moloko wa go Latela ye Akanywago gore setšhaba se swayeswaye.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo ehlongozwayo izongena esikhundleni seNqubomgomo ye-WQM yowe-1991 ephelelwe isikhathi kanye neqhingasu layo elabekwa ngowezi-.

src_text: Boipoeletšo bja Radio ke mothopo wa tlhago wo monnyane woo lego bohlokwa go kgolo ya ekonomi ya titšitale ya Afrika Borwa le infrastraktšha ya kgokagano.

Pholisi ye akantšwego ikemišeditše go thekga go abelwa ga mehuta ya  dilaesense tša go fihlelela megala ya go thetha ya go se šute, dilaesense tša kgašo, tša mananeokgoparara dikgokagano tša difofane le tša dikepe; tša dinyakišišo le tlhabollo; tša mananeokgoparara go šomišwa ke setšhaba, le diintasteri tše dingwe tša maleba.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo icacisa iqoqwana lezimiso ezizokwakha isisekelo sokulawulwa kwezinga lamanzi.

src_text: Pholisi nyaka gape go godiša tekatekano le kabo ya go kwagala go kgatha tema mo phetošong ya lekala le phihlelelo ya kgokagano ya titšitale le mo go dikarolo tša kgole tša naga.
tgt_text: Ihlinzeka ukuhambisana kuyoyonke imithetho efanele ehambisana namanzi kanye nokuzinikela emhlabeni kwaleli lizwe ukuhlinzeka nokugcina amanzi njengensiza eyingcosana.

src_text: Kgopelo ya Afrika Borwa ya Khansele ya Mokgatlo wa Kgokagano ya Boditšhabatšhaba (ITU) le Boto ya Melawana ya Radio.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo Ehlongozwayo Ngokusakaza Ngamagagasi Omoya.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše kgopelo ya Morena Mandla Samuel Mchunu go Boto ya Melawana ya Radio ya ITU (Selete sa .
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukushicilelwa kweNqubomgomo ehlongozwayo Ngokusakaza Ngamagagasi Omoya ukuze umphakathi uzobeka imibono.

src_text: Morena Mchunu gonabjale ke leloko la boto akanyeditšwe go kgethwa gape mo Khanseleng ya ITU go kotara ya 2023 go fihla ka..  Dikgetho di tla swarwa nakong ya Khonferense ya Baemedi ba ITU yeo tla swarwago Bucharest, Romania go tloga ka la 26 Lewedi go fihla ka la 14 Diphalane.
tgt_text: Ukusakaza ngamagagasi omoya kungumthombo wemvelo obaluleke kakhulu ekukhuleni komnotho wedijithali eNingizimu Afrika kanye nengqalasizinda yezokuxhumana.

src_text: Afrika Borwa dula ikgafile go dinepo le maikemišetšo ITU go kgokaganya karoganyo ya titšitale le go kgokaganya batho ka moka ba lefase  Ditiragalo tše di Tlago.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo ehlongozwayo ihlose ukweseka ukwabiwa kwamagagasi omoya kanye nokukhishwa kwamalayisensi ezimboni zomakhalekhukhwini; zokusakaza; zezindiza nezasolwandle; zocwaningo nokuthuthukisa; ukufinyelela emphakathini, kanye nezinye izimboni ezifanele.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Bohwa.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo iphinde igqugquzele ukwabelwa okulinganayo nokuneqiniso ukuze kuzofakwa igalelo ekuguqulweni kwalo mkhakha kanye nokufinyelela ekuxhumaneni ngokwedijithali ngisho ezingxenyeni ezingaphandle kwezwe.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Bohwa ya Lewedi ngwaga wo tla ketekwa ka fase ga morero: “Go keteka Bohwa bja Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Setšo wa Afrika Borwa”.
tgt_text: Ukukhethwa Kozomela iNingizimu Afrika kumkhandlu woMfelandawonye Wezokuxhumana Wamazwe Ngamazwe (i-ITU) kanye neBhodi Lokulawulwa Komsakazo..     IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukukhethwa komele iNingizimu Afrika uMnu Mandla Samuel Mchunu kwiBhodi Lokulawulwa Komsakazo (iSifunda .

src_text: Kabinete hlohleletša maAfrika Borwa ka moka go šomiša Kgwedi ya Bohwa go keteka bohwa bja rena bja setšo bja go huma le phapano yeo nago le maatla go kopanya setšhaba.
tgt_text: UMnu Mchunu njengamanje usebenza njengelungu lebhodi.

src_text: Ka moka re swanetše go ikgafa go šoma mmogo go fediša dikarologanyo le go hloka toka ga nako ya go feta le go godiša temogo ya go ikgantšha ka go ba maAfrika Borwa  Melaetša.
tgt_text: Uphakanyiselwe ukuthi aphinde akhethwe kuMkhandlu we-ITU wesikhathi sangowezi-2023 kuya kowezi-.

src_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebogiša le go lakaletša tše dibotse go:Bathopasefoka ka moka, bathopa dimetale le baphadišani bao ba kgathilego tema mo Lebelong la Comrades, leo le tsebegago bjalo ka “Lebelo la Batho la go Phala ka Moka, ka Lamorena, 28 Phato.

Lebelo la banna le thopilwe ke Tete Dijane (Diiri tše 5, metsotso ye 30, metsotswana ye 38) go tšwa Mahikeng ka Leboa Bodikela mola mokitimi wa Russia Alexandra Morozova thopile lebelo la basadi (Diiri tše 6, metsotso ye 17, metsotswana ye 47).
tgt_text: Ukhetho luzokwenzeka ngesikhathi seNkomfa Yamanxusa e-ITU ezobanjwa e-Bucharest, e-Romania kusuka mhla wama-26 kuMandulo kuya mhla ziyi-14 kuMfumfu.
