src_text: MahlokoKabinete romela melaetša ya mahloko go:Mama Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), molwelatokologo wa kgale yoo bego le moamogedi wa Sefoka sa Setšhaba sa Luthile ka 2004 ka “go kgatha tema ga gagwe mo go lweleng tokologo ya ditokelo tša bašomi le temogo go go se kgetholle ka mmala, ka bong, le Afrika Borwa ye lokologilego ya toka”.Bahlenkedi ba Ditirelo tša Maphodisa Afrika Borwa (SAPS) ba bahlano bao bego le banamedi ba sefofane sa SAPS seo se welego Boemafofaneng bja Rand, Germiston ka Labobedi, 30 Phato.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika isalokhu izinikele ngezinjongo ze-ITU zokuvala igebe kwezedijithali ixhumanise bonke abantu emhlabeni     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: SAPS nyakišiša seo se hlotšego go wa ga sona.
tgt_text: INyanga Yamagugu.

src_text: Kabinete lakaletša mofofiši yoo gobetšego kudu gore fole ka pela  Bao ba Thwetšwego Mešomong.
tgt_text: INyanga Yamagugu ngoMandulo kulo nyaka izobungazwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: "Sibungaza Ifa lika-Solomon Linda kanye Nomculo Womdabu waseNingizimu Afrika".

src_text: Batho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona dithuto tla tiišetšwa le go netefatšwa ka maleba  Mohumagadi Gugulethu Abigail Thimane bjalo ka Motlatšamolaodimogophethiši (DDG):Tekolo ya Lekala la Mmušo le Tlhabollo ya Bokgoni ka go Kgoro ya Peakanyo, Tekodišišo le Tshekatsheko ya Phethagatšo ya Mošomo  Mohumagadi Kwena Komape bjalo ka DDG: Tlhabollo ya Ekonomi, Kgwebo le Papatšo ka go Kgoro ya Temo, Peakanyoleswa ya Naga le Tlhabollo ya Dinagamagae  Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole bjalo ka DDG: Senthara ya Taolo ya Masetlapelo Setšhaba mo Kgorong ya Pušotirišano.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi linxusa bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi basebenzise iNyanga Yamagugu ukubungaza amasiko ethu anothile kanye nokwehlukana okunamandla okubumba isizwe sethu.

src_text: Mohlagase.
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Tona ya Dikgwebo tša Mmušo Pravin Gordhana begetše kabinete ka bokgoni bja Eskom bja go fokotša go kgaotšwa ga mohlagase ga nako le nako gape filwe pego ya seo se šetšwego se dirilwe go tšwa Komiting ya Semmušo ya Komiti ya Mathata Mohlagase ya Setšhaba.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lethulelwe umbiko nguNgqongqoshe Wezamabhizinisi Kahulumeni u-Pravin Gordhan mayelana namandla enkampani yakwa-Eskom okunciphisa ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga okwenzeka ngezikhathi ezithile ezibekiwe, futhi liwutholile nombiko wenqubekela phambili esiyenziwe ovela eKomidini Lobungoti Bomsebenzi leKomidi Likazwelonke Elijutshwe Ukubhekana Nenkinga Yamandla Kagesi..     Ezinye izimemezelo zizokwenziwa emuva kokuphothulwa kwezingxoxo zokudingidwa ngokujulile kwale mibiko.

src_text: Go tla dirwa ditsebišo tše dingwe go latela go phethwa ga dipoledišano tša go tsenelela tša dipego tše.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukudabuka kwalo ngokuphazamiseka kanye nobunzima obubangelwa wukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga emabhizinisini kanye namakhaya, ikakhulukazi okwenzeka esikhathini lapho uhulumeni ematasa nemizamo yokungenelela eyamenyezelwa nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ngoNtulikazi.

src_text: Kabinete tšweleditše manyami ka tšhitišo le mathata ao hlolwago ke go kgaolwa ga mohlagase go dikgwebo le magae, kudu di direga ka nako yeo mmušo swaraganego le ditsenogare tšeo di tsebišitšwego ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Mosegamanye.
Peeletšo.
tgt_text: Utshalomali.

src_text: Kabinete amogela go thakgolwa ga Lefelo le lefsa la Tšweletšo la Sandvik Khomanani ka Kempton Park, leo bego le karolo ya peeletšo ya R350 milione yeo tshepišitšwego mo Khonferenseng ya bone ya Dipeeletšo ya Afrika Borwa (SAIC) yeo bego swerwe Senthareng ya Dikopano ya Sandton ka Johannesburg ka la 24 Hlakola..  Mothopo wo mofsa wa dikwere metara tše 62 000 kopanya ditshepetšo tšeo di thomilwego pele mo mafelong go fapana mahlano gomme di akaretša bašomi bao ka bago ba.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe ukwethulwa kwesizinda sokukhiqiza esisha i-Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing Site e-Kempton Park, esiyingxenye yotshalomali oluyizigidi ezingama-R350 olwathenjiswa eNgqungqutheleni Yotshalomali yaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SAIC) eyayibanjelwe e-Sandton Convention Centre eGoli mhla zingama-24 kuNdasa..     Lesi sizinda esisha esingamamithasikwele ayizi-62 000 sihlanganisa ndawonye imisebenzi ngaphambilini ebeyenziwa ezizindeni ezinhlanu ezihlukene futhi sizokwazi ukwamukela abasebenzi abalinganiselwa kuma-.

src_text: Ke ye nngwe ya methopo ye megolo go feta ka moka ya Sandvik gape ya maemo godimo lefaseng ka moka, gomme na le bokgoni bja go tšweletša metšhene ya go laiša ya ka fase ga mabu ya go ba le ditšweletšwa tša Afrika Borwa tša 60%.
tgt_text: Lesi singesinye sezizinda zabakwa-Sandvik ezinkulukazi futhi ezithuthuke kakhulu emhlabeni wonke jikelele, futhi sinamandla okukhiqiza imishini yokulayisha esebenza ngaphansi komhlaba equkethe umkhiqizo ongaphezu kwama-60% waseNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete amogela gape ketelo ya tekolo ya Mopresidente Ramaphosa ka KwaZulu-Natal nakong ya thakgolo ya mothopo wa tšweletšo wa Hesto Harnesses ka Stanger, KwaDukuza ka la 13 Lewedi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilwamukelile futhi nohambo lokuhlola lukaMongameli u-Ramaphosa lapho ebevakashele khona esifundazweni saKwaZulu-Natali ngenkathi kwethulwa isikhungo sokukhiqiza, i-Hesto Harnesses, e-Stanger, KwaDukuza mhla ziyi-13 kuMandulo.

src_text: Mothopo wo ke wo mongwe wa diprotšeke tša dipeeletšo tša tšhelete tše hlano tšeo di dirago karolo ya boikgafo bja  4 bilione bja Metair Investments Limited go thekga katološo le go dira Ford Ranger ye mpsha ya gae.
tgt_text: Lesi sikhungo singomunye wemiklamo emihlanu emikhulukazi yotshalomali oluyingxenye yalolo oluyizigidigidi ezingama-R. 4 olwathenjiswa yinkampani yakwa-Metair Investments Limited ukweseka umsebenzi wokwelulwa komklamo kanye nokukhiqizwa kohlobo olusha lwe-Ford Ranger kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Mopresidente tsenetše gape go bulwa ga mpshafatšo le katološo ya protšeke ya Sappi Saiccor Mill ye bitšago R7,7 bilione ka Umkomaas, yeo maikemišetšo yona lego go godiša bokgoni le katlego ya lefase ya khamphani mola ka go le lengwe hlola dibaka tša mošomo tša nako ye kopana le nako ye telele.
tgt_text: UMongameli wahambela futhi nomcimbi wokuvulwa komklamo wokukhuliswa nokwelulwa kwesigayo i-Sappi Saiccor Mill okungumklamo wezigidigidi ezingama-R. 7 osendaweni yaseMkhomazi okuhloswe ngawo ukukhulisa amandla kanye nekhono lenkampani lokuncintisana nezinye izinkampani emhlabeni wonke jikelele futhi kusenjalo kuvulwe namathuba omsebenzi esikhathi esifushane kanye nawesikhathi eside..     Lolu tshalomali luyingxenye yotshalomali olwathenjiswa ngosozimboni engqungqutheleni i-SAIC.

src_text: Dipeeletšo tše di dira karolo ya maikano ao dirilwego ke boraintasteri mo SAIC.
tgt_text: Lonke utshalomali olusha olungena ezweni lethu luyalekelela ekwakheni kabusha nokuvuselela umnotho wethu, futhi lokhu kuyaqhubeka nokukhangisa nokubonisa ngokusobala ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika iyizwe eliyintandokazi kubatshalizimali.

src_text: Peeletšo ye nngwe le ye nngwe ye mpsha ka nageng ya rena thuša go kagolefsa le kaonafatšo ya ekonomi ya rena, gomme tšwela pele go akaretša Afrika Borwa bjalo ka nepo ya peeletšo ya kgetho.
tgt_text: Ukuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda.

src_text: Tlhabollo ya infrastraktšha.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukelile ukuvulwa kwesigaba esisha somgwaqo i-Musina Ring Road eLimpopo ozokwenza kube lula ukuhamba eMusina namaphethelo, futhi okungumgwaqo ozovumela ukukhuliswa kohwebo kanye nemisebenzi yezomnotho phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika namazwe eNhlangano Yokuthuthukiswa Kwamazwe aseNingizimu ne-Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete amogela go bulwa ga karolo ye mpsha ya Tsela ya Manyokenyoke ya Musina ka Limpopo yeo tla dirago gore go be bonolo go batho go sepela ka Musina, gomme ya dumelela gape mešongwana ya kgwebo le ekonomi gare ga Afrika Borwa le dinaga tša Ditšhaba tša Tlhabollo tša Borwa bja Afrika.
tgt_text: Lo mklamo wezigidi ezingama-R640 uvule amathuba kubantu basendaweni abasebenza ngokugcwele abangaphezu kwama-275 futhi uhlinzeke ngamathuba emiphakathini yendawo kanye namabhizinisi asafufusa (ama-SMME)..     Ukwakhiwa komgwaqo i-Musina Ring Road kuyingxenye yohlelo lwengqalasizinda lukahulumeni, ngokusebenzisa uHlelo Lokwakhiwa Kabusha Nokuvuselelwa Komnotho (i-ERRP), okuhloswe ngalo ukwakha ukukhula okubandakanyayo namathuba omsebenzi emikhakheni yonkana nemiphakathi ehlukahlukene.

src_text: Protšeke ya R640 milione hlotše mešomo ye 275 ya go ya go ile ya batho ba gae gomme ya aba dibaka go ditšhaba tša gae le dikgwebo tše dinnyane le tše dikgolo gammogo le dikgwebopotlana (di-SMME).
tgt_text: Inhlekelele yase-Jagersfontein.

src_text: Go agwa ga Tsela ya Manyokenyoke ya Musina ke karolo ya lenaneo la infrastraktšha ya mmušo, ka ERRP, yeo nyakago go hlola kgolo ya kakaretšo le dibaka tša mešomo go phatlalala le makala le ditšhaba.
tgt_text: 1    IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukudabuka kwalo okukhulu futhi ladlulisa amazwi enduduzo emindenini yalabo abalahlekelwe yimiphefumulo yabo emuva kokuqhuma nokubhidlika kwezindonga zedamu lemfucuza yemikhiqizo emayini yendawo e-Jagersfontein eFreyistata futhi okudale izikhukhula zodaka ezidale umonakalo omkhulu entathakusa ngeSonto mhla ziyi-11 kuMandulo.

src_text: Masetlapelo Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: Le nhlekelele idale umonakalo omkhulukazi nakwingqalasizinda yendawo kanye nempahla yabantu enjengezimoto kanye namakhaya amaningana.. 2    Ngenkathi evakashele indawo yenhlekelele ngoMsombuluko mhla ziyi-12 kuMandulo 2022 uMongameli u-Ramaphosa udlulise amazwi okubonga imizamo eyenziwayo endaweni yokutakula kanye nokuvuselela.

src_text: Kabinete rometše melaetša ya mahloko go malapa bao ba lahlegetšwego ke maphelo bona ka morago ga tirigalo ya masetlapelo ya go palega le go tšhologa ga leraga mo moepong wa selegae wo tlogetšwego sa šome ka Jagersfontein ka Freistata mo maseng Lamorena, 11 Lewedi.
tgt_text: Uthembisile futhi ukuthi uhulumeni uzohlinzeka ngosizo oludingekayo kubahlali base-Jagersfontein abakhahlamezekile.

src_text: Masetlapelo tlogetše gape infrastraktšha ya selegae, dithoto tša batho tša go swana le dikoloi le magae mmalwa senyegile kudu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likhuthazekile ngokuthi abanikazi bemayini bathe bona sebemi ngomumo kakade ukuhlinzeka ngosizo futhi basekele uhulumeni uma lokho kucelwa nguMkhandlu Wezimbiwa waseNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Nakong ya ketelo ya gagwe mo lefelong la masetlapelo ka Mošupologo, 12 Lewedi 2022, Mopresidente Ramaphosa lebogile maitapišo go phološa le go hwetša batho le dithoto ao dirilwego mo lefelong la masetlapelo ikanne gape gore mmušo tla fa thekgo yeo hlokegago go badudi bao ba amegilego ba Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: 3    Imboni yezimayini isalokhu iyimboni enohlonze efaka isandla esikhulu emnothweni ngokuhlinzeka ngqo ngamathuba omsebenzi, futhi ihlinzeke nangamanye amathuba okuqashwa kwabantu avuleka emikhakheni esebenzisana nale mboni, ifaka isandla futhi kwingenisomali etholakala ngokuthengiswa kwemikhiqizo emazweni angaphandle, kanye nakutshalomali olungena ngqo kuleli oluvela emazweni angaphandle futhi le mboni idlala indima esemqoka kakhulu ekwenzeni ngcono izimpilo zabantu emiphakathini eyakhelene nezimayini.

src_text: Kabinete hlohleletšwa ke gore beng ba moepo ba re ba ikemišeditše go aba thušo ye hlokegago le thekgo go mmušo ge ka kgopelwa ke Khansele ya Diminirale ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: 4    Uhulumeni kanye nezinhlangano ezingenzi nzuzo ezithile sebengenelele ngokushesha ngokuthi bahlinzeke ngendawo yokukhosela nokufihla ikhanda okwesikhashana, usizo lokwelulekwa kwabahlali ngokwengqondo ukuze bakwazi ukubhekana nenhlekelele ebavelele, omatalasi kanye nezijumbana zokudla.

src_text: Intasteri ya meepo dula le mothekgi yo bohlokwa wa ekonomi ka go thwala thwii goba go se thwale thwii, megolo ya kišontle, le peeletšo ya thwii ya dinaga tša ka ntle, gomme kgatha tema ye bohlokwa mo go kaonafatšeng maphelo ditšhaba tša meepong.
tgt_text: Sekubuyiseliwe esimweni esijwayelekile ukuphakelwa kwamanzi nogesi endaweni.

src_text: Mmušo le mekgatlo ye mengwe yeo sego ya mmušo ba tsene ka bogare ka bjako ka go fa batho bao ba amegilego madulo nakwana tšhoganetšo, thobamatswalo ya kgatelelo ya monagano le letšhogo le dilo tšeo di hlokegago go swana le mapai, materase le diphuthelwana tša dijo.
Kabo ya meetse le mohlagase mo lefelong bušeditšwe sekeng.
tgt_text: 5    Uma seyikhucululiwe indawo yenhlekelele, ongoti kulindeleke ukuba bahlole umonakalo owenzeke ezindlini.

src_text: Go letetšwe gore dientšenere di dire tekolo ya dibopego tša dintlo, ge lefelo la masetlapelo le hlwekišitšwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi libonge abezimo eziphuthumayo, izinhlangano zomphakathi wonkana kanye namalungu omphakathi ngeminikelo nosizo olubonisa ububele obukhulu.

src_text: Kabinete leboga ditirelo tša tšhoganetšo, mekgatlo ya setšhaba ya segae le maloko setšhaba ka tema yeo ba kgathilego ye kgolo le thušo yeo ba filego batšwasehlabelo.
tgt_text: Umnotho.

src_text: Ekonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi libhungile ngesimo somnotho ezweni kulandela izibalomanani zakamuva ezikhishwe yiNhlangano Yezibalomanani yaseNingizimu Afrika (i-Stats SA) ezibonise ukuthi isambamkhiqizo (i-GDP) sekota yesibili yowezi-2022 sehle ngo-.

src_text: Kabinete tšweleditše maemo ekonomi ka nageng ka morago ga ge dipalolopalo tša kgauswanyane tša Kgoro ya Dipalopalo ya Afrika Borwa (Stats SA) di bontšha gore palomoka ya tšweletšo ya gae (GDP) ya kotara ya bobedi ya 2022 fokotšegile ka 0,7%.
Dilo tšeo di hueditšego phokotšego ye di akareditše kgaotšo ya mohlagase, ntwa ya Russia le Ukraine, le maemo go phela go bitša tšhelete ye ntši le inflešene.
tgt_text: Izimo ezibe nomthelela kulokhu kwehla kwesambamkhiqizo zibandakanya ukucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, udweshu phakathi kwe-Russia ne-Ukraine, kanye nokudlondlobala kwezindleko zokuphila nokwehla kwamandla emali.

src_text: Ditsenogare tšeo di dirilwego ke Leano la Kaonafatšo le Kagolefsa ya Ekonomi (ERRP) di fokoditše kudu naga go dikhuetšo tša boditšhabatšhaba, gape tša šireletša mešomo le letseno.
tgt_text: Izinhlelo zokungenelela ezenziwe ngaphansi kwe-ERRP zibe wusizo olukhulu ekuvikeleni izwe ezivunguvungwini zamazwe ngamazwe, futhi ziyivikelile imisebenzi ngokunjalo futhi zavikela nezindlela abaziphilisa ngazo abantu.

src_text: Ditsenogare tše maatla tša ekonomi tša mmušo di thoma go tšweletša dipoelo tše dibotse, bjale ka ge go hlatsetšwe ka go dipoelo tša Dinyakišišo tša Bašomi tša Kotara ye nngwe le ye nngwe tša Stats SA, tšeo di bontšhitšego gore go bile le mešomo ye 648 000 mo kotareng ya mathomo le ya bobedi tša  Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: Izinhlelo ezinohlonze zikahulumeni zokungenelela emnothweni seziqalile ukuthela izithelo ezinhle, njengalokhu kubonakala emiphumeleni yoCwaningokuhlola Lokubheka Inani Labasebenzi Abakhona Kuleli Olwenziwa Njalo Emuva Kwezinyanga Ezintathu yi-Stats SA olubonise ukuthi kuvuleke imisebenzi eyevile ezi-648 000 phakathi kwekota yokuqala nekota yesibili yowezi-     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Tlhako ya Tlhahlobo le Tekolo (M&E) ya Pholisi ya Bafsa ya Setšhaba (NYP).
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lokuqapha Nokuhlola (i-M&E) lweNqubomgomo Kazwelonke Yentsha (i-NYP).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhako ya M&E yeo tla kgontšhago tlhahlobo le kelo ya khuetšo ya dintlha tša bohlokwa tša NYP ya 2020-.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilugunyazile uhlaka lwe-M&E oluzovumela ukuqapha okusebenza kahle kanye nokuhlolwa komthelela wezinsika ze-NYP yowezi-2020-.

src_text: Tlhako fa ditaetši tša legato la godimo tše hlano tšeo di sepelelanago le dintlha tša bohlokwa tša NYP.
tgt_text: Lolu hlaka luhlinzeka ngezinkombakusebenza ezinhlanu ezisezingeni eliphezulu ezihambelana nezinsika ze-NYP.

src_text: Ditaetši di dirilwe le bakgathatema ba maleba bao ba nago le kgahlego mo tlhabollong le matlafatšong ya bafsa ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Izinkombakusebenza zenziwa ngokubambisana nababambiqhaza abafanele abanentshisekelo ekuthuthukisweni nokufukulwa kwentsha ezweni.

src_text: Tshedimošo tla kgoboketšwa ka go aroganywa ka dikarolo go ya ka mengwaga, bong, bogolofadi, sehlopha sa merafe le tikologo ya thutafase ya ditsenogare tše.
tgt_text: Ukuqoqwa kwemininingwane kuzohlukaniswa ngokweminyaka yobudala, ubulili, ukukhubazeka, uhlanga lomuntu kanye nendawo okwenzelwa kuyona lezi zinhlelo zokungenelela..     Umsebenzi wokuqapha uzokwenziwa kuyo yonke imikhakha kahulumeni, izikhungo zikahulumeni kanye nomkhakha ozimele.

src_text: Dikgato tše tša go dira ditlhahlobo di tla dirwa ka mafelong ka moka mmušo, ka ditheong ka moka le lekaleng la praebete.
tgt_text: Imibiko izokhiqizwa njalo ngekota yonyaka bese ishicilelwa kabili ngonyaka..     Uhlaka Lwenqubomgomo Yokuhlela Okudidiyelwe.

src_text: Dipego tša tšona di tla dirwa kotareng ye nngwe le ye nngwe gomme tša phatlalatšwa gabedi ka ngwaga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilugunyazile uHlaka Lwenqubomgomo Yokuhlela Okudidiyelwe kuhulumeni, okuhloswe ngalo ukuvala amagebe ahlonziwe ekuhlelweni kwenqubomgomo ohlelweni lokuhlela okuyilona olukhona nolusebenzayo njengamanje.

src_text: Tlhako ya Pholisi ya Peakanyo ye Kopantšwego.
tgt_text: Izinhlelo zokungenelela ezihlongozwayo, phakathi kokunye, zizobhekana nokungabi khona kokuhlela okuhambelanayo emikhakheni yomithathu kahulumeni.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Tlhako ya Pholisi ya Peakanyo ye Kopantšwego ya mmušo, yeo nyakago go šogana le mafokodi peakanyo ya pholisi ao utollotšwego mo lenaneong la peakanyo la gonabjale.
tgt_text: Izinhlelo zokungenelela zizokwethula indlela yokuqapha esekelwe phezu kobufakazi.

src_text: Ditsenogare tšeo di šišintšwego di tla re gare ga tše dingwe tša šogana le tlhokego ya tlhopo ya peakanyo mo dikarolong tše tharo tša mmušo.
tgt_text: Uhlaka lwenqubomgomo lwethula futhi nesimo sokubikezela kalula esihambisana nokuhlelela isikhathi esimaphakathi kanye nesikhathi esifushane kuhulumeni wonkana.

src_text: Ditsenogare di tla tsebiša mokgwa wa tlhahlobo wo theilwego go bohlatse.
tgt_text: Luzosebenzela ekwethulweni kwezinguquko zomthetho ukuze kwenziwe ngcono ukusebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo futhi ebikezelekayo emsebenzini kahulumeni wokuhlela nokuqapha..     Ukugunyazwa ngokusemthethweni kweSivumelwano Sokusungulwa Kwenhlangano Yezemithi yase-Afrika (i-AMA).

src_text: Tlhako ya pholisi tsebišitše gape kakanyo ye bonolo ka peakanyo ya nako ye telele go ya magareng le peakanyo ya nako ye kopana go phatlalala le mmušo tla šomela go thoma dimpshafatšo tša melao go kaonafatša kopano le kakanyo mo peakanyong le tlhahlobong ya mmušo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusayinwa kweSivumelwano Sokusungulwa kwe-AMA kanye nokuthunyelwa kwaso ePhalamende ukuze sigunyazwe ngokusemthethweni.

src_text: Tumelelo ya Tumelelano ya go Thongwa ga Mokgatlo wa Dihlare tša Seafrika (AMA).
tgt_text: Lokhu kuzoqalisa ukusebenza kwesivumelwano esamukelwa ngokusemthethweni eMhlanganweni weNhlangano Yamazwe ase-Afrika ngowezi-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go saenwa ga Tumelelano ya go Thongwa ga AMA le go išwa ga yona Palamenteng go ka dumelelwa.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano sisungula ngokusemthethweni i-AMA eqondene nezwekazi.

src_text: Se se tla phetha tumelelano yeo amogelwago ke Kopano ya Tumelelano ya Afrika ka.
tgt_text: Le nhlangano izolawula imikhiqizo yokwelapha, futhi yenze ngcono ukuphepha nokusebenza kahle kwemikhiqizo yokwelapha kuleli zwekazi.

src_text: Tumelelano thoma semmušo AMA ya kontinente.
tgt_text: Ukusayinwa nokugunyazwa ngokusemthethweni kwalesi sivumelwano kuzothuthukisa ukuzibophezela kweNingizimu Afrika emazweni omhlaba kanye namazwe ezwekazi ekusebenzeleni ukuqinisa ukusebenza kohlelo lokulawula lwezwekazi phezu kwemikhiqizo yayo yezempilo..     Umbiko maqondana nokuSebenza Kohlelo Lwesikhuthazo-ntela Socwaningo Nokuthuthukisa (i-R&D) – wezi-2019/20 kanye nezi-2020/.

src_text: Mokgatlo tla laola ditšweletšwa tša dihlare, gomme wa kaonafatša polokego le bokgoni bja ditšweletšwa tša dihlare ka kontinenteng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukwethulwa ePhalamende koHlelo Lwesikhuthazo-ntela Socwaningo Nokuthuthukisa lweminyaka emibili edlule (owezi-2019/20 kanye nowezi-2020/21).

src_text: Go saenwa le go dumelelwa ga tumelelano ye go tla kaonafatša boikgafo bja Afrika Borwa mo lefaseng le mo kontinenteng mo go matlafatšeng lenaneo la taolo ya kontinente mo go ditšweletšwa tša maphelo.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuhambisana nesigaba 11D (17) soMthetho Wezentela Yengenisomali, we-1962 (uMthetho wama-58 we-1962), odinga ukuthi le mibiko yethulwe ePhalamende.

src_text: Pego ka ga Lenaneo la Tlhohleletšo ya Motšhelo la Phethagatšo ya Dinyakišišo le Tlhabollo (R&D) – 2019/20 le 2020/.
tgt_text: Uhlelo lwesikhuthazo-ntela luhlose ukugqugquzela izinkampani ezizimele ukuthi zitshale izimali ku-R&D ukuze kukhuthazwe ukukhula kotshalomali.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya Motšhelo la R&D Palamenteng mo mengwageng ye mebedi ya go feta (2019/20 le 2020/21).
tgt_text: Luvumela ukuthuthukiswa kwezesayensi nokuqanjwa nokusungulwa kwezinto ezintsha ngenhloso yokukhulisa umnotho futhi kugqugquzelwe nokuncintisana.

src_text: Se se sepelelana le karolo ya 11D (17) ya Molao wa Motšhelo wa Letseno, wa 1962 (Molao wa 58 wa 1962), woo nyakago go alwa ga dipego tše ka Palamenteng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyakuthokozela ukuthi umbiko ubonisa ukuthi izinkampani ezintsha zisifakile isicelo sesikhuthazo-ntela.

src_text: Lenaneo la tlhohleletšo ya motšhelo le nyaka go hlohleletša dikhamphani tša praebete go beeletša mo go R&D gore go hlohleletšwe kgolo ya ekonomi, le go godiša katlego.
tgt_text: Liyazikhuthaza nezinye izinkampani ukuthi zingene kulolu hlelo njengengxenye yokukhulisa utshalomali lwazo ngokwehlukana kwazo futhi ngalokho kukhuthazwe ukukhula komnotho.

src_text: Kabinete thabela gore pego bontšha gore dikhamphani tše difsa di dirile kgopelo ya tlhohleletšo ya motšhelo hlohleletša dikhamphani tše dintši go hwetša setlamo se bjalo ka karolo ya go godiša dipeeletšo tša bona le go hlohleletša kgolo ya ekonomi.
tgt_text: Izinkampani ezine ezihamba phambili ezinkampanini esezisitholile isikhuthazo-ntela zisemkhakheni wezokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo; owokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezimayini ngaphakathi kuleli lizwe ukuze kuhlomule kakhulu abantu bakuleli; owamakhemikhali, owezimonyo, owemithi yokwelapha, owemikhiqizo yobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kanye nowezoBuchwepheshe Bolwazi okuyimikhakha egunyazwe yiKhabhinethi njengemikhakha eseqhulwini oHlelweni Lokusebenza Lwenqubomgomo Yezimboni.

src_text: Dikhamphani tše nne tša godimo tšeo di hweditšego tlhohleletšo ya motšhelo di ka makaleng tshepetšo ya ditšweletšwa tša temo; kaonafatšo ya meepo; dikhemikhale, dibotsefatši, dihlare le elektrotheknikhale le Theknolotši ya Tshedimošo tšeo Kabinete di dumeletšego bjalo ka dikarolo tše bohlokwa mo Leanong la Katlego ya Pholisi ya Intasteri.
tgt_text: Umbiko ophelele uyatholakala kuwebhusayithi yoMnyango Wezesayensi Nokuqanjwa Kwezinto Ezintsha: www.dst.gov.za..     Isithangami Somthetho Wokukhula kanye Namathuba e-Afrika (i-AGOA) – sowezi-.

src_text: Pego ka botlalo ka hwetšwa mo wepsaeteng ya Kgoro ya Saense le Kaonofatšo: www.dst.gov.za.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusingathwa kweSithangami se-AGOA ngowezi-.

src_text: Foramo ya Molao wa Dibaka le Kgolo ya Afrika (AGOA) -.
tgt_text: I-AGOA ngumthetho owashaywa yizwe laseMelika (i-USA) ngowezi-2000 ukuhlinzeka ngokubhekelelwa kangcono nokucatshangelwa kwamazwe aseNingizimu nogwadule i-Sahara maqondana nezohwebo kanye nokufinyelela ezimakethe zangaphakathi e-USA.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga Foramo ya AGOA ka.
tgt_text: Izimpahla ezithunyelwa ngaphandle yiNingizimu Afrika ngaphansi kwe-AGOA zibandakanya izithelo ezidliwayo, amantongomane, izimoto, izingxenye zezimoto, insimbi, imikhiqizo esansimbi kanye nemikhiqizo yamakhemikhali.

src_text: AGOA dumeletšwe ke Amerika (USA) ka 2000 go fa phihlelelo ya go ikgetha ya kgwebo ya go ikema go bontši bja dinaga tša Afrika tša Borwa bja Sahara le mebaraka ya gae ya USA.
tgt_text: Usuku nendawo okuzobanjelwa kuyo lesi sithangami kusazomenyezelwa.

src_text: Dikišontle tša Afrika Borwa ka fase ga AGOA di akaretša dienywa tša go butšwa, dimake, dikoloi, didirišwa, tšhipi, setala le ditšweletšwa tša khemikhale.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela yoNgqongqoshe Yeqembu Eliqondene Nokubheka Nokuqoqa Ulwazi Ngomumo-Jikelele Womhlaba (i-GEO) – yowezi-.

src_text: Tšatšikgwedi la nnete le lefelo di sa tlo tsebišwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika isingathe iNgqungquthela yoNgqongqoshe ye-GEO eKapa ngowezi-.

src_text: Samiti ya Ditona ya Sehlopha sa Ditlhahlobo tša Lefase (GEO) –.
tgt_text: I-GEO yinhlangano yohulumeni abahlukahlukene eyasungulwa ngowezi-2003 emuva kokubanjwa kweNgqungquthela Yomhlaba Yentuthuko Esimeme.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše gore Afrika Borwa sware Samiti ya Ditona ya GEO ka Motsekapa ka.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuyisigcawu esibandakanya ohulumeni bamazwe ahlukahlukene lapho amazwe efaka isandla ngokuzithandela kwawo ekufezekiseni inhloso eyodwa futhi efanayo yokwakha izinhlelo ze-GEO.

src_text: GEO ke mokgatlo wa mebušo ya boditšhabatšhaba woo hlomilwego ka 2003 ka morago ga Samiti ya Lefase ya Tlhabollo ya go Swarelela šoma bjalo ka sefala sa kopano moo dinaga di kgathago tema ka go ithaopa go fihlelela nepo ya go swana ya go aga mananeo GEO.
tgt_text: Njengamanje i-GEO inohulumeni bamazwe abangaphezu kwe-113, futhi abangama-30 kulaba ngohulumeni abavela emazweni ase-Afrika kanye nezinhlangano ezilinganiselwa kwi-140, futhi eziyi-11 kulezi yizinhlangano ezivela kwelase-Afrika.

src_text: Gonabjale GEO na le mebušo ya bosetšhaba ya go feta 113, ye 30 ya yona tšwago ka Afrika gomme mekgatlo ye ka bago 140 kgatha tema, gomme ye 11 ya yona tšwa Afrika.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ibilokhu iyilungu elibambe iqhaza ngenkuthalo eKomidini Lesigungu Esiphezulu kusukela ngowezi-2005 futhi njengamanje ososayensi bethu babambe iqhaza emiklamweni yocwaningo eminingana eholwa yi-GEO.

src_text: Afrika Borwa dutše le leloko la Komitiphethiši go tloga ka 2005 gomme boramahlale ba rena gonabjale ba kgatha tema mananeong dinyakišišo mmalwa ao etilwego pele ke GEO.
tgt_text: UNcwaba Inyanga Yezokuthutha (i-OTM) –.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Dinamelwa ya Diphalane (OTM) –.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukwethulwa komkhankaso we-OTM ngoMgqibelo mhla lu-1 kuNcwaba 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Sishov’ingolovane: ngokubambisana sakha ingqalasizinda yezokuthutha eyakha futhi isimamise izindlela zokuziphilisa”.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go thakgolwa ga lesolo la OTM ka Mokibelo, 1 Diphalane 2022, ka fase ga morero: “Sishov’ingolovane: mmogo re aga infrastraktšha ya dinamelwa yeo agago mešomo ya go swarelela”.
tgt_text: I-OTM yaminyaka yonke isetshenziselwa ukuqwashisa ngezokuthutha njengenye yezinto ezisemqoka kakhulu ekukhuliseni umnotho kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zokuhlala nokuziphilisa.

src_text: OTM ya ngwaga le ngwaga šomišwa go godiša temošo ka dinamelwa bjalo ka dikarolo tše bohlokwa mo kgolong ya ekonomi le tlhabollo ya mahlakore mararo.
tgt_text: Kunemicimbi eminingana ezobanjwa ngenhloso yokubonisa izinto ezisemqoka ezihlukahlukene zengqalasizinda yezokuthutha emkhakheni wezokuthutha ngezindiza, ngemikhumbi, owezokuthuthwa komphakathi kanye nemigwaqo.

src_text: Go tla ba le ditiragalo tše mmalwa go bontšha dikarolo tše mmalwa tša infrastraktšha ya dinamelwa ka go difofane, dikepe, dinamelwa tša bohle le ditsela.
tgt_text: Imicimbi izoqwashisa futhi nangokuphepha nokuvikeleka emgwaqeni.

src_text: Ditiragalo di lemoša gape ka polokego le tšhireletšo ya dinamelwa.
tgt_text: Kuzobanjwa futhi nezingxoxo zokubonisana nababambiqhaza ukuze kubhungwe ngezinselele ezihlukahlukene ezikhona emkhakheni wezokuthutha.

src_text: Go tla akaretšwa gape bakgathatema go boledišana ka ditlhohlo tša go fapana mo lekaleng la dinamelwa.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni usalokhu ezibophezele ekwenzeni ngcono ingqalasizinda yezokuthutha, ezindaweni zasemakhaya ngokunjalo futhi nasezindaweni ezisemadolobheni, ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthuthwa kwezimpahla nabantu ngendlela efanele..     UMhlangano weNhlangano Yezizwe (i-UN) woHlelo Lokuhlaliswa Kwabantu (i-UN-HABITAT).

src_text: Mmušo dula ikgafile mo go kaonafatšeng infrastraktšha ya dinamelwa ya naga, bobedi mo mafelong segae le setoropong, gore go sepetšwe tshepelo ye botse gape ya bokgoni ya dithoto le batho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusingathwa komhlangano wamalungu e-UN-HABITAT eGoli mhla ziyi-16 kanye nomhla ziyi-17 kuMfumfu.

src_text: Kopano ya Lenaneo la Magae la Bodulo bja Batho (UN-HABITAT) la Kopanoditšhaba (UN).

Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga kopano ya maloko UN-HABITAT ka Johannesburg ka la 16 Diphalane..  Kgoro ya Bodulo bja Batho tla sepetša kopano ye ya matšatši mabedi yeo tla tsenelwago ke ditsebi tša dipolotiki, ditsebi le banyakišiši, go akaretša malokomagolo Komiti ya go ya go ile ya Baemedi ba UN-HABITAT bao ba lego Nairobi, Kenya.
tgt_text: UMnyango Wezokuhlaliswa Kwabantu yiwona ozohlela futhi ulawule lo mhlangano wezinsuku ezimbili ozokwethanyelwa yizingqwele zezepolitiki, ongoti abangabasebenzi bomkhakha kanye nabacwaningi, kubandakanya namalungu asemqoka eKomidi Lamanxusa le-UN-HABITAT elizinze e-Nairobi, kwelase-Kenya.

src_text: Ditaba tše bohlokwa tšeo go tla bolelwago ka tšona di tla akaretša ditsenogare tša phetogo go badudi ba mekhukhung le metsesetoropo go tlala kudu.
tgt_text: Izindaba ezisemqoka okuzobhungwa ngazo zibandakanya ukuzama ukuthola izinhlelo zokungenelela ezizoletha uguquko ezindaweni zokuhlaliswa kwabantu nezindawo eziyimijondolo.

src_text: Dipoelo tša dipoledišano tše di tla phethwa mo thakgolong ya Tlhako ya Leano la Katlego la Lefase, yeo tla alwago Kopanong ya UN-HABITAT gore dumelelwe ka  Melaokakanywa.
tgt_text: Imiphumela yalezi zingxoxo izoholela ekwethulweni koHlaka Lohlelo Lokusebenza Lomhlaba Wonke, oluzokwethulwa eMhlanganweni Wesigungu se-UN-HABITAT ngowezi-2023 ukuze lugunyazwe ngokusemthethweni     Imithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wa Khansele ya Setšhaba ya Dikgaruru tša Bong le Dipolao tša Basadi le Bana (GBVF) wa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Womkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezodlame Olweyamene Nobulili kanye Nokubulawa Kwabantu Besifazane (i-GBVF) wezi-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa ga Molaokakanywa wa Khansele ya Setšhaba ya 2021 Palamenteng gore go šoganwe le wona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukwethulwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa woMkhandlu Kazwelonke we-GBVF wezi-2021 ukuze ucutshungulwe.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo fa tlhako ya molao mo go hlongweng ga mokgatlo wa molao gore go be le tsenogare ye nepišago mo go šoganeng le GBVF dumelela gape go thongwa ga Boto ya Khansele yeo tla fago taolo yeo beakantšwego gomme ya laola phethagatšo ya Leano la Taolo ya Setšhaba ka ga GBVF, leo le dumeletšwego ke Kabinete ka Diphalane 2020 go phethagatšwa.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa uhlinzeka ngohlaka lomthetho lokusungulwa kwenhlangano eyakhiwe ngokomthetho wePhalamende ezogxila ngokuphelele ekubhekaneni ne-GBVF.

src_text: Boto tla le kemedi ya 51 go tšwa go setšhaba sa gae le 49% go tšwa mmušong.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlinzekela futhi nokusungulwa kweBhodi loMkhandlu elizohlinzeka ngobuholi obukhethekile obunobuqhinga futhi lengamele ukuqaliswa koHlelo Lobuqhinga Lukazwelonke oluqondene ne-GBVF, olwagunyazwa yiKhabhinethi ngoMfumfu 2020 ukuze luqaliswe.

src_text: Molaokakanywa šetše swayaswayilwe ke setšhaba.
tgt_text: Ibhodi lizoba nabameleli abangama-51% abavela ezinhlanganweni zomphakathi wonkana bese futhi kuba nabangama-49% abavela kuhulumeni.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wa Ditšweletšwa tša Motšoko le Didirišwa tša go Kgoga Motšoko tša Elektroniki wa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa usudlulile kakade esigabeni sokufakana imilomo nomphakathi..     UMthethosivivinywa Wokulawulwa Kwemikhiqizo Kagwayi kanye Nogwayi Obhenywa Ngamadivayisi Obuchwepheshe Besimanjemanje wezi-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go išwa palamenteng Ditshwayotshwayo tša Molaokakanywa wa Ditšweletšwa tša Motšoko le Didirišwa tša go Kgoga Motšoko tša Elektroniki wa 2018, tšeo di nyakago go phumola Molao wa gonabjale wa go Laola Ditšweletšwa tša Motšoko, (Molao wa 83 wa 1993) go ya le ka moo mpshafaditšwego ka gona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukwethulwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokulawulwa Kwemikhiqizo Kagwayi kanye Nogwayi Obhenywa Ngamadivayisi Obuchwepheshe Besimanjemanje wezi-2018, ohlose ukuqeda ukusebenza komthetho okhona njengamanje uMthetho Wokulawulwa Kwemikhiqizo Kagwayi, we-1993 (uMthetho wama-83 we-1993), njengoba uchitshiyeliwe.

src_text: Molaokakanywa nyaka go matlafatša magato maphelo setšhaba naga gomme dire gore sepelelane le Tumelelano ya Tlhako ya Mokgatlo wa Maphelo Lefase ka ga Taolo ya Motšoko.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlose futhi ukuqinisa izinyathelo zezwe zokubhekelela impilo yomphakathi futhi zihanjelaniswe neSivumelwano Sohlaka lweNhlangano Yezempilo Emhlabeni esiqondene noKulawulwa Kukagwayi.

src_text: Molaokakanywa šišinya gare ga tše dingwe, gore go se sa folelwa ka gare ga meago le mafelo mangwe ka ntle ga meago; go fedišwa ga thekišo ya sekerete mo metšheneng ya go rekiša, le go thekga taba ya diphuthelwana tša disekerete le maswao temošo.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uphakamisa, phakathi kokunye, ukuthi kungavunyelwa nakancane ukubhenywa kukagwayi ezindaweni ezingaphakathi kwezakhiwo kanye nasezindaweni ezithile ezingaphandle kwezakhiwo; ukunqatshelwa kokudayiswa kukasikilidi kusetshenziswa imishini ethengisa ugwayi, futhi uqinisa ukuqashelwa kwendlela opakishwa ngayo usikilidi kanye nokufakwa kwezimpawu ezixwayisayo.

src_text: Molaokakanywa fetišitšwe dikgatong tša go tsenelela tša go nyaka maikutlo setšhaba go fapana, go akaretša intasteri ya metšoko mekgatlo ya badudi le dikgoro tša mmušo tša maleba  Ditiragalo tše di Tlago.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa usudlulile ezigabeni zokubonisana okunzulu nababambiqhaza abahlukahlukene, kubandakanya imboni kagwayi, izinhlangano zomphakathi wonkana kanye neminyango kahulumeni efanele     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Kopano ya bo 77 ya Kopanokakaretšo ya UN (UNGA77).
tgt_text: Isigcawu sama-77 SesiGungu-Jikelele se-UN (i-UNGA77).

src_text: Afrika Borwa kgatha tema ka go UNGA77 yeo lego ka go dikantorokgolo tša UN ka Toropokgolong ya New York ka USA go tloga ka la 27 Lewedi 2022 ka fase ga morero: “Nako ya mathata: Go tšweletša ditharollo go kgokaganya ditlhohlo”.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ibambe iqhaza ku-UNGA77 ebanjelwe eNhlokohhovisi ye-UN e-New York City kwelase-USA kusukela mhla zingama-20 kuya kumhla zingama-27 kuMandulo 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Umzuzu oyingqophamlando: Sivula izixazululo eziguqulayo zokusombulula izinselele ezixhumene”.

src_text: Go Borwa bja lefase, khuetšo ya ekonomi le ekonomi ya leago ya leuba la Bolwetši bja Coronavirus (COVID-19) bile bothata kudu malebana le tsošološo go Leboa leo le hlabologilego gomme se se nyaka maitapišo ao kopanetšwego go tšwa dinageng ka moka go kgonthiša gore ga go na yoo tlogetšwego morago.
tgt_text: Emazweni omhlaba aseNingizimu, umthelela wobhubhane lweSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19) emnothweni nenhlalomnotho unokungalingani okuthile kanye nokungahambelani nemizamo yokuvuselelwa kokusimama kwalawa mazwe uma eqhathaniswa namazwe aseNyakatho futhi lokhu kudinga umzamo wokusebenzisana kwawo wonke amazwe ngendlela ebumbene ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi alikho izwe elisala ngemuva..     Ngaphambi kokuba kubanjwe iNgxoxonkulumo-Jikelele ye-UN, uNobhala-Jikelele we-UN, uMnu António Guterres, uzobiza ingqungquthela eqondene “Nokulethwa Koguquko Kwezemfundo” futhi asingathe nomhlangano osezingeni eliphezulu ogxile eziNjongweni Zentuthuko Esimeme (ama-SDG).

src_text: Pele ga Ngangišano ya Kakaretšo ya UN, Mongwaledikakaretšo wa UN, Morena António Guterres tla beakanya samiti ka ga “Go fetoša Thuto” le go swara kopano ya maemo godimo yeo nepišago Dinepo tša Tlhabollo ya go Swarelela (di-SDG).
tgt_text: Umhlangano wama-SDG kulindeleke ukuthi ubukisise izindlela okungabuyiswa ngazo umfutho futhi kusheshiswe nokuqaliswa kwama-SDG.

src_text: Kopano ya di-SDG swanelwa ke go nyakišiša ditsela tšeo go ka tsošološago maatla le go potlakiša phethagatšo.
tgt_text: Usuku Lwamagugu.

src_text: Letšatši la Bohwa.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa uzokwethula inkulumo yosuku emcimbini wokubungaza uSuku Lwamagugu Lukazwelonke lowezi-2022 ozobanjelwa eZindlini Zombuso ngoMgqibelo mhla zingama-24 kuMandulo.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fa polelokgolo mo meketekong ya Letšatši la Bohwa la Setšhaba mo Union Buildings ka Mokibelo, 24 Lewedi.
tgt_text: Lo mgubho uzobanjwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Sibungaza Ifa lika-Solomon Linda kanye noMculo Wesintu waseNingizimu Afrika”..     INyanga Yamagugu yalo nyaka igxile emculweni wesintu waseNingizimu Afrika ikakhulukazi umculo weSicathamiya kanye negalelo lawo elikhulukazi kwezemidlalo, ubuciko, amasiko kanye namagugu kuleli.

src_text: Moletlo tla swarwa ka fase ga morero: “Go keteka Bohwa bja Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Setšo wa Afrika Borwa”.
tgt_text: Isiqubulo siwuphawu lokuhlonipha nokubungaza iminyaka engama-60 kwashona umculi, umhlabeleli kanye nomqambi wezingoma u-Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), owabe aziwa futhi ngelika-Solomon Ntsele, futhi edume kakhulu njengomqambi wengoma esihloko sithi, “iMbube”.

src_text: Kgwedi ye ya Bohwa nepiša mmino wa setšo wa Afrika Borwa ka nepišo ya mmino wa Isicathamiya le tema yeo ikgathago go dipapadi, bokgabo, setšo le bohwa.
tgt_text: Umcimbi Ozokwenzeka Ngesikhathi Esifanayo Wosuku Lomhlaba Lwezithuthi Zasolwandle lowezi-2022 .

src_text: Morero hlompha matswalo bo 60 go hlokofala ga rammino, seopedi le motšweletši Solomon Popoli Linda (1901-1962), yoo tsebegago gape bjalo ka Solomon Ntsele, yoo tsebegago kudu bjalo ka motšweletši wa koša ya, “Mbube”.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izosingatha uMcimbi Ozokwenzeka Ngesikhathi Esifanayo Wosuku Lomhlaba Lwezithuthi Zasolwandle lowezi-2022 eThekwini kusukela mhla ziyi-12 kuze kube ngumhla ziyi-14 kuMfumfu.

src_text: Moletlo wa go Lebana wa Letšatši la Dikepe la.
tgt_text: Lo mcimbi uzosingathwa ngesikhathi esifanayo lapho kubungazwa i-OTM, futhi uzoba yingxenye yokuqwashisa ngomkhakha wezithuthi zasolwandle.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla be swara Moletlo wa go Lebana wa Letšatši la Dikepe la 2022 ka Durban go tloga ka la 14 Diphalane.
tgt_text: Lo mcimbi uzohlanganisa izithunywa ezivela emazweni ahlukahlukene ezizozibonela ngawazo imboni yaseNingizimu Afrika yezithuthi zasolwandle.

src_text: Moletlo tla swarwa nakong ya OTM, woo le wona tla bago karolo ya go godiša tsebo ya lekala la rena la dikepe.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika selokhu yaba yilungu leNhlangano Yamazwe Ngamazwe Yezithuthi Zasolwandle kusukela ngowe-1995, okuwuphiko olukhethekile lwe-UN olwengamele ukulawulwa komsebenzi wokuthutha ngemikhumbi.

src_text: Moletlo tla tliša baemedi go tšwa dinageng tša go fapana bao ba tla itemogelang intasteri ya dikepe ya Afrika Borwa.
Afrika Borwa bile leloko la Mokgatlo wa Dikepe wa Boditšhabatšhaba go tloga ka 1995, woo lego mokgatlo wa go ikgetha wa UN wa go laola dikepe.
tgt_text: INyanga Yezokuvakasha.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Boeti.
tgt_text: Kulo nyaka, iNyanga Yezokuvakasha izogujwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo soSuku Lwezokuvakasha Lomhlaba (okungumhla zingama-27 kuMandulo) esithi “Sicabanga Kabusha Ngezokuvakasha”.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Boeti ngwaga wo ketekwa ka fase ga morero wa Letšatši la Boeti la Lefase (27 Lewedi) wa “Nagana gape ka Boeti”.
tgt_text: Ezokuvakasha ngaphakathi kuleli zibaluleke kakhulu ekuvuseleleni nokusimamisa umkhakha wezokuvakasha, okuwumkhakha onegalelo elikhulukazi ku-GDP yeNingizimu Afrika kanye nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi.

src_text: Boeti bja gae bo bohlokwa kudu mo go tsošološeng lekala la boeti, leo le kgathago tema kudu go GDP ya Afrika Borwa le go hlola mošomo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likuthokozele ukubona ukuthi umkhakha wezokuhlaliswa nokunakekelwa kwabavakashi uqophe ukukhula kwenani labavakashi esikhathini esilandela ukudamba kwe-COVID-.

src_text: Kabinete thabišwa ke gore lekala la kamogelo ya baeti le begile kgolo ya baeti ka morago ga nako ya COVID-.
tgt_text: Izinkambo zokuvakasha ngaphakathi kuleli eziyizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Go tšerwe maeto gae  2 milione mo seripeng sa mathomo sa 2022 begile koketšego ya 114% ge go bapetšwa le nako ya go swana ka.
tgt_text: 2 ezenzeke ngesigamu sokuqala sowezi-2022 zibonise ukukhula okungama-114% uma kuqhathaniswa nesikhathi esifanayo ngowezi-.

src_text: Se se bontšha kaonafalo ya mmaraka ya nako ya go swana ka 2019, yeo bonego maeto ao tšerwego gae  6 milione.
tgt_text: Lokhu kubonise ukukhula okuphawulekayo impela uma kuqhathaniswa nesikhathi esifanayo ngowezi-2019, lapho ziyizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Bjalo ka karolo ya go keteka Kgwedi ya Boeti, Kabinete hlohleletša maAfrika Borwa go tšea maeto ‘Shortleft’ go ya diprofense tša rena tša go fapana.
tgt_text: 6 izinkambo zokuvakasha ezenzeka.

src_text: Kabinete amogela gape sephetho sa Air Belgium go fofiša difofane tša sehla go ya Afrika Borwa, go thoma kgwedi yona ye (Lewedi), seo se tla matlafatšago boeti gomme sa tiišetša maemo rena bjalo ka nepo ya boeti ya kgetho.
tgt_text: Njengengxenye yokugubha iNyanga Yezokuvakasha, iKhabhinethi likhuthaza abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuba benze izinkambo zokuvakasha ezibizwa phecelezi ngama-‘Shotleft’ ngokuthi bavakashele izifundazwe zethu ezihlukahlukene.

src_text: Se tla akaretša difofane tša beke ye nngwe le ye nngwe go ya Motsekapa le Johannesburg  Melaetša.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lisamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe futhi nesinqumo senkampani yezindiza i-Air Belgium sokuqalisa izinkambo zezindiza eziza eNingizimu Afrika ngezikhathi zonyaka ezithile, kusukela kule nyanga (uMandulo), okuyinto ezokhuthaza ezokuvakasha futhi iqinise isimo sethu njengezwe eliyintandokazi kubavakashi.

src_text: DitebogišoKabinete lebogiša le go lakaletša tše dibotse go:Mopresidente William Samoei Ruto wa Repabliki ya Kenya, yoo hlomamišitšwego ka Labobedi, 13 Lewedi 2022, go latela dikgetho tša bosetšhaba tša khutšo tšeo di swerwego ka la 9 Phato.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuzobandakanya izinkambo zezindiza eziya eKapa kanye naseGoli njalo ngeviki     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Motlatšamopresidente David Mabuza tsenetše tlhomamišo legatong la Mopresidente Ramaphosa, le mmušo le batho ba Repabliki ya Afrika Borwa.South African Rugby Union le Toropokgolo ya Motsekapa go swara phadišano ya bo seswai ya Rugby World Cup Sevens gare ga 9 le 11 Lewedi be le lekga la mathomo tiragalo ye ye bohlokwa swarwa ke naga ya Afrika gomme barati ba diketekete bao ba tsenetšego ba ilwe ba thabišwa ka dijo tša rugby le kamogelo ye lemogwago ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Amazwi okuhalalisaIKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi okuhalalisa kanye nezilokotho ezinhle kulaba: UMongameli u-William Samoei Ruto weRiphabhulikhi yase-Kenya, ogcotshwe ngoLwesibili mhla ziyi-13 kuMandulo 2022, kulandela ukhetho lukazwelonke olunokuthula olwabanjwa mhla ziyisi-9 kuNcwaba.

src_text: MahlokoKabinete romela melaetša ya mahloko go malapa le bagwera ba:Bana ba sekolo ba 18 le batho ba bagolo ba babedi bao ba hlokofetšego mo kotsing ye šoro ka Pongola, KwaZulu-Natal ka Labohlano, 16 Lewedi 2022 ka morago ga go thulana ga lori le bene yeo bego nameditše bana ba sekolo  Bao ba Thwetšwego Mešomong.
tgt_text: IPhini likaMongameli u-David Mabuza ubewuthamele lo mcimbi egameni likaMongameli u-Ramaphosa kanye nohulumeni nabantu beRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Batho ka moka bao ba thwetšwego mešomong mangwalo bona dithuto tla tiišetšwa le go netefatšwa ka maleba  Morena Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale bjalo ka Molaodimogolophethiši (DG): Mokhomišinare wa Setšhaba wa Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Tshokollo  Ngaka Malixole Percival Mahlati bjalo ka Motlatšamolaodimogolophethiši (DDG: lefapheng la go šoma ka merero ya Dikolo tša Maokelo tša Thuto ya Godimo ka moka le ya Tlhabollo ya Bašomi mo Kgorong ya Maphelo  Morena Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki bjalo ka Mohlahlobimogolophethiši mo Kgorong ya Temo, Tsošološo ya Naga le Tlhabollo ya Dinagamagaed.
tgt_text: INhlangano Yezebhola Lombhoxo yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye neDolobha laseKapa ngokusingatha ngempumelelo umqhudelwano wehlandla lesishiyagalombili weNdebe Yomhlaba Yebhola Lombhoxo Yamaqembu Anabadlali Abasiyisikhombisa obubanjwe phakathi komhla ziyisi-9 nomhla ziyi-11 kuMandulo.

src_text: Morena Phaswa Phineas Mamogale bjalo ka Mohlankedimogolo wa Ditšhelete mo Kgorong ya Maphelo.
tgt_text: Bekungokokuqala ngqa ukuba le ndumezulu yomqhudelwano ohlonishwa kakhulu usingathwe yizwe lase-Afrika futhi izinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane zabalandeli ababehambele lo mqhudelwano bazitika ngedili lemidlalo yebhola lombhoxo esezingeni eliphezulu futhi bathokozela nempatho yodumo efudumele yeNingizimu Afrika yokuphatha nokusingatha izivakashi..     Amazwi enduduzo IKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi enduduzo emindenini kanye nabangani balaba: izingane zesikole eziyi-18 kanye nabantu abadala ababili abashone engozini enyantisayo eyenzeke endaweni yasoPhongolo, KwaZulu-Natali ngoLwesihlanu mhla ziyi-16 kuMandulo 2022 emuva kokuba iloli elikhulu elithwala impahla lishayisane mahlanze neveni ebelithwele izingane zesikole     Abaqashiwe.

src_text: Tšhireletšego ya Meetse.
tgt_text: Ukuvikelwa kokutholakala kwamanzi.

src_text: Kabinete lebogile MaAfrika Borwa ka moka ge ba obametše taelo ya go fokotšwa ga meetse ye phethagaditšwego dikarolong tše dingwe tša Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni go boetša sekeng maemo matamo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi libonge abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngokuthobela kwabo imikhawulo yokusetshenziswa kwamanzi ebekiwe ezingxenyeni ezithile zedolobha laseGoli, e-Tshwane kanye nase-Ekurhuleni ngenhloso yokuletha uzinzo emandleni ezigcinamanzi.

src_text: Matamo ka mehutahuta ka fase ga kgatelelo ye kgolo kudu ka baka la dithemphereitšha tša go fiša tšhiritšhiri gola Gauteng, ebile nyakego ye golelago godimo ya meetse gapeleditše Rand Water go fokotša ka bontši meetse ao abelwago mebasepala.
tgt_text: Amadamu kanye nezigcinamanzi kusalokhu kungaphansi kwengcindezi ngenxa yamazingakushisa aphakeme e-Gauteng, futhi isidingo esikhulayo samanzi sesiphoqe inkampani yakwa-Rand Water ukuba inciphise kakhulu ukuphakelwa kwamanzi komasipala.

src_text: Rand Water aba meetse go nwega mantši bathong ba go feta 11 milione go la Gauteng, dikarolong tše dingwe tša Mpumalanga, Freistata le Leboa Bodikela.
tgt_text: Le nkampani yamanzi iphakela ngamanzi okuphuza ahlanzekile kubantu abangaphezu kwezigidi eziyi-11 e-Gauteng, nasezingxenyeni ezithile zesifundazwe saseMpumalanga, eFreyistata kanye naseNyakatho Ntshonalanga.

src_text: Tšona diphokotšo tše tša go se efogege di nepile go boloka kabo ya meetse ebile di tla dula di le gona go ba go fihlela ge seemo se kaonafala.
tgt_text: Le mikhawulo engenakugwemeka ihlose ukuvikela ukuphakelwa kwamanzi futhi izoqhubeka isebenze kuze kufike isikhathi lapho sesingcono isimo.

src_text: Kabinete dirile boipiletšo setšhabeng go tšwelapele go obamela magato phokotšo ya meetse le go kgatha tema ya bona ka go šomiša ka tshwanelo ka ge le sedirišwa sa go hlokwa kudu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi linxuse umphakathi ukuba uqhubeke nokuthobela imikhawulo ebekiwe yokusetshenziswa kwamanzi futhi udlale indima yawo ekusebenziseni le nsiza eyingcosana ngokuyonga.

src_text: Mogwanto wa Transnet.
tgt_text: Isiteleka sakwa-Transnet.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše kwano ya meputso ya mengwaga ye meraro ye kwanetšwego ke Transnet le Yunione ya Mohlakanelwa ya Bosetšhaba ya Dinamelwa (UNTU), ye tlo dirišwago pakeng ya 1 Moranang 2022 go fihla ka la 31 Hlakola.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lisamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe isivumelwano samaholo seminyaka emithathu okufinyelelwe kusona phakathi kwenkampani yakwa-Transnet nenyunyana yabasebenzi i-United National Transport Union (i-UNTU), esizosebenza esikhathini esisukela mhla lu-1 kuNhlaba 2022 kuze kube ngumhla zingama-31 kuNdasa.

src_text: Khomišene ya Poelano, Bonamodi le Ditherišano namotše kwano ye, gomme magato bona dirile gore boipelaetšo ka maloko UNTU bo fedišwe ka ponyo ya leihlo.
tgt_text: IKhomishana Yokubuyisana, Ukuxazulula Nokwahlulela iyona ebilawula izingxoxo eziholele kulesi sivumelwano esiqede ngokushesha isiteleka samanje samalungu e-UNTU.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše gape sephetho sa go fediša mogwanto ka Yunione ya Dinamelwa ya Afrika Borwa le ya Bašomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lisamukelile futhi nesinqumo senyunyana i-South African Transport and Allied Workers Union (i-SATAWU) sokuqeda isiteleka.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše boikgafo bja Transnet bja go bea šedi godimo ga go fediša ditšhalelomorago tše bilego gona go ralala boemakepe le dipeakanyong tša ditimela nakong ya magato boipelaetšo, ao bilego le seabe se se mpe ikonoming le makaleng ao tshepetšego godimo ga Transnet go aba ditirelo..   Kabinete bontšhitše tebogo ya yona godimo ga thekgo le tšhomišanommogo ye laeditšwego ke dikgwebo ka nako ya mogwanto hlohleletša kamano ye sa felego magareng ga balaodi ba Transnet le bašomi gore khamphani ye le ikonomi ya naga ka bophara di holege.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lisamukelile isibophezelo se-Transnet sokugxila ekuqedeni ukusalela emuva komsebenzi okwenzeke ohlelweni lonkana lokuthuthwa kwempahla emachwebeni ngemikhumbi kanye nezitimela ngenkathi kuqhubeka isiteleka, okuyinto ebe nomthelela omubi kakhulu emnothweni nasemikhakheni ethembele ezinsizakalweni zalolu hlelo..   IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukubonga kwalo ukwesekwa nokubambisana okuboniswe ngabamabhizinisi ngenkathi kuqhubeka isiteleka.

src_text: Dikamano tša Afrika Borwa le Saudi Arabia.
tgt_text: Likhuthaza ukuthi kube nobudlelwano obuhle obuqhubekayo phakathi kwabaphathi be-Transnet nabasebenzi ukuze kuhlomule inkampani kanye nomnotho wezwe.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše Ketelo ya Mošomo ye atlegilego ya go ya kua the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia ka Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka la 15 le 16 Diphalane.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika ne-Saudi Arabia.

src_text: Nakong ya keteko ye, dinaga tše ka bobedi di saenetše Dimemorantamo tše 17 tša Kwešišano go magoro go fapafapana go swana le temo, boreatlhapi, meepo, enetši ya go mpšhafatšega, tšhireletšego, dinamelwa le temo ya diphedi le dimela tša ka meetseng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilwamukele uhambo lokuvakasha ngokomsebenzi lukaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa lapho ebevakashele ezweni lase-Saudi Arabia mhla ziyi-15 nomhla ziyi-16 kuMfumfu.

src_text: Dimemorantamo tše dingwe tša kwešišano tšeo di saenetšwego ke tša mabapi le go hlongwa ga Khansele ya Mohlakanelwa ya Dikgwebo, tšhomišano legorong la diintasteri tša sešole le dithekišetšano, tšhomišano ya ditekolonyakišišo tša thutaswika.
tgt_text: Ngenkathi kuqhubeka lolu hambo, lawa mazwe amabili asayine iZivumelwano Zokusebenzisana (ama-MoU) ayi-17 emikhakheni ehlukahlukene, njengezolimo, ezokudoba, ezezimayini, ezamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo, ezokuvikeleka, ezokuthutha kanye nomkhakha wemboni yezitshalo nezilwanyana zasemanzini.

src_text: Mopresidente šomišitše ketelo ye go mema dikgwebo tša Saudi Arabia go iponagatša khonferenseng ya bohlano ya dipeeletšo ya Afrika Borwa ye tlo swarwago ka.
tgt_text: Amanye ama-MoU asayiniwe aphathelene nokusungulwa koMkhandlu Wokusebenza Ngokuhlanganyela Kwezebhizinisi, ubambiswano emkhakheni wezimboni zezempi nokuthengwa kwemikhiqizo nezinsizakalo ezihlobene nalokhu kanye nesivumelwano sokubambisana kwizingcwaningo zomkhakha wezomumomhlaba, ezejiyoloji.

src_text: Saudi Arabia ke mogwebišani wa bobedi wo mogologolo wa Afrika Borwa seleteng sa Bohlabelagare ebile ke mothopo wo mogologolo wa diromelwa ka nageng go tšwa go sona selete se.
tgt_text: UMongameli usebenzise lolu hambo ukumema amabhizinisi ase-Saudi Arabia ukuba eze kuleli azokwethamela ingqungquthela yotshalomali yaseNingizimu Afrika yesihlanu ezobanjwa ngowezi-.

src_text: Dikamano tša boditšhabatšhaba magareng ga dinaga tše ka bobedi di bile le ditlamorago tše botse godimo ga ditlwaedi tša kgwebišano le dipeeletšo.
tgt_text: I-Saudi Arabia iyizwe lesibili ngobukhulu emazweni ahwebelana neNingizimu Afrika esifundeni esiseMpumalanga Emaphakathi futhi ingumthombo omkhulu kunayo yonke eminye wezimpahla ezingena kuleli ezivela kulesiya sifunda.

src_text: Dipeeletšo tša Mananeokgoparara.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano phakathi kwamazwe womabili sebuholele ekutheni kube nomthelela omuhle kwezohwebo nasekutshalweni kwezimali.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše go thongwa ga polante ya tšweletšo ya plastiki ya maemo godimodimo lefaseng ka khampani ya go dira plastiki yeo tšwago pele maemong boditšhabatšhaba, ya go bitšwa ALPLA Group, go la Lanseria kua Gauteng.
tgt_text: Ukutshalomali lwengqalasizinda.

src_text: Se se tlaleletša maikgafo Mopresidente Ramaphosa go bea sekeng tlhabollo ya mananeokgoparara bjalo ka mokgwa wa go hlohleletša kgolo ya ikonomi le go atiša mešomo..   Dipeeletšo tša boleng bja US$50 milione di kgatha tema ye kgolo godimo ga Leanolegolo la Toropo ya Mabonwa ya Lanseria leo le tlo hlohleletšago seemo seo se tieletšego le tšhomišoleswa le gape go hlola le go šireletša mešomo ye.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukelile ukugunyazwa komsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwefemu kanokusho yesimanjemanje ezokhiqiza imikhiqizo kapulastikhi yinkampani yamazwe ngamazwe engumkhiqizi ohamba phambili i-ALPLA Group, e-Lanseria e-Gauteng.

src_text: Godimo ga dipeeletšo tše go akaretšwa le lenaneo la go ithutela mošomo la batsebi ba 36 ba bointšineere bja dikgerekgere le ba tšhomišogape ba ditiro tša ALPLA Group go ralala selete sa Borwa bja Afrika.
tgt_text: Lokhu kwengeza phezu kwesibophezelo sikaMongameli u-Ramaphosa sokusebenzisa ukuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda njengendlela yokufukula umnotho kanye nokukhulisa amathuba omsebenzi..   Lolu tshalomali olubalelwa ezigidini ezingama-50 zamadola aseMelika luwutshalomali olusemqoka kakhulu olufakwa kuhlelongqangi lokwakhiwa kwedolobha likanokusho lesimanjemanje i-Lanseria Smart City oluzoqhuba futhi lukhuthaze ukusimama kanye nokusetshenziswa kwemikhiqizo kabusha futhi ngokunjalo ludale futhi lusekele ngokuqhubekayo amathuba omsebenzi angama-.

src_text: Lenaneo le la boithutelamošomo le tlo thoma ka 2023, ka baithutelamošomo ba mathomo ba 12 ba MaAfrika Borwa ba go tšwa mafelong ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Okubandakanyiwe kulokhu wuhlelo lokuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini lonjiniyela bemishini yobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kanye nochwepheshe bezokusetshenziswa kwemikhiqizo kabusha abangama-36 abazosebenza ezinkampanini ze-ALPLA Group esifundeni esiseningizimu ne-Afrika sonkana.

src_text: Meepo ye Sego Molaong.
tgt_text: Uhlelo lokuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini luzoqala ngowezi-2023, lapho kuzoqeqeshwa khona abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abafundela umsebenzi bokuqala abayi-12 abavela emiphakathini yendawo.

src_text: Meepo ye sego molaong kweša setšhaba bohloko le go gobatša ikonomi ya gaborena, ebile dipoelo tša yona ke tobo ya letseno go bobedi mmušo le lefapha la meepo..   Kabinete amogetše go amogwa ga dithunya tšeo di bego di utilwe le go golegwa ga bagononelwa ba 20 ba go amana le meepo ye sego molaong ka nako ya lesolophuruphutšo kua mokoting wa moepo wa Stilfontein go la Leboa Bodikela.
tgt_text: Ukumbiwa kwezimbiwa okungekho emthethweni.

src_text: Kabinete dira boipiletšo go MaAfrika Borwa go tšwelapele go šomišana le mabotho phethagatšo ya molao go netefatša go atlega ga masolo kamoso twantšho ya bosenyi.
tgt_text: Ukumbiwa kwezimbiwa okungekho emthethweni kulimaza imiphakathi kanye nomnotho wethu, futhi kuholela ekulahlekeni kwengenisomali kuhulumeni ngokunjalo futhi nasemkhakheni wezimayini..   IKhabhinethi likwamukelile ukushaqwa kwenqwaba yezibhamu ebezifihliwe kanye nokuboshwa kwabasolwa abangama-20 abeyamaniswa nokumbiwa kwezimbiwa okungekho emthethweni ngenkathi kubanjwe umkhankaso ongukhukhulelangoqo emgodini wemayini e-Stilfontein eNyakatho Ntshonalanga.

src_text: Se se tla romela molaetša wo bogale wa gore bosenyi ga bo thuše ka selo, le gore badirabosenyi ba tlo golegwa le go sekišwa ntle poifo goba go šokelwa..  Enetši.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyabanxusa abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuba baqhubeke nokusebenzisana nabomthetho ukuqinisekisa ukuphumelela kwemikhankaso yokulwisana nobugebengu esikhathini esizayo.

src_text: Eskom saenetše dikwanelo tša go hiriša tša mengwaga ye 30 gotee le babeeletši ba bane ba batšweletši ba go ikema ba mohlagase go aga metšhene ye mefsa ya go fehla enetši ya go hlweka kua ditišing tša mohlagase tša Majuba le Tutuka gola Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuzothumela umyalezo oqinile wokuthi ubugebengu abukhokheli, nokuthi izigebengu zizoboshwa futhi zishushiwe ngaphandle kovalo nokwenzelela..   Amandla kagesi.

src_text: Khirišo ye ya seripa sa naga tla goketša dipeeletšo tše phopholeditšwego tša go batamela R40 bilione.
tgt_text: Inkampani yakwa-Eskom isanda kusayina izivumelwano zokuqasha zeminyaka engama-30 nabatshalizimali abane abangabakhiqizi bamandla kagesi abazimele, ukuze kwakhiwe isikhungo esisha esizoba namandla okukhiqiza amandla kagesi ohlanzekile eziteshini eziphehla ugesi iMajuba kanye neTutuka esifundazweni saseMpumalanga.

src_text: Babeeletši ba ba bane – HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Solar Group le Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – ba tlo fehla mohlagase wa go lekana dimekawate tše 2 000 godimo ga mohlagase wa go tšweletšwa setšhabeng.
tgt_text: Lezi zivumelwano zokuqashwa komhlaba zizoheha utshalomali olulinganiselwa ezigidigidini ezingama-40 zamarandi.

src_text: Phehlo ye ye mpsha ya mohlagase go letetšwe gore kgokaganywe le mohlagase wo tšweletšwago nageng ka bophara mo dikgweding tše 24 go fihla go tše 36 go tloga ge ngwaga wo wa ditšhelete fela, ka go latela ditumelelo tša tikologo, tša karolo ya mafelo le tše dingwe tša taolo.
tgt_text: Laba batshalizimali abane – okuyi-HDF Energy South Africa, i-Red Rocket SA, i-Sola Group kanye ne-Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – bazofaka okungenani ugesi ongamamegawathi ayizi-2 000 esikhungweni sikagesi sikazwelonke.

src_text: Tšhireletšego ya Dijo.
tgt_text: Lezi zikhungo ezintsha zokukhiqiza ugesi kulindeleke ukuthi zixhunywe kwisikhungo sikagesi sikazwelonke ezinyangeni ezingama-24 kuya kwezingama-36 kusukela esikhathini okuphothulwe ngaso imidanti nemicikilisho yezivumelwano eziphathelene nezimali zokuxhaswa komklamo, futhi uma sekutholakale izimvume eziphathelene nezemvelo, ukuklanywa komhlaba kanye nezinye izimvume zokulawula.

src_text: Kabinete amogetše go swarwa ka mo nageng ga Lekgotla la 2022 la Agri SA go la Pretoria ka la 13 le la 14 Diphalane 2022 ka fase ga morero wo: “Kgodišo ya Tšweletšo ya ka Nageng”.
tgt_text: Ukutholakala kokudla okwanele.

src_text: Lekgotla le le rerišane ka merero ya go swana le go dira gore maanakgolo temo šomele batšweletši ba ka mo nageng; mananeokgoparara go swarelela dijo tša go tšweletšwa ka mo nageng; go dira gore tikologo ya ka mo nageng tšee nako ye telele godimo ga tšweletšo ya dijo ya ka mo nageng le ka bokamosong, le go matlafatša mabokgoni tšweletšo ya dijo go diriša ditšweletšo tšeo di tšweleditšwego ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukelile ukusingathwa kweNgqungquthela ye-Agri SA yowezi-2022 ePitoli mhla ziyi-13 nango mhla ziyi-14 kuMfumfu 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Ukulinywa Kokudla Endaweni”.

src_text: Ka gona go bea pele tšhireletšego ya dijo kamoso, Kabinete amogetše go tsebagatšwa ga Hapo ya Bosetšhaba ya Tšhireletšego ya Tlhago, ka Kgoro ya Saense le Lenaneo la Kgwebišano ya Temo ya Ikonomi ya Diphedi, ka tšhomišano le Yunibesithi ya Pretoria.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela ibhunge ngezindaba ezinjengokwakhiwa kwezinhlelongqangi zezolimo ezenzelwe abalimi bendawo; ingqalasizinda esimeme yokudla okulinywe endaweni; ukwenza isimo semvelo sendawo esisimeme esikulungele ukukhiqizwa kokudla endaweni kuya phambili esikhathini esizayo, kanye nokuqiniswa kwamandla abakhiqizi bokudla okulungisa imikhiqizo elinywe endaweni.

src_text: Hapo ye tla thekga thibelo, phokotšo le taolo ya dipuno le malwetši diphoofolo, ao tlo bago le seabe sa tšweletšo ye hlatlogetšego godimo, tšhireletšego ya dijo le tlhabollo ye swarelelago ya dinagamagae   Diphetho tša Kabinete.
tgt_text: Ngenhloso yokuqhubeka nokubeka eqhulwini ukutholakala kokudla okwanele, iKhabhinethi likwamukelile futhi nokwethulwa kwesizinda sikazwelonke sokuvinjelwa kwamagciwane abanga izifo ezithathelwanayo, i-National Biosecurity Hub, esingaphansi kohlelo i-Agricultural Bio-economy Innovation Partnership Programme, okuwuhlelo loMnyango Wezolimo Nokuqanjwa Kwezinto Ezintsha oluqhuba ngokubambisana neNyuvesi yasePitoli.

src_text: Go Dumelelwa ga Tšhatha ya Kopano ya Afrika (AU) ya go Hlongwa ga Makala.
tgt_text: Lesi sizinda sizokweseka ukuvinjelwa, ukuncishiswa kanye nokulawulwa kwezifo zezitshalo nezilwane, okuyinto ezolekelela ekukhuliseni imikhiqizo, ukutholakala kokudla kanye nentuthuko esimeme ezindaweni zasemakhaya   Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ga Tšhatha ya AU ka Mehola le Metheo ya go Hlongwa ga Makala, Pušoselegae le Tlhabollo ya ka Nageng gore dumelelwe.
tgt_text: Ukugunyazwa ngokusemthethweni koMqulu weNhlangano Yamazwe ase-Afrika (i-AU) Wokudluliswa Nokwabiwa Kwamagunya Okulawula.

src_text: Afrika Borwa saenetše tšhatha ye ka Phato.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukwethulwa ePhalamende koMqulu we-AU Wamagugu Nemigomo Yokudluliswa Nokwabiwa Kwamagunya Okulawula, Ukuphathwa kanye Nokuthuthukiswa Kwezindawo ukuze ugunyazwe ngokusemthethweni.
INingizimu Afrika yawusayina ngoNcwaba 2021 umqulu.

src_text: Tšhatha ye ya go Hlongwa ga Makala fana ka tlhako go mebušo ka moka ye lego maloko ka sengwalwa sa tlhahlo ka khuetšo ya go hlongwa ga makala le mehola ya ona go tloga mmušong wa bosetšhaba go ya didikong tše dingwe tša mmušo.
tgt_text: UMqulu Wokudluliwa Nokwabiwa Kwamagunya Okulawula uhlinzeka ngohlaka kuyo yonke imibuso engamalungu olungumbhalo ongumhlahlandlela maqondana nokudluliswa nokwabiwa kwamandla kanye nemisebenzi kusuka kuhulumeni kazwelonke kudluliselwa kweminye imikhakha nezinhlaka zikahulumeni.

src_text: Tšhatha ye swaragane kudu le phatlalatšo ya taolo le mehola, tlhako ya pušo le tlhabollo ya ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: Umqulu ubhekene ikakhulukazi nokudluliswa nokwabiwa kwamagunya nemisebenzi, uhlaka lokuphatha kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo.

src_text: Khansele ya bo-32 ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Polokego ya Ditimela (IRSC).
tgt_text: Umhlangano Wama-32 Waminyaka Yonke Womkhandlu Wamazwe Ngamazwe Wezokuphepha Kwezokuthutha Ngezitimela (i-IRSC).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše go swarwa ga Kopano ya bo-32 ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya IRSC gola Johannesburg go thoma ka la 1 go fihla ka la 6 Diphalane 2023 ka fase ga morero wo: “Phetošo ya sebopego sa ditimela mo Lefaseng leo go sa tsebjego tša kamoso”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusingathwa koMhlangano Wama-32 Waminyaka Yonke we-IRSC eGoli kusukela mhla lu-1 kuya kumhla ziyisi-6 kuMfumfu 2023 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Sibumba kabusha ezokuthutha ngezitimela emhlabeni ongenakho ukuqiniseka”.

src_text: IRSC ke foramo ya boditšhabatšhaba ya go kopantšha mmogo ditsebi tša polokego ya ditimela go tšwa lefaseng ka bophara go fana maitemogelo go kaonafatša polokego ya ditimela..   Bjalo ka leloko la IRSC, Kemedi ya Afrika Borwa ya Polokego ya Ditimela swere foramo ye la mafelelo ka.
tgt_text: I-IRSC iyisithangami samazwe ngamazwe esiqoqela ndawonye ongoti bezokuphepha kwezokuthutha ngezitimela abaqhamuka kuwo wonke amagumbi amane omhlaba ukuze bazocobelelana ngolwazi mayelana nezimo abadlule kuzona kanye nalezo abahlangabezana nazo emsebenzini wabo wansuku zonke, ngenhloso yokwenza ngcono ukuphepha kwezokuthutha ngezitimela.

src_text: Seakanywa sa Leano la Bosetšhaba sa Mananeokgoparara 2050 (NIP 2050) Kgato ya.
tgt_text: Njengelungu le-IRSC, uMlawuli Wezokuphepha Kwezokuthutha Ngezitimela waseNingizimu Afrika wayegcine ngowezi-2015 ukusingatha lesi sithangami.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše phatlalatšo kuranteng ya mmušo ya Kgato ya Bobedi ya seakanywa sa NIP sa 2050 gore setšhaba se fe ditshwayotshwayo tša sona.
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lohlelo Lukazwelonke Lwengqalasizinda lowezi-2050 (i-NIP 2050) Isigaba sesi-.

src_text: Leano le le fa tlhahlo matlafatšong le kaonafatšong ya diprotšeke tše logetšwego maano tša mmušo tša mohlakanelwa..   Seakanywa se se hlaola diprotšeke tše logetšwego maano madulong batho; mohlagase wa mmasepala; meetse; dilahlwa tše thata; dinamelwa tša banamedi; thuto le mananeokgoparara maphelo; mananeokgoparara titšithale, le bosenyi le bomenetša.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukushicilelwa kuSomqulu kahulumeni kohlaka lwe-NIP 2050 Isigaba sesi-2 ukuze kuboniswane nomphakathi ngalo.

src_text: Sebopego sa leano le se fana ka ponelopele ya fao go swanetšego go fiwa šedi, se fana ka phetleko ya seemo sa bjale, se hlatholla dipeelano tše bohlokwa tša go atlega le go bolela gore go swanetše gore go dirwe eng go fihlelela ponelopele ye.
tgt_text: Lolu hlaka luhlinzeka ngesiqondiso ekuqiniseni nokwengeza emiklamweni edidiyelwe yamasu akhethekile kahulumeni..   Luhlonza imiklamo ekhethekile okuhloswe ngayo ukufeza ngempumelelo izinjongo zikahulumeni maqondana nezokuhlaliswa kwabantu; ugesi kamasipala; amanzi; imfucuza; ezokuthutha abagibeli; ingqalasizinda yezemfundo nezempilo; ingqalasizinda yobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje, kanye nobugebengu nenkohlakalo.

src_text: Se šišinya tshepedišo ya phethagatšo ye swanetšego go latelwa mo leanong la magato la go gagaba tekano ya mengwaga ye meraro.
tgt_text: Isimosakhiwo sohlelo sihlinzeka ngenhlosombono yendima okumele kubhekwane nayo ngqo, sihlinzeka ngolwazi olutholakale ekuhlolweni kwesimo samanje, sichaza kabanzi ngezimo ezisemqoka ezidingekayo ukuze kuzuzwe impumelelo futhi sibalula lokho okudingeka ukuthi kwenziwe ukufezekisa inhlosombono.

src_text: Tlhako ya Phethagatšo ya Bosetšhaba ya go Fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Siphakamisa inqubo yokuqaliswa kokusebenza kohlelo okumele ilandelwe emjikelezweni weminyaka emithathu yohlelo lokusebenza.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Tlhako ya Phethagatšo ya Bosetšhaba ya go fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lukazwelonke Lokuqalisa Ukusebenza okuhloswe ngalo ukufezekisa Ukusebenza Ngobungcweti Emkhakheni Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni.

src_text: Tlhako ye phatlaladitšwe ka 2021 gore setšhaba se ntšhe sa mafahleng sona..   Tlhako ye fana ka maikokotlelo mahlano mo magatong go hloma bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilugunyazile uHlaka Lukazwelonke Lokuqalisa Ukusebenza okuhloswe ngalo ukufezekisa Ukusebenza Ngobungcweti Emkhakheni Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni.

src_text: Metheo ye ya boikokotlelo akaretša kgoketšo ya pele tsena le tlhokolo mo Ditirelong tša Mmušo; kgakolo le tlwaetšo; thulaganyo le taolo ya bodiragatši; thuto ye tšwelagopele, kgatelopele ya kgetho ya mošomo le ditiragalo tša mabapi le kgetho ya mošomo.
tgt_text: Uhlaka lwashicilelwa ngowezi-2021 ukuze kuboniswane nomphakathi ngalo..   Uhlaka luhlinzeka ngezinsika ezinhlanu maqondana nezinhlelo zokungenelela okumele zisetshenziswe ekwenzeni umkhakha wezeMisebenzi Kahulumeni usebenze ngobungcweti.

src_text: Diphetogo ka Gare ga Dipeelano tša Mošomo tša Balaodipharephare (di-DG).
tgt_text: Lezi zinsika zibandakanya ukuqashwa kwabasebenzi abasha kuhulumeni; ukuhlinzekwa kwabasebenzi abasha ngolwazi oluphathelene nomsebenzi wesikhungo kanye nokujwayezwa kwabo umsebenzi; ukuhlela kanye nokuphathwa kwensebenzo; ukufunda okuqhubekayo nokuthuthukiswa kobungcweti bomsebenzi, nenqubekela phambili emsebenzini kanye nezigameko eziphathelene nomsebenzi.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše pego ya go šišinya magato go matlafatša mabokgoni le bokgoni bja Balaodipharephare (di-DG) Ditirelong tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: Izinguquko ezimweni zokuqashwa kwaBaqondisi-Jikelele (o-DG).

src_text: Pego ye dirile ditšhišinyo tše mmalwa, go akaretšwa le paka ya ka kantorong ya di-DG le taolo ya baromiwa ka Lekgotlaphethiši go bahlankedi ba taolo..   Pego ye šišintše gape le gore Molaodipharephare Kantorong ya Mopresidente tla neelwa Hlogo ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liwugunyazile umbiko ophakamisa izinyathelo zokuqinisa amandla okusebenza o-DG kanye nobungcweti babo bokwenza umsebenzi ngempumelelo.

src_text: Kua diprofenseng, mošomo wo tla neelwa Balaodipharephare dikantorong tša Ditonakgolo.
tgt_text: Umbiko wenze iziphakamiso eziningana kubandakanya ubude besikhathi esizohlalwa ngo-DG ezikhundleni zabo kanye nokuphathwa kokudluliswa nokwabiwa kwamandla yiSiphathimandla Esiphezulu siwadlulisela ezikhulwini eziphendulayo..   Umbiko uphakamisa ukuthi u-DG oseHhovisi likaMongameli anikezwe isikhundla sokuba yiNhloko Yophiko Lokuphathwa Kwemisebenzi Kahulumeni.

src_text: Pego ye šišintše gape le magato go hlahla dikgoro ka taolo ya dikontraka le Balaodipharephare.
tgt_text: Ezifundazweni, lo msebenzi uzonikezwa o-DG abasebenza emahhovisi oNdunankulu.

src_text: Peakanyo ye Fetlekilwego ya Taolo ya Bodiragatši go Balaodipharephare gare ya fetlekwa gore gate ka mošito tee le diphetogo tšeo di dumeletšwego.
tgt_text: Umbiko uphakamise futhi nezinyathelo zokuqondisa iminyango maqondana nokuphathwa kwezinkontileka zo-DG.

src_text: Tona ya Motšwaoswere ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo, Ntate Thulas Nxesi tlare mo bekeng ye tlago sware kopano ya tshedimošetšo ya babegaditaba go hlatholla Tlhako ya Bosetšhaba ya Phethagatšo go fihlelela Bokgoni Ditirelong tša Mmušo le gape go hlatholla gabotse diphetogo tše dumeletšwego dipeelanong tša go thwalwa ga Balaodipharephare.
tgt_text: Uhlelo Olubuyekeziwe Lokuphathwa Kokusebenza ko-DG luyabuyekezwa njengamanje ukuze luhanjelaniswe kahle nezinguquko ezigunyaziwe.

src_text: Pego ya Bohlano ya Mošomo ka Phethagatšo ya Sengwalwa sa Makgoraditsela ka Ditokelo tša Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole (WPRPD) 2020-.
tgt_text: 4   Ibamba likaNgqongqoshe Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni Nokuphathwa Kwayo, uMnu Thulas Nxesi, ngeviki elizayo uzobiza isithangami sabezindaba lapho ezochaza khona ngoHlaka Lukazwelonke Lokuqalisa Ukusebenza okuhloswe ngalo ukufezekisa Ukusebenza Ngobungcweti Emkhakheni wezeMisebenzi Kahulumeni futhi achaze kabanzi nangezinguquko ezigunyaziwe maqondana nezimo zokuqashwa nokusebenza ko-DG.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše Pego ya Bohlano ya Mošomo ka phethagatšo ya WPRPD, yeo fanago ka seemo sa bjale ka phethagatšo ya WPRPD.
tgt_text: Umbiko Wesihlanu Wenqubekela Phambili esiyenziwe Ekuqalisweni Kokusebenza Komthetho Odingidwayo Oqondene Namalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka (i-WPRPD) wezi-2020-.

src_text: Pego ye akaretša le ditshwayotshwayo go tšwa dikgorong tša mmušo tša bosetšhaba le tša profense fana ka seemo sa bjale ka phethagatšo ya pholisi ye akaretšago diriparipana tša ditekanyetšokabo..   Pego ya mathomo ya seemo sa mošomo ya ngwaga ka ngwaga phatlaladitšwe ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liwugunyazile uMbiko Wesihlanu Wenqubekela Phambili esiyenziwe Ekuqalisweni Kokusebenza kwe-WPRPD, ohlinzeka ngolwazi lwakamuva maqondana nokuqaliswa kokusebenza kwe-WPRPD.

src_text: Pego ye ya bohlano dumeletšwe go gatišwa kuranteng ya mmušo le go phatlalatšwa ke Kgoro ya Basadi, Baswa le Batho ba go Phela ka Bogole.
tgt_text: Umbiko uqukethe imibono evela eminyagweni kazwelonke kanye neyezifundazwe.

src_text: Phetošo ya Athikele ya 20(1) ya Kopano ya Phedišo ya Mehuta ka Moka ya Kgethollo Kgahlanong le Basadi (CEDAW).
tgt_text: Uhlinzeka ngolwazi lwakamuva maqondana nokuqaliswa kokusebenza kwenqubomgomo okubandakanya nokwabiwa kwezabelomali..   Umbiko wokuqala waminyaka wonke wenqubekela phambili esiyenziwe washicilelwa ngowezi-.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Phetošo ya Athikele 20(1) ya CEDAW gore dumelelwe.
tgt_text: Umbiko wenqubekela phambili wesihlanu usugunyaziwe ukuthi usungashicilelwa kuSomqulu Kahulumeni futhi ushicilelwe nanguMnyango Wezabesifazane, Intsha kanye Nabantu Abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di fana ka nako ye teletšana ya dikopano tša komiti tša go lebelela dipego tša mebušo ye lego maloko.
tgt_text: Ukuchitshiyelwa Kombhalo wama-20(1) Wesivumelwano Esiqondene Nokuqedwa Kwazo Zonke Izinhlobo Zokucwaswa Okubhekiswe Kwabesifazane (i-CEDAW).

src_text: Afrika Borwa saenetše kwano ye ka 1993 le go dumelela moragonyana ga fao ka Manthole.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukuthunyelwa ePhalamende kwezichibiyelo zoMbhalo wama-20(1) we-CEDAW ukuze zigunyazwe ngokusemthethweni.

src_text: Tlhagišo ye Palamenteng šetšane le go tsamaiša ka mošito tee kwano ye dumeletšwego kua morago gotee le phetošo ya Athikele 20(1) ya kwano ye.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zihlinzekela ukwelulwa kwesikhathi semihlangano yamakomidi ecubungula imibiko yemibuso engamalungu.

src_text: Kwano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Kamogelo ya Mangwalo Thuto Mabapi le Thuto ya Godingwana.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika yasisayinda ngowe-1993 lesi sivumelwano futhi emuva kwalokho yasigunyaza ngokusemthethweni ngoZibandlela.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Kwano ya Lefase ka Bophara ka Kamogelo ya Mangwalo Thuto mabapi le Thuto ya Godingwana gore dumelelwe.
tgt_text: Ukuthunyelwa kwaso ePhalamende kuhloswe ngakho ukuhambelanisa isivumelwano esagunyazwa ngokusemthethweni phambilini nesichibiyelo soMbhalo wama-20(1).

src_text: Ge šetše dumeletšwe tla romelwa Mokgatlong wa Ditšhabakopano (UN) wa Thuto, Saenthefiki le tša Setšo le go kgontšhwa go šoma ka mo nageng ka Molao wa Bosetšhaba wa Tlhako ya Mangwalo Thuto, 2008 (Molao 67 wa 2008).
tgt_text: Isivumelwano Somhlaba Wonke Sokwamukelwa Ngokusemthethweni Kweziqu eziphathelene Nemfundo Ephakeme .

src_text: Kwano ye ya Lefase ka Bophara hloma metheo ya motlalanaga ya temogo ya go se tšee lehlakore le ya go se kgetholle ya mangwalo thuto ya godingwana le mangwalo thuto ka kakaretšo dumelela temogo ya mangwalo thuto dinagašele mo mebušo ye 193 ye lego maloko UN.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukuthunyelwa ePhalamende kweSivumelwano Somhlaba Wonke Sokwamukelwa Ngokusemthethweni Kweziqu eziphathelene Nemfundo Ephakeme ukuze sigunyazwe ngokusemthethweni.

src_text: Kgogelomorago ya Diphetošo tša Tlhahli ya Maloko Komitiphethiši.
tgt_text: Uma sesigunyazwe ngokusemthethweni sizothunyelwa kwiNhlangano Yezemfundo, Ezesayensi Nezamasiko yeNhlangano Yezizwe (i-UN) futhi siqalise ukusebenza nakuleli lizwe ngaphansi koMthetho Wohlaka Lweziqu Lukazwelonke, wezi-2008 (uMthetho wama-67 wezi-2008).

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše kwalakwatšo ye kwalakwaditšwego ke Kantoro ya Mopresidente ka Mošupologo, 17 Diphalane 2022 go gogelamorago diphetošo tšeo di dirilwego go Tlhahli ya Maloko Komitiphethiši, yeo bitšwago Pukukgakollo ya Ditona, ya..   Diphetošo tše di dirilwego ka Moranang 2022 di fane ka thekgo ya tlaleletšo go tše dingwe tša dikantoro tša Ditona tšeo di rwelego maikarabelo lefapha la go feta le tee.
tgt_text: 2   Isivumelwano Somhlaba Wonke sisungula imigomo-jikelele ezosetshenziswa kuwo wonke amazwe maqondana nokwamukelwa ngokusemthethweni kweziqu zemfundo ephakeme kanye nezinye iziqu, ngendlela engenakho ukwenzelela, esobala futhi engenakho ukucwasa.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di be di nyaka gore Mmušo rwale maikarabelo ka botlalo disenyegelo tša go amana le kabo ya mohlagase le meetse madulong semmušo go dulwa ke maloko komitiphethiši..   Kabinete lemogile dipelaelo tšeo di hlagišitšwego ke maloko setšhaba ebile tšeere sephetho sa go sekaseka Tlhahli ya Maloko Komitiphethiši.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano sivumela ukwamukelwa ngokusemthethweni kweziqu zemfundo ezitholwe emazweni angaphandle, emibusweni engamalungu e-UN eyi-.

src_text: Tshepedišo ye šogašogwa ke setheo sa go se tšee lehlakore ebile ge fihlile mafelelong, tlhahli ye tlo phatlalatšwa setšhabeng ka wepsaete ye ya Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Mmušo le Tsamaišo: www.dpsa.gov.za.
tgt_text: Ukuhoxiswa kwezichibiyelo zoMhlahlandlela Wamalungu Esigungu Seziphathimandla.

src_text: Kgwerano Diphetogong tša Enetši tša go se Tšee Lehlakore (JETP) le Leano la Dipeeletšo la JETP (JETP-IP).
tgt_text: 1  IKhabhinethi lisigunyazile isimemezelo esenziwe yiHhovisi likaMongameli ngoMsombuluko mhla ziyi-17 kuMfumfu 2022 sokuthi kuhoxiswe izichibiyelo ezenziwe kuMhlahlandlela Wamalungu Esigungu Seziphathimandla, futhi obizwa ngeBhukwana Elingumhlahlandlela woNgqongqoshe wezi-.

src_text: Ka morago ga go amogela tlhagišo ka JETP le JETP-IP, Kabinete thekgile ka atla pedi ETP-IP le go laetša ka fao kgotsofetšego ka gona ka mošomo wa go tsenelela wo dirilwego go kaonafatša..   JETP-IP hlatholla dipeeletšo tšeo di nyakegago go fihlelela maikgafo go fediša khabone ao dirilwego ke Mmušo wa Afrika Borwa mola ka go le lengwe go hlohleletšwa tlhabollo ya go swarelela nako ye teletšana, le go netefatša gore go fihlelelwa diphetogo tša go se tšee lehlakore go bašomedi bao ba amegago le setšhaba..   Komiti ya Magareng ga Ditona ka Phetogo ya Klaemete tlare go se goye kae ya swara tshedimošetšo le babegaditaba go fana ka tshedimošo ka botlalo   Melaokakanywa.
tgt_text: 2  Izichibiyelo ezenziwe ngoMbasa 2022 bezihlinzekela amandla angeziwe emahhovisi athile oNgqongqoshe abengamele iminyango kahulumeni engaphezu kowodwa.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wa 2022 wa Dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi.
tgt_text: Futhi beziyalela ukuba uMbuso uthwale ngokuphelele zonke izindleko eziqondene nokuhlinzekwa kukagesi namanzi ezindlini zombuso okuhlala kuzona amalungu esigungu seziphathimandla.. 3  IKhabhinethi likuphawulile ukukhathazeka okuzwakaliswe ngumphakathi futhi lathatha isinqumo sokubuyekeza uMhlahlandlela Wamalungu Esigungu Seziphathimandla.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Molaokakanywa wa 2022 wa Dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi gore lebelelwe goya pele.
tgt_text: Le nqubo izosingathwa wuhlaka oluzimele olungathathi hlangothi futhi uma seyiphothuliwe, umhlahlandlela uzokwaziswa emphakathini ngokusebenzisa iwebhusayithi yoMnyango Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni Nokuphathwa Kwayo: www.dpsa.gov.za.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo mpshafatša Molao wa Dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi wa go ba le mengwaga ye 70 ka bogolo, 1951 (Molao 57 wa 1951).
tgt_text: Ubambiswano Loguquko Olunobuqotho Nobulungiswa Kwezamandla (i-JETP) kanye noHlelo Lotshalomali lwe-JETP (i-JETP-IP).

src_text: Ge šetše dumeletšwe, Molaokakanywa wo tlo fana ka tlhako ya semolao ya dinamelwakepe tša Bagwebi go laola magatokamano dikepe.
tgt_text: 1    Emuva kokwamukela isethulo esiqondene ne-JETP kanye ne-JETP-IP, iKhabhinethi liyigunyazile i-JETP-IP futhi lizwakalise ukuwuthokozela umsebenzi onohlonze futhi obanzi owenziwayo ukwakha nokuthuthukisa i-JETP-IP.. 2     I-JETP-IP ichaza kabanzi ngotshalomali oludingekayo ukufezekisa izibophezelo ezenziwe nguHulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika zokuncishiswa kwezinukubezimkhathi, ngenkathi ngakolunye uhlangothi kugqugquzelwa intuthuko esimeme, futhi kuqinisekiswa uguquko olunobuqotho nobulungiswa kubasebenzi nemiphakathi ethintekile.

src_text: Molaokakanywa wo, magareng ga tše dingwe tla laola tlhamo, boingwadišo, go rea maina le go ntšhwa ga dikepe.
tgt_text: Ikomidi loNgqongqoshe Beminyango Ehlukahlukene Elethweswe Umsebenzi Wokubhekana Nokuguquguquka Kwesimo Sezulu lizobamba isithangami sabezindaba khona maduze nje ukuze lihlinzeke ngemininingwane ethe xaxa   Imithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Diphetošo tše di tlo ba le seabe tsošološong ya lefapha la dinamelwa tša mabopong le go tsamaiša naga ye ka mošito tee le Kwano ya Mokgatlo wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa tša Mabopo.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wezokuhweba Ngemikhumbi wezi-.

src_text: Afrika Borwa dumeletše kwano ye.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi selikugunyazile ukuthunyelwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wezokuhweba Ngemikhumbi wezi-2022 ukuze kuqhutshekwe nokuwucubungula.

src_text: Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2020 wa Dipalopalo.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa ulungisa kabusha uMthetho Wezokuhweba Ngemikhumbi, wonyaka we-1951 (uMthetho wama-57 wonyaka we-1957) osekuphele iminyaka engama-70 ukhona.

src_text: Kabinete dumeletše tlhagišo Palamenteng ya Molaokakanywaphetošwa wa 2022 gore lebelelwe goya pele.
tgt_text: Uma usuphasisiwe, uMthethosivivinywa uzohlinzeka ngohlaka olusemthethweni lwezokuhweba ngemikhumbi oluzolawula umsebenzi wonkana ophathelene nokusebenza kwemikhumbi yokuhweba.
